review: ive lisinopril (the little pink pills manufactured lupin pharm years. bp well managed, walgreens changed manufacturersupplier pills solco healthcare--a zhejiang huahai (china) pharma company. immediately saw rise bp culminated trip er bp...no changes life. zhejiang history using unacceptable binding materials pills. im quest find walgreens business connection solco. unacceptable.
full_review: Ive been on 5mg Lisinopril (the little pink pills manufactured by Lupin Pharm) for 5 or more years. My BP was well managed, then Walgreens changed the manufacturersupplier of the 5mg pills to Solco Healthcare--a Zhejiang Huahai (China) Pharma company. I immediately saw a rise in my bp which culminated with a trip to the ER with 191119 bp...no other changes in my life. Zhejiang has a history of using unacceptable binding materials  in their pills. Im on a quest to find out if Walgreens has some business connection with Solco. These are unacceptable.

review: trying “norvasc” bad side effects, dr put lisinopril. knowing sensitive medications, cut pill half taking. blood pressure feel great!! guess realize bad felt high bp, treated look back say ‘wow’. affecting greatly. took days lisinopril build start working, check bp twice daily. dropping slowly every day, third day day finally came. anyways, absolutely zero side effects lisinopril. read bad reviews know everyone responds differently, one winner me. top all, insurance copay. lol. complaints here. thought would share good experience, seeing people usually come bad one.
full_review: After trying “norvasc” and having bad side effects, Dr put me on Lisinopril 10mg. Knowing that I am sensitive to medications, I cut the pill in half so I have been taking 5mg. My blood pressure is down to 10565 and I feel great!! I guess I did not realize how bad I felt with high BP, until I treated it and can look back and say ‘wow’. It was affecting me greatly. It took about 3 days for the lisinopril to build up and start working, I check my BP twice daily. It was dropping slowly every day, but the third day was the day it finally came down to 10565. Anyways, I have had absolutely zero side effects on Lisinopril. I read all these bad reviews and I know everyone responds differently, but this one is a winner for me. On top of it all, my insurance copay was $1.60. lol. No complaints here. Thought I would share a GOOD experience, seeing people usually come here only when they have a bad one.

review: prescribed isinopril borderline high blood pressure. initially left feeling weak extremely lethargic sleepytired. back doc follow up, advise body adjusting getting used blood pressure normal range. blood pressure better, wow side effects good all. side effects heart palpitations, extreme fatigue, generally feeling unwell sick. flu like symptoms production phlegm, numbness tingling hands feet. discharge eyes lessened quality life day mark decided try cutting pills half, wean off. first day already starting feel better. coming off, days ive felt decent, still struggle withdrawal side effects. cough, nausea. ive changed diet better drink water. glad find message boards share info let others alone.
full_review: Prescribed isinopril for borderline High Blood Pressure 10mg. Initially left me feeling very weak and extremely lethargic and sleepytired.  Back to doc for follow up, they advise this was my body adjusting and getting used to blood pressure being in a normal range. Blood pressure better, but wow the side effects were not good at all.  Side effects were heart palpitations, extreme fatigue, generally feeling of being unwell and sick. Flu like symptoms and over production of phlegm, numbness and tingling in hands and feet. Discharge in my eyes and lessened my quality of life. At 25 day mark I decided to try cutting pills in half, to wean myself off.  The first day off I was already starting to feel better. After coming off, some days Ive felt decent, but still struggle with the withdrawal side effects.  The cough, and nausea.  Ive changed my diet for the better and only drink water. Glad to find message boards to share this info to let others they are not alone.

review: lowering blood pressure incredibly important side effects make feel awful stuff. causes allergic type reaction. constantly postnasal drip, dry cough, lungs feel bad. feel exhausted sick stuff. repeatable test. also, depletes zinc. allows strep bacteria grow, holes gut, among tons problems. telmistartan makes feel fantastic. never lisinoprol. feel like ive lost weeks life lousy feeling haze. annoyed takes long figure out.
full_review:
Lowering your blood pressure is incredibly important but the side effects make you feel so awful on this stuff.

It causes an allergic type reaction. I constantly have a postnasal drip, dry cough, lungs feel bad. I feel exhausted and sick on this stuff. And it is a very repeatable test.

Also, it depletes your zinc. Which allows strep bacteria to grow, holes in your gut, among tons of problems. 

Telmistartan makes me feel fantastic. Never again Lisinoprol. I feel like Ive lost 3 weeks of my life in a lousy feeling haze. So annoyed it takes me this long to figure it out.

review: worst experience ever. took lisinopril days. felt like dying. went emergency room bp. life never tested - nothing. normally stay lower that. never take shit again. thanks
full_review: Worst experience ever. Took 10mg lisinopril for 3 days. Felt like I was dying. Went to the emergency room and my bp was 190120. In my life I have never tested above 15095 - on nothing. Normally I stay lower than that. I will never take this shit again. Thanks

review: started lisinopril february months ago per day, one per day woke high bp. exactly three months day took first one woke nap incredibly dizzy. refilled meds day started new bottle morning. manufacturer. dizzy felt like room spinning laying made worse. waited passed two days later made appointment pcp. ct, mri, blood work, ekg, topamax, meloxicam, muscle relaxer, two different types vertigo diagnosis, came upon forum. symptoms dizziness, neck back tension, blood pressure dropping standing, tingling face arms, anxiety fatigue. since may. stopped lisinopril three days ago. i’m already feeling somewhat better. hope i’m back it’s system. don’t recommend it.
full_review: I started Lisinopril in February, so about 10 months ago. 20mg per day, one per day when I woke up for high BP. Exactly three months to the day of when I took the first one I woke up from a nap incredibly dizzy. I had just refilled my meds the day before so I started the new bottle that morning. Same manufacturer. I was so dizzy I felt like the room was spinning and laying down made it worse. I waited until it passed two days later and made an appointment with my PCP. After CT, MRI, blood work, EKG, topamax, meloxicam, a muscle relaxer, two different types of vertigo diagnosis, I came upon this forum. My symptoms were dizziness, neck and back tension, blood pressure dropping when standing, tingling in my face and arms, anxiety and fatigue. All of this since May. I stopped Lisinopril three days ago. I’m already feeling somewhat better. I just hope I’m back to myself once it’s all out of my system. I don’t recommend it.

review: ive taking lisinopril years manufactured lupin , sudden pill changed different manufacturer solco, blood pressure shot , lisinopril side effects different things good lupin .
full_review: Ive been taking lisinopril for 3 years manufactured by lupin , all the sudden pill changed and now a different manufacturer solco, my blood pressure shot to 165100 , not all lisinopril are the same side effects different things it has been good with lupin .

review: taken lisopril years . started. increased mg. last years lost hair, ed, cough head off, fell ladder work passed work damaged knee. started research drug came across site effects. never told doctor pharmacist. this? last two month drug free drugs gone ton ultra coq hypertrol control blood pressure plus diet change. fruits, veggies, nuts...
full_review:
I have been taken lisopril for about  10 years .  I started off with 20mg. The was increased to 40 mg.
These last few years I have lost a most all my hair, I have ED, I cough my head off, I fell off the ladder at work and I passed at work and damaged my knee.
So I started to do research on this drug and came across all these site effects.  That I was never told about from my doctor or pharmacist.  Why is this?
As of the last two month I am drug free of these drugs and I have gone on ton Ultra CoQ10 and Hypertrol to control my blood pressure plus a diet change. Fruits, veggies, nuts...

review: lisinopril medication month half helped blood pressure much. last doctors appointment. never low. however, soon started medicine horrible cough. went got tested covid, i’ve antibiotics chest x-rays urgent thought kind virus. finally went primary care right away knew lisinopril. would never put together. although helped blood pressure way cough like daily basis. really affected life. hard time taking care kids i’m exhausted coughing sleeping.
full_review: I have been on this lisinopril  medication about a month and a half and it has helped my blood pressure so much. At my last doctors appointment it was 11778. It has never been that low. However, as soon as I started the medicine I had a horrible cough. I went and got tested for covid, I’ve been on antibiotics and had chest X-rays because the urgent thought I had some kind of virus. I finally went into my primary care and right away they knew it was the Lisinopril. I would have never put the 2 together. Although it has helped my blood pressure there is no way I can cough like this on a daily basis. It has really affected my life. I have had a hard time taking care of my kids and I’m so exhausted from coughing and not sleeping.

review: started taking lisinopril mg lupin. blood pressure starting going crazy october steadily got worse. back doctor december. suggested check manufacturer drug. checked walgreens printouts manufacturer lisinopril taking. sure enough manufacturer changed september solco. reviews online discussed symptoms--on lupin bp fine changed solco blood pressure went up. back lisinopril lupin advised doctor notify walgreens. take solco again! rating based solco lupin.
full_review: Started taking Lisinopril 5 mg from Lupin in 2018. My blood pressure starting going crazy in October 2020 and steadily got worse. I was back at my doctor in December.  She suggested I check the manufacturer of the drug. I checked my Walgreens printouts for the manufacturer of the Lisinopril I was taking. Sure enough the manufacturer changed in September to Solco. There were some reviews online which discussed my symptoms--on Lupin bp fine and then changed to Solco and blood pressure went up.  I am back on Lisinopril by Lupin and was advised by my doctor to notify Walgreens.  Will not take Solco again!  The rating below is based on the Solco and not the Lupin.

review: doctor prescribed lisinopril high bp stubborn didnt take year. needless say, dr. happy finally convinced me. cautiously waited side effects occur noticeable ones ever did. bought bp monitor soon starting med. soon control. good luck everyone - med, hopefully another one use successfully.
full_review:
My Doctor prescribed Lisinopril for my high BP but I was stubborn and didnt take it for a year. Needless to say, my Dr. was not happy and finally convinced me. I cautiously waited for side effects to occur but no noticeable ones ever did.
I bought a BP monitor soon after starting the med. and it was soon under control. Good luck to everyone - if not with this med, hopefully with another one that they can use successfully.

review: lisinopril total months, constant disruptive cough, horrific sputum spitting. md said keep taking lisinopril. however chest x-ray months starting entirely negative. chest x-ray taken months lisinopril showed inflammation, scarring, nodules. took lisinopril coughing spitting stopped days. still left permanent lung scarring nodules need followup. doctors still say lisinopril. why?
full_review:
I was on LIsinopril for total of 6 months, with constant disruptive cough,  horrific sputum and spitting.  MD said keep taking it because it was not Lisinopril.  However a chest x-ray 3 months before starting it was entirely negative.  A chest x-ray taken after 6 months on Lisinopril showed inflammation, scarring, and nodules.
I took myself off Lisinopril and the coughing and spitting stopped after 4 days.  But I am still left with permanent lung scarring and nodules that need followup.  And doctors who still say it is not Lisinopril.  Why?

review: , female, bp doc said meds. chlorthalidone months apart mild dry cough okay felt weight gain might result despite diuretic. doc puts linospril. within days worse cough, joints started aching, back hips hurt reason, even worse, i’ve allergic reactions three times month eyes cheeks swell hurt burn (angiodema). couldn’t figure causing weird flares time took benadryl would subside day two. started researching causes “rapid, itching, burning face eye swelling” ace inhibitors like linospril first results popped up. one study said% patients taking reactions! know others issue. high rate anaphylaxis allergic reaction carefully considered apparently develop time, days, months years in.....
full_review:
47, female, my BP was 14590 so doc said meds.

Chlorthalidone for 5 months and apart from a mild dry cough I was okay but felt some weight gain might be a result despite being diuretic.

Doc puts me on linospril. Within days I had a worse cough, joints have started aching, back and hips hurt for no reason, and even worse, I’ve had allergic reactions three times in a month where my eyes and cheeks swell up and hurt and burn (angiodema). I couldn’t figure out what was causing these weird flares but each time I took Benadryl and it would subside in a day or two. I started researching causes of “rapid, itching, burning face and eye swelling” and ACE inhibitors like Linospril were some of the first results that popped up. One study said up to 30% of patients taking it have had reactions!

I know others they have no issue. But the high rate of anaphylaxis and allergic reaction should be carefully considered by all as apparently it can develop at any time, days, months or years in.....

review: years quality life deteriorated. began losing hair looked side effects found must one intolerant it. hacking cough, runny nose, voice hoarse, muscle cramps night, incontinence, lethargy, thin brittle fingernails, insomnia. stopped taking symptoms gone. seen doctors symptoms dismissed them.
full_review: I was on it for 2 years and the quality of my life deteriorated. When I began losing my hair I looked up the side effects of this and I found I must have been one who was very intolerant to it.  I had the hacking cough, runny nose, my voice was hoarse, muscle cramps at night,  incontinence, lethargy, thin brittle fingernails, and insomnia. I stopped taking it and all those symptoms are gone. I had seen doctors about these symptoms but they dismissed them.

review: worst ever. already another bp drug dr said still high. put lisinopril weeks ago. ok. week ago, went moms house -she yrs old, nurse forever currently adon nursing home. immediately said, linsiprol cough. folks yrs old, never coughed liked life. made cry, brought knees, etc. needless say. already starting dry cough, stop taking

A week ago, I went to my moms house -she is 70 yrs old, been a nurse forever and is currently an ADON at a nursing home. She immediately said, you have the linsiprol cough. Folks, I am 53 yrs old, I have never coughed liked this in my life. It has made me cry, brought me to my knees, etc. Needless to say. If you are already starting the dry cough, stop taking it

review: started lisinopril high blood didnt really lower blood pressure dr upped, less week cough keeping awake, began headaches, dizziness. didnt think side effects symptoms associated high blood pressure. got worse coughing, itchiness, pain stomach. decided look side effects thinking really sick. taken medication.
full_review: Started with lisinopril for high blood at 10mg didnt really lower my blood pressure so my Dr upped it to 20mg, was on it less than a week and a cough was keeping me awake,  then I began with headaches,  dizziness. I didnt think of side effects because some of these symptoms are associated with the high blood pressure.  I got worse with the coughing, itchiness,  pain in my stomach.  So I decided to look up side effects before thinking that I was really sick.  I have taken myself off the medication.

review: experience drug weeks horrific! brought blood pressure developed really horrible cough would go away! unlike coughs had. chest felt really tight & throat swollen! stopped immediately got better, it’s week & still coughing away! drug dangerous high blood pressure. switch homeopathic traditional medicine, slowly works won’t give horrible side effects...
full_review: My experience with this drug out of 3 weeks was horrific! It brought my blood pressure down but I developed a really horrible cough that would go away! It was unlike any other coughs I had. My chest felt really tight & my throat was swollen! After I stopped I immediately got better, it’s only been a week & still coughing away! This drug is more dangerous than having a high blood pressure. I now switch to homeopathic traditional medicine, it slowly works but it won’t give you any horrible side effects...

review: taking drug lisinopril years hbp. i’m now. blood pressure range waited year dr convinced try. side effects bp range now. nothing good things say.
full_review: Been taking this drug lisinopril @ 10mg for a few years now for HBP. I’m 58 now. Blood pressure was 14590 range and waited a year or so before Dr convinced me to try. No side effects and bp of 13075 range now. Nothing but good things to say.

review: works great lowering blood pressure generally made feel better. three weeks. side effects kicked in. started coughing hard saw stars would nearly pass - felt like hair stuck throat time. nose started running like faucet sinuses swelled, endless sneezing runny nose day night absolutely relentless. thought cold allergies wouldnt stop. stopped taking lisinopril. severe insomnia felt like constantly detoxing due inflammation. shame effective drug excellent benefits, suspect may due part awful generics forced take. cough stopped longer felt constantly ill days quitting. way could endure long term, really starting wreck me.
full_review: It works great for lowering blood pressure and generally made me feel better. For about three weeks. Then the side effects kicked in. I started coughing so hard that I saw stars and would nearly pass out - felt like there was hair stuck in my throat all the time. Then my nose started running like a faucet and my sinuses swelled, endless sneezing and runny nose day and night that was absolutely relentless. I thought it was a cold or allergies but it just wouldnt stop. Until I stopped taking lisinopril. I had severe insomnia and felt like I was constantly detoxing due to all the inflammation. Its a shame because this can be a very effective drug with excellent benefits, but I suspect it may be due in part to the awful generics were forced to take. The cough stopped and I no longer felt constantly ill about 2 days after quitting. No way I could endure it long term, it was really starting to wreck me.

review: ive lisinopril several years now. found significantly reduced bp doctors visit, happy while. ive stomach issues now, well cough didnt go away. nagging, constant. also dry patches skin forehead. decided research side effects since meds. research, stopped lisinopril own week, stomach feels better, cough gone, skin clearing up. also feel energetic feeling. ill take chances without it.
full_review: Ive been on 20mg of lisinopril for several years now. I found that it significantly reduced my BP at each doctors visit, so I was happy with that for a while. Ive had some stomach issues for a while now, as well as a cough that didnt go away. Just nagging, not constant. I also had dry patches of skin on my forehead. I decided to research the side effects since I was on no other meds. After my research, I stopped the lisinopril on my own. After about 1 week, my stomach feels better, my cough is gone, and my skin is clearing up. I also feel more energetic and not as down as I had been feeling. Ill take my chances without it.

review: using lisinopril year. initially dry coughing day night (not extreme kept awake night), enough thought allergy common cold reading information site found coughing common symptom drug. also blurred vision, cramps feet hands headaches too, including hour combined aerobics stretching exercises days per week symptoms reduced occasional headaches. taking pill plenty water food also reduced blurred vision. year lost. blood pressure cholesterol levels normal doctor recently lowered dosage.
full_review: I have been using Lisinopril 10mg for about a year. Initially I had dry coughing day and night (not to the extreme where it kept me awake at night), but enough that I thought I had an allergy or common cold and then after reading the information on this site I found that coughing is a common symptom with this drug. I also had blurred vision, cramps in my feet and hands and some headaches too, but after including an hour of combined aerobics and stretching exercises 3-4 days per week most of the symptoms are now reduced to the occasional headaches. Taking the pill with plenty of water and with food also reduced the blurred vision.  In a year I have lost about 35lbs. Blood pressure and cholesterol levels are normal and my doctor has recently lowered my dosage from 10 to 5mg.

review: ive taking lisinopril years. slight dry cough started, mostly gone. however, two years ago developed pain abdomen left side rib. would come go, always there. less constant two years. two years doctors ignored please help, one nurse practitioner said, want it. finally read angioedema small bowl causing pain. stopped taking lisinopril pain immediately went away days. lisinopril amlodipine never got bp consistently. wonder really worth it? living constant pain. also blame fact im medicaid believe get sub par health care. doctor never questioned possibility pain meds. standard line pain worth risk. dont think so.
full_review:
Ive been taking Lisinopril for 4 years. I did have a slight dry cough when I started, but its mostly gone. However, two years ago I developed a pain in my abdomen on the left side about 10th rib. It would come and go, but it was always there. Its been more less constant for two years. And for two years my doctors have ignored my please for help, and one nurse practitioner said, what do you want me to do about it. I finally read about angioedema of the small bowl causing pain. So I stopped taking the Lisinopril and the pain immediately went away after 3 days. While on Lisinopril and amlodipine I  never got my BP below 
13080 consistently. So I wonder if they are really worth it? Living in constant pain. I also blame the fact that Im on Medicaid and believe I get sub par health Care. My doctor never questioned the possibility that my pain was from the meds. His standard line was the pain you have is worth the risk. I dont think so.

review: ive mg lisinopril years. never developed cough nasal drip others had. joint pain would come go. lisinopril great controlling bp. im otherwise-healthy pound yo female bp diastolic would stay. typical bp. so, ive taken mg lisinopril years. but, im exhausted time, appetite, severe abdominal pain, constant nausea bloatingconstipation eat. im miserable (has like mo)!! whim, stopped lisinopril days ago. im exhausted anymore. appetite back. still pain nausea though.
full_review: Ive been on 5 mg of Lisinopril for over 2 years.  I never developed the cough or nasal drip that others have had.  I did have joint pain which would come and go.  Lisinopril is great at controlling my BP.  Im an otherwise-healthy 53 125 pound 47 yo female and my BP diastolic would not stay below 90.  Typical BP was 14098.  So, Ive taken 5 mg of Lisinopril for 2 years.  But, Im exhausted ALL the time, no appetite, severe abdominal pain, constant nausea and bloatingconstipation when I do eat.  Im miserable (has been like this for 6 mo)!! On a whim, I stopped the Lisinopril 3 days ago.  Im not exhausted anymore.  My appetite is back. Still have pain and nausea though.

review: dont even want give drug one star! started taking medication back june weeks still side effects day! whole life changed night. started heart palpitations, extreme dizziness, lost close lbs, hair lose, swollen nose, lip, eye, painspressure top back head, shortness breathe, blurred vision, weakness, nausea, pains stomach, night sweats, leg cramps, entire body felt shaky ( im pretty sure im missing things). numerous trips er different doctors basically told dont know whats wrong me. take advice take this.
full_review: I dont even want to give this drug one star! I started taking this medication back in June of 2016 for only about 3 weeks and I am still having side effects to this day! My whole life changed over night. I started having heart palpitations, extreme dizziness, I lost close to 30 lbs, hair lose, swollen nose, lip, and eye, painspressure in the top and back of head, shortness of breathe, blurred vision, weakness, nausea, pains in my stomach, night sweats, and leg cramps, entire body felt shaky ( and Im pretty sure Im missing some things). Numerous trips to the ER and 8 different doctors to basically be told they dont know whats wrong with me. Take my advice and do not take this.

review: take lisinopril day. saved life. bp regulated slowed hardening heart walls. med good ive experienced one side affect dizziness occasionally.
full_review: I take Lisinopril 20mg 2x a day. It has saved my life. My BP is now regulated and has slowed the hardening of my heart walls. This med is good for me and Ive only experienced one side affect dizziness occasionally.

review: doc put. developed seemed like sciatic nerve pain. every morning getting bed day pain left buttocks, thigh, calf & tingling foot. hour so, pain subsided & could pretty much wanted. also noticed easily fatigued & felt somewhat depressed. doc increased dose daily months. sciatic pain morning increased nearly unbearable. energy. ready see orthopedic dr checked line severe side effects lisinopril. stunned - joint, nerve & sciatic pain. hair loss, weight gain, depression, cough, fatigue & etc. stopped med. & feeling great.
full_review: Doc put me on 10mg.  I developed what seemed like sciatic nerve pain.  Every morning when getting out of bed for the day I had pain in my left buttocks, thigh, down my calf & tingling into my foot.  After being up for an hour or so, the pain subsided & I could pretty much do what I wanted.  I also noticed I was easily fatigued & felt somewhat depressed.  Doc increased the dose to 20mg daily after 6 months.  Then the sciatic pain in the morning increased to nearly unbearable. I had no energy.  I was ready to see an Orthopedic Dr when I checked on line for severe side effects of Lisinopril.  I was stunned - joint, nerve & sciatic pain.  Hair loss, weight gain, depression, cough, fatigue & etc.  I stopped the med. & now feeling great.

review: started taking lisinopril fine one day got refilled next week tired could barely get bed. told changed place pharmacy got meds probably meant different formula pills look different. requested name brand zestril even though expensive. felt% better! generic me!
full_review: I started taking Lisinopril and was fine then one day I got them refilled and for the next week I was so tired I could barely get out of bed. I was told they changed the place where the pharmacy got the meds which probably meant was a different formula because the pills look different. I requested name brand Zestril even though they were more expensive. I felt 100% better! No more generic for me!

review: blood pressure. doctor want prescribe altace worked past. prescription gave lisinopril hydrochlorothiazide. blood pressure reduced. blood pressure fluctuate sometimes. become dizzy. experiencing extreme muscle fatigue especially shoulders, neck, arms jaw muscles along tongue. eating jaws become quite cramped. heart rate jumps times. find needing take large breaths times. physical exertion brings dizziness fatigue within hour so.
full_review: My blood pressure was 150s100s. My doctor did not want to prescribe Altace which worked in the past. The prescription he gave me was 20mg Lisinopril with 12.5mg of hydrochlorothiazide. My blood pressure has reduced to 120s80s. My blood pressure does fluctuate sometimes to 9070. I then become very dizzy. I have been experiencing extreme muscle fatigue especially in my shoulders, neck, arms and jaw muscles along with the tongue. When eating my jaws become quite cramped. My heart rate jumps up to about 130 at times. I find myself needing to take large breaths at times. Any physical exertion brings dizziness and fatigue within an hour or so.

review: took lisinopril two days. woke first day taking right eye swollen. second day taking woke swollen eye . also developed tingly sensation forearms, hands feet. experienced numbness fingers pain wrists. felt drank bunch caffeine -- heart racing felt nervous. called doctor said didnt think lisinopril told new thing happening. ive stopped . pharmacist said take hours two pills system.
full_review: Took lisinopril for two days.  Woke up after first day of taking it and my right eye was swollen. After second day of taking it woke again to swollen eye . Also developed tingly sensation in my forearms, hands and feet. Experienced numbness in my fingers and pain in my wrists. Felt as if I drank a bunch of caffeine -- heart was racing and felt very nervous. Called my doctor who said he didnt think it was the lisinopril but I told him it was the only new thing happening. Ive just stopped . Pharmacist said it will take 48 hours for the two pills to be out of my system.

review: medicine horrible. immediately gave neck, back shoulder tightness discomfort. couldnt breathe fully it, unable exercise like normal. worse, lower bp. fact, seemed reverse affect. got week. hear others well drug, surely work me.
full_review: This medicine was horrible.  It immediately gave me neck, back and shoulder tightness and discomfort.  I couldnt breathe fully on it, so I was unable to exercise like normal.  And worse, it did not lower my BP.  In fact, it seemed to have the reverse affect.  I got off this in a week.  I hear others do well on this drug, but it surely did not work for me.

review: im hispanic male, started lisinopril seven days ago, blood pressure starting medicines, last couple days last night blacked fell ground, wife says shook falling, told passing didnt feel well. paramedics think bottomed tell doctor hell probably change. scary, thought saw white light, im losing weight too, maybe fast. anyway im hoping hell let take let try lifestyle changes.

review: taking mg lisinopril bp months trying others gave terrible back pain. back pain lisinopril bearable, dry cough runny nose become intolerable days ago, started taking teaspoons organic apple cider vinegar (with mother included) lukewarm water morning, seems eliminate lot phlegm lungs, thus less coughing hacking. keeps working, continue lisinopril, otherwise try medication. nitric oxide produced pill irritates lungs, apparently. wish pharmaceutical companies would take consideration.
full_review: I have been taking 10 mg lisinopril for BP for a few months after trying a few others which gave me terrible back pain. My back pain  on lisinopril is  bearable, but the dry cough and runny nose have become intolerable. 3 days ago, I started taking 3 teaspoons of organic Apple cider vinegar (with the Mother included) with lukewarm water in the morning, and it seems to eliminate a lot of the phlegm in my lungs, thus less coughing and hacking. If this keeps on working, will continue with lisinopril, otherwise I will have to try some other medication. Its the nitric oxide produced by this pill that irritates the lungs, apparently. I wish the pharmaceutical companies would take this into consideration.

review: lower blood pressure, sometimes much. beware side effects - medication almost two years developed fast heart beat, chest pains, shortness breath, depression, dizziness upon standing simply working desk, stomach pains, bad heartburn. dry cough pretty annoying, too days side effects gone.
full_review: It does lower the blood pressure, sometimes too much. But beware of the side effects - after being on the medication for almost two years I developed fast heart beat, chest pains, shortness of breath, depression, dizziness not upon standing up but simply while working at my desk, stomach pains, bad heartburn. The dry cough was pretty annoying, too. Been off of it for 5 days and most of the side effects are gone.

review: started taking medication giving birth baby mos ago. works wonderful blood pressure, feel aweful. feel dizzy, light headed times, aches pains left arm pain chest pain thought heart attack. numbness tingling extremities. im mg need change dont feel good side effects.
full_review: Started taking this medication after giving birth to my baby 7 mos ago. It works wonderful on my blood pressure 201170 to 11685, but I feel aweful. I feel dizzy, light headed at times, aches and pains left arm pain and chest pain I thought I was having a heart attack. Now I have numbness and tingling to my extremities. Im only on 10 mg but I need a change I dont feel good with all these side effects.

review: year old female new world high blood pressure. runner, healthy eater, maintain good weight- father high blood pressure. er visit high blood pressure episode tachycardia- told see cardiologist. bp remained month put lisinopril. paranoid side effects- taken per day last week. bp pretty stable. side effects minimal coughing. fatigue dizziness.
full_review: I am a 36 year old female new to the world of high blood pressure. I am a runner, healthy eater, and maintain a good weight- but my father has high blood pressure. After an ER visit with high blood pressure and an episode of tachycardia- I was told to see a cardiologist.  My BP remained at 145100 for about a month so he put me on lisinopril 10mg. Being paranoid about the side effects- I have only taken 5mg per day for the last week. My BP is pretty stable at about 11785. Side effects minimal coughing. Fatigue and dizziness.

review: made feel tired, depressed, lower blood pressure. took whilst worked getting blood pressure exercise diet. couple months bursting life again! still, job well.
full_review: Made me feel tired, depressed, but did lower my blood pressure. I only took it whilst I worked on getting my blood pressure down with exercise and diet. I have been off of it for a couple of months now and am bursting into life again! Still, it did its job well.

review: painful muscle joint problems medication. searing pain elbows, wrists, knees, etc. never taking medication. husband also pill experiencing problems.
full_review: Very painful muscle and joint problems from this medication.  Searing pain in elbows, wrists, knees, etc. Never had this before taking this medication. My  husband is also on this pill and is experiencing some of the same problems.

review: lisinopril effective reducing blood pressure. careful stay hydrated avoid lightheadedness standing up. fibromyalgia muscle aches pains attributed muscles aches that. missed days med felt pretty good - blood pressure fine. know meds stay bodies days, wasnt concerned. took med next day realized awful muscle pain back. tried times make sure wasnt coincidence. lisinopril causing extreme muscle aches. lisinopril me!
full_review: Lisinopril is very effective at reducing my blood pressure. I have to be careful to stay hydrated to avoid the lightheadedness when standing up. I have fibromyalgia and have muscle aches and pains and attributed the muscles aches to that. I missed 2 days of the med and felt pretty good - blood pressure was fine. I know meds stay in our bodies for a few days, so I wasnt concerned. I took the med the next day and realized the awful muscle pain was back.   I tried this 2 more times to make sure it wasnt a coincidence.  The Lisinopril is causing the extreme muscle aches. No more Lisinopril for me!

review: iam year old woman taking lisiniprol years side effects getting worse, asked doctor get medication blood pressure. severe leg cramping night, skin seems show every vein due lisiniprol sucking life me. work day, couldnt wait get bed end day totally exhausted. would wake middle night dry cough limiting sleep feeling like sleep all. living life meant be. change eating habits exercise. would rather live everyday meant be-- barely existing.
full_review: Iam a 57 year old woman and I have been taking lisiniprol 20mg for a few years now and the side effects are getting worse, I just asked my doctor to get me off this medication for my blood pressure. I had severe leg cramping at night, my skin seems to show every vein due to lisiniprol sucking the life out of me. I work all day, I couldnt wait to get into my bed at the end of the day I was totally exhausted. I would wake up in the middle of the night with a dry cough limiting my sleep and feeling like I did not sleep at all. This is not living life as it was meant to be. I will change my eating habits and exercise. I would rather live everyday as it was meant to be-- than BARELY  existing.

review: taking meal full glass water months. blood pressure (bp) gone body weight gone. surprised taking medication losing months enough bring bp normal. first muscle cramps legs, feet hands, adding minutes walking minutes stretching days week, problems tolerable level, feel much energetic too. rainy season, check exercise dvds baby boomers library keep exercise regimen. doctor says lose another lower dosage incentive enough add modest diet regimen. havent felt good years.
full_review: Have been taking 10mg with a meal and a full glass of water for 13 months.  Blood pressure (BP) has gone from 18095 to 11878 and body weight has gone from 200lbs to 170lbs. I was surprised that taking this medication and losing 30lbs after 13 months was enough to bring my BP to normal.  At first I had muscle cramps in legs, feet and hands, but after adding 45 minutes of walking and 15 minutes of stretching 4 days a week, most of the problems are at a tolerable level, and I feel much more energetic too.  During the rainy season, I check out exercise DVDs for Baby Boomers from the library to keep up my exercise regimen. Doctor says if I lose another 20lbs he can lower the dosage which is incentive enough for me to add a modest diet to my regimen. I havent felt this good in years.

review: using lisinopril mg years. one doctor increased mg added hztz. stomach pain dizzy bent over. went new dr told symptoms. switched back mg dropped hztz. symptoms went away bp stays range. sometimes little higher sometimes lower always borderline never danger zone. works me.
full_review: Have been using Lisinopril 10 mg for 30 years.  One doctor increased it to 20 mg and added HZTZ.  Stomach pain and dizzy if I bent over.  Went to new Dr and told him my symptoms. He switched me back to 10 mg and dropped the HZTZ. Symptoms went away and BP stays in the 13070 range. Sometimes a little higher and sometimes lower. I am 70 and have always been borderline but never in the danger zone. It works for me.

review: lisinopril me, began feeling pain back legs day. bp actually went suppose treating. cough day. stopped day days later felt normal
full_review: Lisinopril is not for me, I began feeling pain in my back and legs day 3. My BP actually went up which is what is was suppose to be treating. Had cough on day 4. Stopped on day 5.  2 days later felt normal again

review: lisinopril years dose caused dry cough numbness fingers started heart bounding mid morning feeling exhaustion meal. started morning night seemed worked side effects less severe. doctor refused give twice day insisted day. still dont agree since working followed prescription. bp still high. say half life medication hours doesnt seem like end hrs bp high. another thing noticed time get new refill drug gives trouble bp high. think different manufacturers produce different drug. times works times dont. get refills kaiser import drugs different countries based price per pharmacist kaiser
full_review: Been on lisinopril for 5 years. My 10mg dose caused dry cough and numbness of fingers for a while then I started having heart bounding mid morning and feeling of exhaustion after a meal. I started 10mg morning and 10mg at night and that seemed to have worked with side effects less severe. My doctor refused to give me 10mg twice a day and insisted on 20mg once a day. I still dont agree with him since it was working for me so I followed his prescription. BP still high. They say half life of medication is 12 hours but it doesnt seem like it because at end of 24 hrs my BP is high. Another thing I noticed is most of time when I get new refill the drug gives me trouble and BP is high. I think the different manufacturers produce a different drug. Some times it works and some times it dont. I get refills at Kaiser who import the drugs from different countries based on price as per the pharmacist at kaiser

review: med months good job lowering blood pressure average however side effect lightheaded annoying. started reduced. changed diet vegan, oil months. also runwalk miles everyday. im years old dont want take blood pressure medicines. im staying strict diet exercise.
full_review: I was on this med for 2 months and it did a very good job lowering my blood pressure from an average of 156102 down to 11565 however the side effect of being lightheaded was annoying. I started on 20mg and reduced to 10mg. Changed my diet to vegan, no oil and was off this in 2 months. Also runwalk a few miles everyday. Im 48 years old and dont want to take blood pressure medicines. Im staying on a strict diet and exercise.

review: medication worked wonderfully me, side effects initially weeks ended er severe vomiting small bowel inflammation. quick internet search turned article lisinopril induced inflammation gastrointestinal tract. stopped one week restarted mg day dose. two weeks later terrible upper gi esophageal pain resolved stopped medication. doctor seemed bit skeptical medication causing gi symptoms, given documented reports side effects stopped taking relapse symptoms. suspect people suffering painful symptoms without realizing attributed medication.
full_review: This medication worked wonderfully for me, with no side effects initially. After 2 weeks I ended up in the ER for severe vomiting and small bowel inflammation. A quick internet search turned up an article on Lisinopril induced inflammation of the gastrointestinal tract. I stopped for one week then restarted a 5 mg day dose. Two weeks later I had terrible upper GI esophageal pain that resolved when I stopped the medication. My doctor seemed a bit skeptical that the medication was causing GI symptoms, but given the documented reports of these side effects I stopped taking it and have not had a relapse of symptoms. I suspect some people are suffering painful symptoms without realizing they can be attributed to the medication.

review: ive taking lisinopril almost year, brought blood pressure, dry cough wont go away. dont feel pressure low research decided stop medication. theres article call worst blood pressure drugs goes explains effect meds suggest look article take lisinopril.
full_review: Ive been taking lisinopril for almost a year, it brought my blood pressure down to 80s over 50s, the dry cough wont go away. I dont feel that my pressure should be this low so after doing some research on my own I have decided to stop this medication. Theres an article call 4 worst blood pressure drugs that goes through and explains the effect of these meds I suggest that you look up this article if you take lisinopril.

review: stuff pure poison plain simple anybody trying portray medication jailed. hadnt doctor years v.a. insisted bp high couldnt put database unless took bp medication. day one, immediately fell cliff side effects daily doses deadly poisons. doctor,ha! says keep taking youll get used it weeks go and, continue complain doctor continues say keep taking youll get used it! well weeks lost. solid muscle, also every side effect hidden literature listed no-one bothered tell !
full_review: This stuff is pure poison plain and simple and anybody trying to portray this as a medication should be jailed. I hadnt been to a doctor in 44 years when the V.A. insisted that my BP was so high they couldnt put me into their database unless I took a BP medication. review: taking years. second ever bp medicine ever put since diagnosis. really lucky this. cough me, read long term side effects, arent anywhere near scary everything else take. interactions minimal favorable me. high bp mystery run either side family. still taking dosage mgday due extreme unavoidable stress life.
full_review: I have been taking it for 12 years. It was the second ever BP medicine I was ever put on since my diagnosis in 2000. I really have been lucky with this. No cough for me, and when you read the long term side effects, they arent anywhere near as scary as most everything else you can take. And the interactions are all minimal and favorable for me. My High BP is a mystery as it does not run on either side of my family. Still taking it but had to up the dosage to 40 mgday due to extreme unavoidable stress in my life.

review: taking medication (lisinopril couple years now. started day year. blood pressure didn’t go safe level doctor wanted dosage increased day. adverse side effect light headedness experience standing. i’ve got toddler constantly remember take slow. come close passing several times. side effects noted.
full_review: Have been taking this medication (lisinopril for a couple years now. Started at 20mg a day for a year. Blood pressure didn’t go down to as safe a level as the doctor wanted so dosage was increased to 40mg a day. The only adverse side effect is the light headedness I experience when standing. I’ve got a toddler so I am up and down constantly and have to remember to take it slow. Have come very close to passing out several times. But no other side effects have been noted.

review: developed dry cough month lisinopril progressed next months point vomiting soon cough. one mentioned aware side effect dry cough everyone talk knows someone happened to.
full_review: Developed the dry cough after a month  on lisinopril and it progressed for the next 2 months to the point I am vomiting as soon as I cough. No one mentioned to me to be aware of the side effect of the dry cough Now everyone I talk to knows someone that this has happened to.

review: took medicine months. side effects got bad finally stopped taking switched old medicine. headaches never went away, muscle spasm legs arms bad could barely lift arms. extreme fatigue would set hours taking, facial flushing always getting comments sunburned. scary memory loss, couldnt recall details everyday things, muscle twitches thigh. three days feel better already. memory coming back twitches thigh gone. didnt need nap today either. seems symptoms get worse time least me.
full_review: Took this medicine for over 6 months. Side effects got bad finally stopped taking it and switched to old Medicine. Had headaches that never went away, muscle spasm in legs and arms so bad could barely lift my arms. Extreme fatigue would set in 1 - 2 hours after taking, facial flushing always getting comments about being sunburned.  Most scary was the memory loss, couldnt recall details on everyday things, and muscle twitches in thigh. Been off of this for only three days and feel better already.  Memory is coming back and twitches in thigh are gone. Didnt have the need for a nap today either.  It seems as if these symptoms get worse over time at least for me.

full_review: I have been on and off of this for several months.  I wasnt good about taking it.  Now, I started again and immediately I started feeling edgy and nervous.  Almost feels like it is raising my blood pressure instead of lowering it.

review: lisinopril yrs now. controls blood pressure. felt dead since started taking it. kills love life, im even interested. always tired. always sick. always cough. thanks fluid pill mix pee every single time cough. never feel clean. always buy pads. know meds get sick feeling way stop taking them. feel like new person. strong, happy, loving life, lets play, clean, brand new.... check bp soaring towards past. doctor knows it, makes effort care, time stop nonsense.
full_review: I have been on lisinopril 2025 for about 6 to 9 yrs now. It controls my blood pressure. But I have felt dead since I started taking it. It kills my love life, Im not even interested. I am always tired. I am always sick. I always have a cough. Thanks to the fluid pill mix I pee every single time I cough. I never feel clean. I always have to buy pads. I know its the meds because once in a while I will get sick of feeling this way and just stop taking them. I feel like a new person. So strong, so happy, loving life, lets play, clean, and brand new.... But I will check my BP and it will be soaring towards or past 200160. My doctor knows about all of it, makes no effort to care, but Its time to stop all this nonsense.

full_review: I recently switched from Atenolol to Lisinopril and I feel much better.  No more dizziness and my BP is great 12078.  The only thing is that after a few weeks I developed a dry cough.  Its just been a few days but I might contact my doctor about it soon.  I thought it was allergies but now I think its the lisinopril.

review: cardizem since yrs old okay last years. started stomach problems... doctor switched zestril (linsinopril) beginning december. couple weeks lowered bp. side effects horrible.. cough constantly, itchy, chest pains, already joint problems made joints lot worse, constantly feel nauseous now. feel like im shivering time. insomnia horrible, anxiety thru roof, feel like im going pass out, vision gets blurry, depressed feeling. honestly feel like medicine taken high blood pressure
full_review:
I was on cardizem since I was 15 yrs old it was okay up until the last 2 years. I started having stomach problems... So my doctor switched me to 
Zestril (linsinopril) at the beginning of December. I have only been on it a couple of weeks and it has lowered my BP. But the side effects are horrible.. I cough constantly, itchy, chest pains,  I already have joint problems and it has made my joints a lot worse, I constantly feel nauseous now. I feel like Im shivering all the time. My insomnia is horrible, Anxiety is thru the roof, I feel like Im going to pass out, my vision gets blurry,  depressed feeling. I honestly feel like this medicine has taken more from me than the high blood pressure

review: ive taking lisinopril years now. went get tooth pulled one day. dentist assistant take blood pressure prior. got asked bunch questions, given meds sent see doctor. started lisinopril. following week mg amlodopine added. following week went. eventually lisinopril amlodopine. ive taking lisinopril two years now. year ago doctor took amlodopine. since first starting meds ive also lost pounds (not meds). fruition. must say aside initial weeks cough, experience pretty good. maintain bp actually thinking asking doctor reduce dose.
full_review: Ive been taking Lisinopril 4 years now. Went to get a tooth pulled one day. The dentist had his assistant take my blood pressure prior. It was 230140. I got asked a bunch of questions, given meds and sent to see a doctor. Started with 5mg of Lisinopril. The following week 5 mg of amlodopine was added. The following week it went to 10 and 5. Eventually it was at 20mg Lisinopril and 10mg amlodopine. Ive been taking the 20mg Lisinopril for over two years now. A year ago my doctor took me off of the amlodopine. Since first starting meds Ive also lost 60 pounds (not because of the meds). But of my own fruition. I must say aside from the initial 2 weeks of cough, my experience has been pretty good. I maintain a 11970 bp and am actually thinking of asking my doctor to reduce my dose to 10mg.

review: taking lisinopril months lot bowel movements. also arms hands legs going numb. blurred vision, back pain sciatica month. mri done shows fluid discs low causing back left leg numb pain. bed month now. believe dehydrated pill stopping see get better
full_review: Been taking lisinopril for 5 months and been having a lot of bowel movements. Also my arms and hands and legs going numb. Blurred vision, back pain and now sciatica for over a month. Had an MRI done and it shows the fluid in between the discs is low causing my back and left leg to be numb and in pain. Been in bed from this for a month now. I believe I am very dehydrated from the pill so I am stopping it to see if I get better

review: using lisinopril several years starting currently. treated marginal high blood pressure family history hbp physical weeks ago bp. blood tests well within limits side effects. never smoked, exercise times per week, average drinks per day live fairly normal life.
full_review: I have been using Lisinopril for several years starting at 5mg and currently at 10mg.  I was being treated for marginal High Blood Pressure and have a family history of HBP.  I am now 71 and had my physical 3 weeks ago and my BP was 12171. My blood tests are well within limits and I have had no side effects.  I have never smoked, exercise 3 to 4 times per week, average 2 to 3 drinks per day and live a fairly normal life.

review: worked effectively lo lower bp, within short time starting lisinopril, developed lisinopril cough, irritating syndrome results hacking cough day, night, sleep. discontinued medication due (highly known) side effect.
full_review: Worked effectively lo lower bp, but within a short time after starting the lisinopril, I developed the lisinopril cough, an irritating syndrome that results in hacking cough day, night, and in my sleep. Discontinued this medication due to that (highly known) side effect.

review: put lisinopril high blood pressure discovered went urgent care clinic bug bite reaction. bp clinic day. never told high bp life! i’m. never health issues kind don’t bother doctors decided maybe better get primary care physician this. well went primary first time, bp much lower clinic. suspect bug bite something that. doctor wanted lower put lisinopril mgs. took days straight. got dry cough everyone talks about, big concern blurry vision experienced taking it days! one day taking bp shot! one day.
full_review: I was put on lisinopril for high blood pressure that was just discovered when I went to an urgent care clinic for a bug bite reaction.  BP at the clinic that day was 167101. I was never told I had high bp before in my life! I’m 73.  Never had health issues of any kind and don’t bother with doctors but decided maybe I better get a primary care physician for this. Well when I went to the primary for the first time,  my bp was 14684  much lower than the clinic. I suspect the bug bite had something to do with that. But the doctor wanted it lower and she put me on lisinopril 5 mgs.   I took it for 5 days straight.  I got the dry cough everyone talks about, but my big concern is the blurry vision I experienced while taking it. Just 5 days! And in just one day of not taking it my bp shot up from 11074 to 172100!  In just one day.

review: although drug successfully lowered blood pressure, experienced cough continued get worse. slight nuisance cough doctor suggested might happen. constant cough. (i met people problem.) stopped taking lisinopril question doctor it.
full_review: Although this drug has successfully lowered my blood pressure, I have experienced a cough that has continued to get worse.  This is not just a slight nuisance cough that the doctor suggested might happen.  This is a constant cough.  (I have met 2 other people with this same problem.)  I have stopped taking Lisinopril and will question my doctor about it.

review: drug days now. high blood pressure several years kept getting higher higher. doc started last appointment. within first day taking bp. surprising thing energy first day taken this. feel much better. side effects yet. cough, dizzy one time stood hasnt happened again. hope continues life saver drop pounds hopefully get completely.
full_review: Been on this drug for 5 days now. Have had high blood pressure for several years and it kept getting higher and higher. Doc started me on 10mg when I was 178100 at last appointment. Within the first day of taking it my BP has been just under 12080. The very surprising thing is I have more energy from the first day I have taken this. I feel so much better. No side effects yet. No cough, was dizzy one time when I stood up but it hasnt happened again. I hope this continues to be a life saver for me until I can drop about 50 pounds and hopefully get off if it completely.

review: started taking lisinopril years valsartan....for migraine prevention high blood pressure mg night bed. works well bp. side effects: slightly higher tendency coughtickling throat. *vivid dreams - doubt - much vivid memorable dreams. *migraines - migraine sufferer much life. didnt know lisinopril used migraine prevention well month commenting wife migraines suddenly stopped. feature alone, aside blood pressure reduction, would worth taking medicine.
full_review: Started taking Lisinopril after 10 years of Valsartan....for migraine prevention and high blood pressure. 10 MG once at night before bed. Works well for BP.  Side Effects: A slightly higher tendency to coughtickling in the throat. *Vivid dreams - No doubt about it - much more vivid and memorable dreams. *Migraines - I have been a migraine sufferer for much of my life. I didnt know that Lisinopril was used for migraine prevention until after being on the it for well over a month and commenting to my wife that my migraines had suddenly stopped. That feature alone, aside from blood pressure reduction, would be worth taking this medicine.

review: year old male historically high blood pressure. averaging high low. medication weeks blood pressure averaging side effects all. hope continues.
full_review: I am a 57 year old male with historically high blood pressure. I was averaging 140 - 150 over high 90s to low 100s.  I have been on the medication for about 3 weeks and my blood pressure is averaging 120s over 80s with no side effects at all. I hope this continues.

review: six months taking lisinopril), gained weight, hair loss constant fatigue. brought blood pressure, im tired side effects! mention constant dry cough soreness mouth.
full_review: After six months of taking lisinopril (5mg), I have gained weight, had hair loss and have had constant fatigue.  It has brought my blood pressure down to 12070, but Im tired of all the side effects! Not to mention the constant dry cough and soreness in my mouth.

review: take drug. causes excess mucus coughing point vomiting. also causes terrible stomach pain. took year kept blaming increased sinus mucus allergies, milk products etc. day stopped drug symptoms stopped well. really doctors never prescribe drug! also damage liver pancreas. best deal high blood pressure naturally suffer considerable side effects drugs doctors prescribe. get kick backs lobster dinners drug reps push medication. never take medication without first trying alter life style diet.. see holistic doctor first

review: started taking lisinopril months ago. lower bp stop immediately due getting eye condition called episcleritis. eyes burned, itched, watered, became severely red woke crusty eyes. pain became much bear. stopped medication better days. rare side effect wanted share experience.
full_review: I started taking Lisinopril 2 months ago. It did lower my BP but I had to stop immediately due to getting an eye condition called episcleritis. My eyes burned, itched, watered, and became severely red and I woke up with crusty eyes. The pain became too much to bear. I stopped the medication and they were all better in 2 days. This is a very rare side effect but I wanted to share my experience.

review: ive taking lisinopril one week feel times better since controlled high blood pressure zero side effects. sensitive medicines side effects. lisonopril also allows continue taking allergy shots (as opposed beta blocker taken before).
full_review: Ive been taking 5mg of Lisinopril for one week now and feel 1000 times better since it has controlled my high blood pressure with zero side effects. I am very sensitive to medicines and their side effects. The lisonopril also allows me to continue taking allergy shots (as opposed to the beta blocker I had taken before).

review: recently diagnosed stage) put lisinopril. reading many horror stories, hesitant start taking going consult doctor alternatives trying. lieu talking doctor alternatives, decided take days start dosage see would make feel. day, little foggy fatigue bp results seen within hour starting) taking two weeks side effects. beyond taking drug lifestyle changes, happy results. working towards getting stuff within months weight loss life changes.
full_review: Recently diagnosed stage 1(14292) and was put on 10mg of lisinopril. After reading the many horror stories, I was hesitant to start taking it and was going to consult the doctor about alternatives before trying. In lieu of talking with the doctor about alternatives, I decided to take a few days off and start the 10mg dosage to see how it would make me feel.  Day 1 and 2, I was a little foggy and had some fatigue but the BP results were seen within 1 hour of starting (12070) and have been taking now for two weeks with no more side effects.  Beyond now taking the drug and a few lifestyle changes, I am very happy with the results. Working towards getting off this stuff within 6 months with weight loss and life changes. 51male.

review: female age - issued high blood pressure taken around weeks worst felt night hosp palpitations irregular heartbeat, several doctors appt later taken medicine dr realized side affects making ill ! ( dry mouth, irregular heartbeat, palpitations, dizziness horrible cough, bloated tummy day stopping feel better cough clearing, tummy better! wished researched medicine before! ditch !
