review: doc put stuff last week, first afternoon took it, spaced out, walking around fog, hated it. thought would take bed, fog would lest slept. wrong! took around pm, went bed, fell asleep ok, then... woke am, pounding heart, mild chest pain. awake am, slept maybe hour, get day. didnt take next night, decided take next day afternoon. well, am, feeling like garbage, reading bad reviews. going take anymore it. thanks shared.
full_review:
My doc just put me on this stuff last week, the first afternoon I took it, I was just so spaced out, and walking around in a fog, I hated it. I thought I would take it before bed, so the fog would at lest be while I slept. WRONG! Took it around 10:00 PM, went to bed at about 11:30, fell asleep ok, THEN... woke up at 1:00 AM, with pounding heart, and mild chest pain. Was awake until 5:00 AM, slept maybe an hour, then had to get up for my day. 
didnt take it the next night, and decided to take the next day in the afternoon. Well, here I am, feeling like garbage, and reading all the bad reviews. Not going to take anymore of it. Thanks to all who shared.

review: lisinopril awful, couldnt deal cough. prescribed it, doctor said ... “oh, might get little cough.” proceeded start!!!! little cough. repeated coughing spasms throughout day, haven’t slept even remotely well months. stopped taking days ago couldn’t deal coughing lack sleep more. bp acceptable, cannot shake awful cough. couldn’t tell many cough drops i’ve consumed, many bottles cough syrup i’ve gone through.
full_review: Lisinopril is awful, I just couldnt deal with the cough. When she prescribed it, my doctor said ... “Oh, you might get a little cough.” She then proceeded to START me on 40mg!!!! This is NOT a little cough. Repeated coughing spasms throughout the day, haven’t slept even remotely well in months. I stopped taking it 10 days ago because I couldn’t deal with the coughing and lack of sleep any more. My BP is acceptable, but I cannot shake this awful cough. I couldn’t tell you how many cough drops I’ve consumed, and how many bottles of cough syrup I’ve gone through.

review: drug keeps blood pressure control nose either drips stuffy. annoying. also, experienced hair loss. hair gotten thin since medication.
full_review: This drug keeps my blood pressure under control but my nose either drips or is stuffy. It is very annoying. Also, I have experienced hair loss. My hair has gotten very thin since I have been on this medication.

review: horrible experience. high blood pressure using atenolol years. lost health coverage go clinic prescribed lisinopril. took one dose heart started beating fast trouble sitting still. became anxious nervous heart rate crazy. stopped taking right away still took days get system. scary.
full_review: I had a horrible experience. I have high blood pressure and I had been using atenolol for years. I lost my health coverage and had to go to a clinic and was prescribed Lisinopril. I took one dose and my heart started beating so fast and I had trouble sitting still. I became very anxious and nervous and my heart rate was crazy. I stopped taking it right away but it still took about 4 days to get out of my system. It was very scary.

review: treated hight blood pressure (hbp yr diuretics. last years also treated moderate aortic stenosis. wan’t past november exercise heart catherization cardiologist determined bp points higher inside heart. running arm monitor. cardiologist prescribed lisinipril mg. got second opinion cardiologist increased lisinipril mg instructed add mg night bp. immediately started dry cough especially night, troubles keeping, stomach problems sore joints. appointment new cardiologist coming set stop medication. bp still all, place- one day next! done.
full_review:
I have been treated for hight blood pressure (HBP) for 25 yr with diuretics.  Over the last 10 years I have also been treated for moderate aortic stenosis.  It wan’t until this past November after an exercise heart catherization  that the cardiologist determined my BP was 20 points higher inside my heart.  I was running 14090 with an arm monitor.  My cardiologist prescribed lisinipril  5 mg.
I got a second opinion and this cardiologist increased the lisinipril to 10 mg and I was instructed to add 5 mg at night if my BP was over 14090.  I immediately started a dry cough especially night, have had troubles keeping, stomach problems and very very sore joints. I have an appointment with my new cardiologist coming up and am set to stop this medication.  My BP is still all, over the place- one day 10570 and the next 14979!  Done.

review: ive used lisinopril weeks. bp didnt go much, main problem side effects. horrendous coughing episodes, nasty bitter taste mouth ringing ears. connect med nothing else accountable since started taking along research done it. told doctor days ago take longer changed bp meds another brand. getting new one within next days totally lisinopril.
full_review: Ive used the Lisinopril for about 3-4 weeks.  My BP didnt go down much, but the main problem was the side effects.  Horrendous coughing episodes, nasty bitter taste in my mouth and ringing in the ears.  I connect all of these to this med because nothing else can be accountable since I started taking it along with the research I have done on it.  I told my doctor just 2 days ago that I will not take it any longer and she changed my BP meds to another brand.  Will be getting the new one within the next 2 days but I am totally off of the Lisinopril.

review: week joint pain, back pain, confusion, mood swings, loss vision, panic attacks, body sensations. doctor asked describe exactly wanted medicine: best way describe is.. like im taking poison. joke. beware.
full_review:
In 1 week I had Joint pain, back pain, confusion, mood swings, loss of vision, panic attacks, out of body sensations.

Doctor asked me to describe exactly why I wanted off of this medicine:  Best way I can describe it is.. its like Im taking poison.

No joke.  Beware.

review: yes, lower bp. also makes tired, dizzy bending extremely exhausted exerting energy. supposed improve diastolic condition even run mile without wanting pass out.....i hate drug! someone function heart rate? seriously!
full_review: Yes, this will lower your BP. It also makes me very tired, dizzy when bending over and extremely exhausted when exerting energy. How am I supposed to improve my diastolic condition if I can even run for a mile without wanting to pass out.....I hate this drug! How can someone function with a heart rate of 90 65? Seriously!

review: ive taking mg lisinopril blood pressure daily years & ok. lupin reformulated process & made pill smaller. started taking reformulated pills, noticed severe fatigue & falling asleep every meal. stared feeling depressed & finally severe heart pounding & arrhythmia within hour taking it. scared stopped. within days longer fatigued, brighter outlook & heart arrhythmia pounding. whatever lupin reformulation took proper functioning medication & made dangerous use. reading blogs, im one suffered thru adverse reaction luipns reformulation lisinopril refusing take medication manufactured lupin...
full_review:
Ive been taking 10 mg lisinopril  for blood pressure daily for over 8 years & all was OK. Lupin reformulated their process & made the pill smaller  in 2017. As I started taking the reformulated pills, I noticed severe fatigue & falling asleep after every meal. Stared feeling depressed & finally severe heart pounding & arrhythmia within 1 hour after taking it. That scared me so I stopped. Within 3 days I was no longer fatigued, had a brighter outlook & NO heart arrhythmia or pounding. Whatever Lupin did in their reformulation it took a proper functioning medication & made it dangerous to use. 
Reading blogs, Im not the only one who suffered thru adverse reaction to Luipns reformulation of lisinopril
I am refusing to take ANY medication manufactured by Lupin...

review: heres experience lisinopril. took month pain going side head left finger tips. bp would good sometimes shoot went doctor (possible white coat syndrome wouldnt go much) heart rate would elevated low resting. switched coreg mg day lexapro mg lower anxiety. pain went away lowered heart rate stopped lexapro third night felt hot trouble sleeping maybe stuck it. coreg would work somewhat bp could go felt slightest bit anxious angry. dumped doctor switched new one. new doc prescribed mg metoprolol back lexapro help shakes anxiety. start metoprolol tomorrow lexapro couple days later hopefully works. lisinopril may work definitely me.
full_review: Heres my experience with lisinopril. Took it for about a month and had a pain going from the side of my head down to my left finger tips. BP would be good sometimes but shoot up when I went to the doctor (possible white coat syndrome but it wouldnt go down much) and heart rate would be elevated 90s to low 100s resting. Switched to coreg 12.5 mg a day with lexapro 5 mg to lower anxiety. Pain went away and lowered heart rate but stopped the lexapro after third night because I felt hot and trouble sleeping but maybe should have stuck with it. Coreg would work somewhat but BP could go up if I felt the slightest bit anxious or angry. Dumped my doctor and switched to a new one. New doc prescribed 50 mg of metoprolol and back to the 5mg lexapro to help the shakes and anxiety. Start the metoprolol tomorrow and lexapro a couple days later so hopefully this works. Lisinopril may work for you but definitely not for me.

review: ive taking lisinopril) daily years, prescribed primary care physicial, lower blood pressure. initlally experienced persistent, dry cough, pharmacist filled prescription warned about, found drinking water, able eliminate cough. aside cough, adverse side effects associated taking lisinopril, blood pressure within normal healthy range.
full_review: Ive been taking Lisinopril (5mg) daily for 1-12 years, as prescribed by my primary care physicial, to lower my blood pressure.   I initlally experienced a persistent, dry cough, which the pharmacist that filled the prescription warned me about, but found that by drinking more water, I was able to eliminate the cough.  Aside from the cough, there have been no other adverse side effects associated with taking Lisinopril, and my blood pressure is now within a normal healthy range.

review: taking lisinopril approx month side effect dry cough interrupts work duties keeps night. blood pressure still high instead increasing dose doctor changed prescription. ive new medication week dry cough hasnt gone away. pharmacist told would take days get system.
full_review: I have been taking 10mg Lisinopril for approx 1 month and the side effect of the dry cough not only interrupts my work duties but it keeps me up at night.  Blood pressure is still high so instead of increasing this dose my doctor has changed my prescription.  Ive been on a new medication for 1 week now but the dry cough hasnt gone away.  Pharmacist told me it would take a few days to get out of my system.

review: taken lisinopril year without problems. yesterday took lip started get blister. thinking cold sore didn’t think much it. time went lips, chin, inside mouth raw swollen including cheeks! started feeling like throat closing up, went dr. immediately gave cortisone told stop it!! knew anaphylactic reaction b said word!! bottom face swollen red, blustery still, better. gave different types meds take. seeing cardiologist next week different bp med. aware anaphylactic reaction doesn’t always happens u begin new med!!
full_review: Had taken Lisinopril 4 over a year without problems.  Yesterday I took it and my lip started to get a blister.  Thinking it was a cold sore didn’t think much about it.  But as time went on my lips, chin, inside of my mouth was raw swollen including my cheeks!  Started feeling like my throat was closing up, went to Dr.  immediately gave me cortisone and told me to stop it!! Knew  it was an anaphylactic  reaction  b4 I said a word!! My bottom have of my face is swollen red, blustery still, but better.  Gave me 2 different types of meds to take.  Will be seeing my cardiologist next week for different bp med.  so be aware having an anaphylactic  reaction doesn’t always happens when u begin a new med!!

review: taking lisinopril lbs overweight, constantly tired, constantly pain body joints arthritis back hands. medication accentuated weakness, tiredness pain reported physician two months treatment. dr urging, continued take medication discontinue use prescription runs out. developed frequent nosebleeds seen mentioned side effect medication, note whether improves medication.
full_review: Before taking lisinopril, I was 100 lbs overweight, constantly tired, constantly in pain over body and joints with some arthritis in back and hands. This medication has accentuated weakness, tiredness and pain which was reported to physician two months into treatment. At Dr urging, I have continued to take this medication but will discontinue use when this prescription runs out. I have developed frequent nosebleeds which I have not seen mentioned as a side effect of the medication, but will note whether this improves when off medication.

review: year old black male. blood pressure slightly elevated years ago. doctor put lisinopril. moved new location changed doctors. determined changed mg lisinopril. suffer lost sexual desire, headaches, dry cough, nightmares.
full_review: I am a 67 year old black male. My blood pressure was slightly elevated 2 years ago. My doctor put me on lisinopril 20mg. I moved to a new location and changed doctors. He  was determined that I should be changed to 10 mg of lisinopril. Now I suffer with a lost of sexual desire, headaches, dry cough, and nightmares.

review: see people stating bad experience drug, people share positive experience. originally prescribed amlodipine. number - didnt work. number - side effects horrible - chest pain, tinnitus, name - made feel horrible months asked doctor switched lisinopril hctz. first pill, blood pressure totally normal, part sticks right around. feel much better. ive taking months - love blood pressure readings definitely side effects. nice feel normal again. blood pressure tended spike early take pm every night - works best me.
full_review: I see people stating their bad experience with this drug, but more people should share their positive experience.  I was originally prescribed Amlodipine. Number 1 - it didnt work. Number 2 - side effects were horrible - chest pain, tinnitus, you name it - made me feel horrible.  After 2 months I asked the doctor to be switched to Lisinopril HCTZ 10, 12.5.  After only the first pill, my blood pressure was totally normal, for the most part sticks right around 12080.  And I feel so so much better.  Ive been taking this for over 2 months now - love my blood pressure readings and definitely no side effects.  It is so nice to feel normal again. As my blood pressure tended to spike early AM I take this at 9 pm every night - works best for me.

review: cardiologist put yrs ago. ive getting bone shoulder arm pain, thinking medicine kept thinking something else. finally got fed bone pain doctor changed medicine days ago. pain lessened.
full_review: Cardiologist put me on this 5 yrs ago. Ive been getting  bone and shoulder arm pain, and not thinking it was the medicine kept thinking I had something else. Finally I got so fed up with the bone pain the doctor changed the medicine a few days ago. Pain has lessened.

review: taking lisinopril years (im) controlled blood pressure nicely. started taking aging gradually worked. noticed negative side affects. drug done wonders me.
full_review: I have been taking lisinopril for over 20 years (Im now 71) and it has controlled my blood pressure very nicely. I started out taking 5mg and with aging gradually worked up to 40mg. I have not noticed any negative side affects. This drug has done wonders for me.

review: told high blood pressure (bp) start. news know dont live healthiest lifestyle & told bp slightly elevated year prior this. reluctantly started lisinopril. first everything seemed ok, random pains arms, lower back, neck, jaw, etc.. attributed body getting use meds. two months later bp slightly lower cost. im starting feel nauseous & lost appetite two days now. pains still pains starting pin pointed towards heart is. dont know silent heart attack, side effect lisinopril acid reflux. im losing hair, nails big toe nails blackish red lines running accross scalp & cheeknose flushed & pink. ive never experienced pains like started accepting medication. recommend trying healthier lifestyle trying meds.
full_review: Was told I had high blood pressure  (BP) at the start of 2019. No news there as I know I dont live the healthiest lifestyle & I was told my BP was slightly elevated about a year prior to this. I reluctantly started 20mg of Lisinopril. At first everything seemed ok, I had random pains on my arms, lower back, neck, jaw, etc.. but I attributed that to my body just getting use to meds. Two months later my bp has only slightly been lower but at what cost. Im now starting to feel nauseous & have lost my appetite for about two days now. The pains are still here with now pains starting to be pin pointed towards where my heart is. I dont know if I had a silent heart attack, if its a side effect of lisinopril or an acid reflux. Im losing hair, my nails and big toe nails have blackish red lines running accross them and my scalp & cheeknose are flushed & pink. Ive never experienced pains like this before until I had started accepting this medication. I recommend trying a healthier lifestyle before trying meds.

review: drug months. blood pressure. blood pressue. dry cough gone away part. havent lost weight again, like eat. feel better definitely notice taken drug couple days. keeping blood pressure check.
full_review: Have been on 20mg of this drug for 6 months. Blood pressure was 175120. Blood pressue is no 12085. The dry cough has gone away for the most part. I havent lost any weight but then again, I like to eat. I feel better and definitely notice when I have not taken the drug for a couple of days. Its keeping the blood pressure in check.

review: difficulties blood pressure meds, examples medicine would cause faint. taken med prescribed lisinipril worked awhile. readings normal range day developed side effect. took med night prescribed woke something wrong throat felt like problem swallowing lips enormous. rushed hospital put intensive care discovered kidneys effected lisinipril. discovered personal side effects nurses experience could used medicine day years develop side effects. kidneys damaged lisinopril nephrologist kidney specialist rest life
full_review: I have had difficulties with blood pressure meds, examples as medicine would cause me to faint.  I was taken off that med and prescribed Lisinipril which worked for me for awhile.  My readings were in normal range until the day I developed a side effect. I took my med at night as prescribed and I woke up something was wrong with me my throat felt like I was having problem swallowing and my lips were enormous.  I was rushed to the hospital and put into intensive care and I discovered my kidneys had been effected by Lisinipril.  I discovered my personal side effects from the nurses experience you could have used this medicine for 1 day or years but you can develop side effects.  Now my kidneys are damaged from this lisinopril and   I will be under a nephrologist or kidney specialist for the rest of my life

review: doctor prescribed daily bp, wow. first dose, continued fifteen days, bp came feel difficulty, doctor reduced dose daily, bp unstable reduced dose, still. doctor stopped medication, bp gradually increased stable without medication brisk walk daily, father, mother. history heart failure family.
full_review: Doctor prescribed 5mg daily when BP was 150100, wow 24Hrs. after first dose it was 13084, continued for fifteen days, the BP came down to 10070 and I did not feel any difficulty, doctor reduced the dose to 2.5mg daily, BP was unstable at 9070 to 10070 reduced the dose to 1.25mg, still it was 10070. Doctor stopped medication, BP gradually increased again now it is stable at 13090 without any medication, with 2km brisk walk daily. I am 47, my father 79 12085, mother 12080. No history of heart failure in family.

review: blood pressure max years, finally crept mid mid. doctor put lowest dose) dry cough almost immediately. third day, dizzy, felt spaced out. things, started prescription leaving vacation, ruined vacation. stopped taking it, took two days feel normal again. read medication made snake venom. would recommend trying something else. prescribed amlodipine brought pressure points number, side effects.
full_review: Blood pressure was just under the max of 14090 for years, but finally crept up to mid 140s over mid 90s. Doctor put me on lowest dose (2.5mg) I had the dry cough almost immediately. After about the third day, I was dizzy, and felt spaced out. Of all things, I started this prescription just before leaving for a vacation, so it ruined most of the vacation. I stopped taking it, and it took about two days to feel normal again. I read that this medication is made from snake venom. I would recommend trying something else. I was prescribed Amlodipine and it brought my pressure down about 10 points on each number, and I have no side effects.

review: took mg lisinopril month could handle side effects anymore. worked great getting blood pressure came heart pounding fluttering, headaches, leg pains, weakness, dry mouth, diarrhea, dizziness, trouble sleeping, waking middle deep sleep confused alarmed, taste change. within days changing medicines problems disappeared even though doctor assured lisinopril.
full_review: I took 10 mg of lisinopril for a month and could not handle the side effects anymore.  It worked great at getting my blood pressure down but with that came heart pounding and fluttering, headaches, leg pains, weakness, dry mouth, diarrhea, dizziness, trouble sleeping, waking in the middle of a deep sleep very confused and alarmed, and taste change.  Within 2 days of changing medicines all of these problems disappeared even though the doctor assured me it was not all from lisinopril.

review: lisinopril year half. three months ago, one docs noticed kidney filtering well. look year blood work showed gradual decline function. sent nephrologist, looked thoroughly meds history. told probably lisinipril. tapering med caused almost constant premature atrial contractions, life threatening, sent er day. ten days kidneys already functioning better. really strange happened, given lisinoprils use kidney patients. im glad problem caught time. keep eye creatinine egfr.
full_review:
I was on 10mg of Lisinopril for about a year and a half. Three months ago, one of my docs noticed that my kidney were not filtering well. A look at a year of blood work showed a gradual decline in function. I was sent to a nephrologist, who looked very thoroughly at my meds and history. He told me it was probably the lisinipril. 
Tapering off of the med has caused almost constant premature atrial contractions, which are not life threatening, but sent me to the ER in day 10. 
Ten days off and my kidneys were already functioning better. Its really strange that this happened, given Lisinoprils use in kidney patients. Im just glad that the problem was caught in time. Keep an eye on your creatinine and eGFR.

review: lisinopril & bendroflumethiazide. dropped blood pressure. avoiding increasing lisinopril. addition family history hypertension (im age). gradually past months got weight. diet, regular cardio (cross trainer) anaerobic (weights). stopped diuretic. bp. initially side effects persistent, dry coughing stopped quit smoking. occasionally little light-headed hours taking. problems lisinopril. diuretic pain, getting times night pee. cant recommend enough combination weight loss & exercise
full_review:
On lisinopril 10mg & bendroflumethiazide 2.5mg. This dropped my blood pressure from 165110 to 14090. I had been avoiding increasing the lisinopril to 20mg. In addition to family history of hypertension, I was 115kg (Im 6 age 47). 
Gradually over past 7 months got weight down to 80kg. Diet, regular cardio (cross trainer) and anaerobic (weights). Stopped the diuretic. BP 13080.
Initially side effects were persistent, dry coughing but that stopped when I quit smoking. Occasionally a little light-headed a few hours or so after taking. No other problems with lisinopril. 
The diuretic was a pain, getting up 2-4 times at night for a pee.
Cant recommend enough the combination of weight loss & exercise

review: take mg per day sets bp steadily. running before. started mg (doc wanted mg) little short breath. went mg plenty. taking larger dose try taking less giving side effects. stop taking days bp stays low days even. wondering body achy-ness foot pain though. also bit mucous this. sure whether try something else effective bp. dirt cheap.
full_review: I can take this at 1.25 mg per day and it sets my BP at about 13075 steadily.  I was running about 15090 before.  I started at 2.5 mg (doc wanted 5 mg) and was a little short of breath. Went to 1.25 mg and its plenty.  If you are taking a larger dose try taking less before giving up from side effects.  I can stop taking this for a few days and my BP stays low for about 3-4 days even.  I am wondering if I am having some body achy-ness and foot pain from this though.  Also a bit more mucous when on this.  Not sure whether to try something else as this is effective for the BP.  And dirt cheap.

review: taking lisinopril years days ago picked new script next day small rash face. thought flight. calmed down days ago started time whole face swollen, rash neck chest, ulcerations mouth throat, bad intestinal pains. ive told doctors long time problem sulfa medications. read medicine shouldnt taking all. im much pain itchy skin. nauseated bad headache. stopped taking let reaction calm own. im afraid go pump something else react to.
full_review: I had been taking Lisinopril for a few years. 10 days ago I picked up a new script and the next day had a small rash on my face. I thought it was from my flight. After it calmed down, 2 days ago it started up again only this time my whole face was swollen, rash on my neck and chest, ulcerations in my mouth and throat, and some very bad intestinal pains. Ive told doctors for a long time I have a problem with Sulfa in medications. I just read that this is a medicine I shouldnt have been taking at all. Im in so much pain and itchy skin. I am nauseated and a bad headache. I stopped taking it but now I have to let the reaction calm in its own. Im afraid to go in and have them pump something else into me that I react to.

review: year old, male. taking week blood pressure gone im feeling much better. happy this, far side effects im aware of.
full_review: 27 year old, male. Been taking 5mg for just over a week now my blood pressure has gone from 180110 to 12585 and Im feeling so much better.  Very happy with this, so far no side effects Im aware of.

review: anyone ever took lotrel hypertension? cardio doc prescribed lisinopril top already-taking lotrel, pharm doc said could take medicines without bp crashing. confused, called prescribing cardiologist said go ahead get benefit drugs. did, wound er semi-conscious; bp systolic (top number, forget diastolic probably want to! big worry kidneys taken hit. later, lisinopril wasnt effective lotrel. two lessons) doctors incompetent, drug matters pharmacist final authority.
full_review: Anyone ever took Lotrel for hypertension?  A cardio doc prescribed Lisinopril on TOP of my already-taking Lotrel, but the pharm doc said I could NOT take both medicines without my BP crashing.  Confused, I called the prescribing cardiologist who said go ahead and get the benefit of both drugs.  I did,  and wound up in an ER semi-conscious; BP systolic (top number) was 52, I forget diastolic probably because I want to!  Big worry was that my kidneys had taken a hit.  Later, Lisinopril by itself wasnt as effective as Lotrel.  Two lessons, (1) some doctors are incompetent, and on drug matters the pharmacist is the final authority.

review: took years. effective first began issues weakness, joint pain, vision problems. one point limping nearly every joint aching, severe problems eye dryness ended corneal ulcer. led er visit bp spiked pulse raced. stopping medication resulted return high bp, symptoms went away weeks. doctors never even connected lisinopril symptoms. blood tests showed nothing, inflammation numbers skyrocketed, meant high risk heart attack. dangerous drug me, never touching again.
full_review:
Took 5mgday for 2 years.  Very effective at first but began having issues with weakness, joint pain, vision problems.  At one point I was limping with nearly every joint aching, and severe problems with eye dryness and ended up with a corneal ulcer.   It all led up to an ER visit when my BP spiked and pulse raced.   Stopping the medication resulted in the return of my high BP, but all my symptoms went away after about 2 weeks.   Doctors never even connected the lisinopril with the symptoms.  Blood tests showed nothing, but my inflammation numbers had skyrocketed, which meant high risk for heart attack.
Its a dangerous drug for me, never touching it again.

review: started taking lisinopril previous high blood pressure didnt help. lisinopril brought bp normal level stabilized pretty quickly. slight dry cough nothing bad. side effects.
full_review: Started taking lisinopril after previous high blood pressure didnt help. Lisinopril brought my BP down to normal level and stabilized it pretty quickly. Have a slight dry cough but nothing too bad. No other side effects.

review: since beginning lisinopril ive vivid waking dreams find difficult go back sleep. wake loud clear sounds (breaking glass, doors creaking open) leave heart racing (anxiety?). remain asleep dreams bad dreams (nightmares).
full_review: Since beginning lisinopril Ive been having vivid waking dreams and find it difficult to go back to sleep. I wake from loud clear sounds (breaking glass, doors creaking open) that leave my heart racing (anxiety?). When I do remain asleep my dreams are bad dreams (nightmares).

review: poison- dont take this! lots terrible side effects, got bad lost far vision store one day, could see things within foot two. took minutes vision return normal. poison!
full_review: Poison- dont take this! Lots of terrible side effects, it got so bad that I lost my far vision at the store one day, I could only see things within a foot or two. It took 10 minutes for my vision to return to normal. Poison!

review: migraines adult life. got one almost always period random times month. settled hit menopause. came back vengeance endometrial cancer diagnosis, hysterectomy hormone treatment. trying time blood pressure went sky high. dr. prescribed lisinoprilhctz mg havent migraine three months ive it! blood pressure totally control happy rid migraines.
full_review: I have had migraines most of my adult life. Got one almost always before my period and random times during the month. They settled down at 48 when I hit menopause. Then they came back with a vengeance after an endometrial cancer diagnosis, hysterectomy and hormone treatment. During this trying time my blood pressure went sky high. Dr. prescribed LisinoprilHCTZ 1012.5 mg and I havent had a migraine in the three months Ive been on it! Blood pressure is totally under control and I am just so happy to be rid of the migraines.

review: doctor prescribed milligrams lisinopril based borderline high bp readings office. days, began severe post nasal drip sore throat cough turned seemed head cold heavy, productive cough. two weeks in, experienced sustained accelerated pulse rate went doctor’s office. decided pulse rate could due interaction lisinopril decongestants taking. prescribed antibiotics case sinus infection. two weeks later, reading reviews line, symptoms might reaction lisinopril. stopped taking and, within two days, felt much better. two weeks later, coughing spell perhaps day. consulted doctor. now, take medication since home readings show high bp levels. ace inhibitors list me, matter what.
full_review: The doctor prescribed 10 milligrams of Lisinopril based on borderline high BP readings in the office. After a few days, I began to have severe post nasal drip with sore throat and cough which turned into what seemed to be a head cold with a very heavy, productive cough. Two weeks in, I experienced a sustained accelerated pulse rate and went into the doctor’s office. We decided the pulse rate could be due to an interaction between the Lisinopril and some decongestants I had been taking. I was prescribed antibiotics in case I had a sinus infection. Two weeks later, after reading reviews on line, that my symptoms might be a reaction to the Lisinopril. I stopped taking it and, within two days, felt much better. Two weeks later, I only have a coughing spell perhaps once a day. I consulted with my doctor. For now, I will take no medication since at home readings did not show high BP levels. ACE inhibitors are now off the list for me, no matter what.

full_review:
Fall 2015 noticed bp was staying in the 14095 range. Dr put me on Lisinopril 20 mg & metoprolol 100 mg. 
Bp went down to 13090. 
I soon noticed my energy was low, I felt like my body was made of lead. I couldnt even stand long enough to take a shower. But the holidays approached & I figured it was just adjusting, cold winter, etc. I had extreme depression, massive anxiety, insomnia. Basically confined to my bed. Went to the Dr again & again & she just looked at me & smiled again. I couldnt take anymore. I went off both slowly. I feel 75% better after 2 days! Now Im trying to reverse this nightmare of being sedentary & what it has done to my body. I never knew you could loose this much muscle & become exercise resistant so quickly.

review: lisinopril gave dreadful cough breathing problems never life. also got uti anti biotics left severe lower abdominal pain leaking times. research found caused ace inhibitors ace-inhibitors risk urinary tract infections stopped tablets leaks stopped immediately others symptoms eventually went weeks. dr refused acknowledge medicine. daughter similar problems. dreadful medicine.

Lisinopril  gave me a dreadful cough and breathing problems which I had never had in my life.  I also got a UTI and after anti biotics was left with severe lower abdominal pain and leaking a few times.  Research found this can be caused by ACE inhibitors  
ACE-Inhibitors and the Risk of Urinary Tract Infections

review: put lisinopril hbp went er diagnosed bronchitis mid january. attributed feeling worse progression bronchitis instead drug. however, months feeling better noticed hacking cough, endless postnasal drip, difficulty swallowing, general fatigue seemed get much worse shortly taking medication. prompted research side effects read online hundreds testimonials people similar symptoms also saw correlation medication symptoms. ct scans blood work revealed longer bronchitis, knew lisinopril blame. stopped taking it.
full_review: I was put on 20mg of Lisinopril for HBP when I went to the ER and was diagnosed with bronchitis in mid January 2016. I attributed my feeling worse to the progression of the bronchitis instead of this drug. However, after months of not feeling any better I noticed that my hacking cough, endless postnasal drip, difficulty swallowing, general fatigue seemed to get so much worse shortly after taking this medication. It prompted me to research the side effects and read online hundreds of testimonials of people with similar symptoms to those I had who also saw a correlation between this medication and their symptoms. After my CT scans and blood work revealed I no longer had bronchitis, I knew that Lisinopril was to blame. I stopped taking it.

review: began taking lisinopril august immediately started experiencing terrible cough lung issues months worsened back doctor numerous times bronchial infection required antibiotics steroids four dosages. md recommended see pulmonologist ct scan along putting three different inhalers. recently another lung infection went local gp found issues lisinopril - blurry vision, extreme weight gain, bronchiectasis severe.

review: home blood pressure, doctor every visit. doctor disregarded home readings put mg lisinopril. started trouble finishing daily exercise routine, developed cough, bp shot. anxiety without meds became anxious ive ever been. went back doctor accused lying previous home readings, prescribed higher dose lisinopril sent er. er ekg, said fine sent home. higher dose still resulting higher bp, addition terrible headaches. think consent medication see doctor days

At home my blood pressure was 12780, but at the doctor I have 14690 every visit. Doctor disregarded home readings and put me on 5 mg of lisinopril.
I started having trouble finishing my daily exercise routine, developed a cough, and my bp shot up to 171119. I have anxiety without meds and I  became more anxious than Ive ever been.

review: given pale peach round tablet try prehypertension days ago. lisinopril help blood pressure. pounding headaches, pounding heart rest stopped. downside: experienced likely intestinal angioedema outset. puffed though weigh less one occasion). hard pass gas bowel movements puffed uncomfortable lower abdomen time. woke left eye shot open, turned red started weeping freely. lip cheek side became slightly numb swollen. knew take benadryl right away stay make sure throat didnt close up. doc said take another benadryl go straight er swelling got worsewent throat. gave new hbp medicine destroy lisinopril. angioedema rare reaction lisinopril, vigilant. especially allergies.
full_review:
Given the 5mg pale peach round tablet to try out for prehypertension 31 days ago. Lisinopril DID help my blood pressure. Pounding headaches, pounding heart at rest stopped.

Downside: I experienced what was most likely intestinal angioedema at the outset. I puffed up though I did not weigh more (3lbs LESS on one occasion). Hard to pass gas or have bowel movements and puffed up and uncomfortable in my lower abdomen most of the time.

Then I woke at 2am when my left eye shot open, turned red and started weeping freely. My lip and cheek on that side became slightly numb and swollen. I knew that I had to take a benadryl right away and stay up to make sure my throat didnt close up. My doc said take another benadryl and go straight to ER if my swelling got worsewent to my throat.

They gave me new hbp medicine and had me destroy my lisinopril.

Angioedema is a rare reaction to lisinopril, but BE VIGILANT. Especially those with allergies.

review: pharmacy recently gave lisinopril made solco labs, different previous makers, lupin. blood pressure good control perfect readings lupin. however, solco brand sent er dangerously high readings, i’m talking stroke levels. solco actually caused blood pressure spike instead lowering it. experience noted, absolutely side effects good bp control.
full_review:
My pharmacy recently gave me Lisinopril made by Solco labs, which was different from the previous makers, Lupin. My blood pressure was under very good control with perfect readings under Lupin. However, the Solco brand  sent me to the ER with dangerously high readings, I’m talking stroke levels. Solco actually caused my blood pressure to spike instead of lowering it.
Other than the experience just noted, I have had absolutely no side effects with good BP control.

review: extremely high blood dr. tried first hctz (hydrochlorothiazide), diuertic, didnt touch it, atenolol, helped added lisinipril finally got down years. recently mom health problems made aware talked doc lisinipril. read it. metabolized liver like originally thought gives liver break. isnt actually metabolized excreted wholly thru urine. side effects years taken kept pressure control without additional increases dosages. also covered insurances cheap. highly recommend medication.
full_review: I had extremely high blood that my Dr. tried first  HCTZ (hydrochlorothiazide), which is a diuertic, that didnt touch it, then atenolol, which helped but it was the added lisinipril that FINALLY got it down. Been on it now for 15 years. Recently my mom and her health problems made me more aware of my own and I talked with my doc about lisinipril. And read up on it. It is not metabolized by the liver like I originally thought which gives my liver a break. It isnt actually metabolized at all and is excreted wholly thru the urine. I have had NO side effects in all of the years I have taken it and it has kept my pressure under control without any additional increases in dosages. It is also covered by most insurances and is very cheap. I highly recommend this medication.

review: lisinopril month. blood pressure control first time long time. one morning woke swelling face. morning progressed, symptoms got worse. painful swallow. ended going er find allergic reaction medicine common african americans. ended hospital days. blood drawn, liver enzyme levels highly elevated. medication, liver enzyme levels going down. pcp check labs every two weeks keep eye liver enzyme levels.
full_review: I was on Lisinopril for a month. My blood pressure was under control for the first time in a long time.  One morning I woke up with some swelling to my face.  As the morning progressed, the symptoms got worse.  It was very painful for me to swallow.  I ended up going to the ER only to find I had an allergic reaction to the medicine which is common in African Americans.  I ended up in the hospital for 4 days.  After having some blood drawn, my liver enzyme levels were highly elevated.  After being off the medication, my liver enzyme levels are going down.  Now my pcp check my labs every two weeks to keep an eye on my liver enzyme levels.

review: diagnosed high blood pressure years ago dose zestril, generic-lisinopril. always annoying cough it, family history heart disease, would deal it months ago, lisinopril came mylan pharmaceuticals. pharmacy said wholesaler can’t get mylan instead lisinopril manufactured lupin. giving try, it’s working. blood pressure controlled previously, since switch it’s high, lightheaded anxious. sure what’s coating lupin brand, stomach grumbles something fierce take it. taken three days far feel better. none pharmacies area carry mylan lisinopril. call doctor see else recommend. want meds come us manufactures. cheaper always better.
full_review:
Diagnosed  with high blood pressure over 20 years ago.  I have been on 10mg dose of Zestril, then the generic-Lisinopril. I have always had the annoying cough with it, but  with my family history of heart disease, I would just deal with it. Up until about 6 months ago, my lisinopril came from  Mylan Pharmaceuticals. Now my pharmacy said their wholesaler can’t get Mylan and instead have me on lisinopril manufactured by Lupin. I have been giving it a try, but it’s not working. My blood pressure was controlled previously, but since the switch it’s high, I am lightheaded and anxious. Not sure what’s with the coating of Lupin brand, but my stomach grumbles something fierce after I take it. I have not taken it for three days now and so far feel better. 

None of the pharmacies in my area carry Mylan lisinopril. 
I have a call in to my doctor to see what else she can recommend. We want our meds to come from US manufactures. Cheaper is not always better.

review: week taking lisinopril, started coughing, productive cough. doctor prescribed anti-biotics allergy meds took almost month relief. prescribed steriods cough med codeine. okay week productive coughing came back. told doctor maybe caused lisinopril said side effect dry cough mine productive cough months, doctor said could seek opinion referred ent laryngoscopy. result, nose throat normal. ent doctor told coughing due lisinopril. stopped taking lisinopril weeks coughing stops. hate lisinopril.
full_review: After a week of taking Lisinopril, I started coughing, a productive cough.  My doctor prescribed anti-biotics and allergy meds and I took them for almost a month with no relief.  He then prescribed steriods and a cough med with codeine.  I was okay for a week but my productive coughing came back.  I told my doctor it maybe caused by Lisinopril but he said that the side effect of it is dry cough but mine is productive cough.  After 3 months, my doctor said I could seek for a 2nd opinion and referred me to an ENT for a laryngoscopy.  The result, my nose and throat are normal.  The ENT doctor told me my coughing was due to Lisinopril.  I stopped taking Lisinopril and after 2 weeks my coughing stops. I hate Lisinopril.

Changed the brand and got the famous annoying dry cough but went back o my old brand and it is gone. With occasional dizziness and headaches it is the only medicine which has alone been able to lower my blood pressure.

review: high blood pressure turned related job. doctor put low dose linosipril blood pressure came down. migraines stopped. make connection left job took linosipril. blood pressure normal migraines back. search migraine medications found linisopril list. went right back doctor going put topamax shared findings. two months low dosage linisopril migraines. woo hoo! fingers crossed far good. best free prescription local grocery store pharmacy. tremendous relief years migraines run life.
full_review: I had high blood pressure that turned out to be related to the job. My doctor put me on a low dose of linosipril and the blood pressure came down.  And my migraines stopped. I did not make the connection until I left the job and we took me off of the linosipril. The blood pressure was normal but the migraines were back.  I did a search for  migraine medications and found linisopril on the list. I went right back to the doctor who was  going to put me on Topamax and shared my findings. Two months on a low dosage of linisopril and no migraines. Woo hoo! Fingers are crossed and so far so good.  Best of all it is a free prescription at my local grocery store pharmacy. What a tremendous relief after years of having migraines run my life.

review: taking zestrillisinopril forty years plus. worked ok stressful job works much better retired. runny nose issue live az sure allergies. based read peoples comments, going assume meds. also take called water pill. fatigue thing mentioned many also applies me. erectile dysfunction also significant issue. considering getting medicines see helps issue. anyone provide info matter, would appreciated.
full_review: Have been taking 10MG ZestrilLisinopril for forty years plus, I am 69. It worked OK when I was in a very stressful job and works much better now that I am retired. I am considering getting off the medicines to see if that helps that issue. If anyone out there can provide any info on that matter, it would be appreciated.

full_review: Started taking lisinopril over a month and a half ago%u2026  at first I noticed the dry cough, but I also noticed that my blood pressure has gone down to within normal levels.  I was initially happy with the results, but then I started noticing some serious sexual dysfunction. I was unable to achieve or maintain an erection, and I never had this problem before in my life.  I quit taking it for a week or so and then I noticed my libido was back to its normal levels. review: works say bad medication. bring blood pressure, however, week took could sleep hour two time. pulse ox meter well bp meter started keeping close watch found lisinopril resting pulse went low one point rarely went. dr concerned said stay low range, however, conclusion believe sleeping pulse went low forced wake order get resting pulse raise enough keep alive. stopping medication resting pulse went back normal rate around.
full_review: Because this works for some I will not say it is a bad medication. It did bring down my blood pressure, however, for the week I took it I could not sleep more than an hour or two at a time. I have both a pulse ox meter as well as a BP meter and started keeping close watch and found that while on Lisinopril my resting pulse went very low. It was 44 at one point and rarely went above 70. My Dr was not concerned because he said that it did not stay in the low range, however, in my conclusion I believe that I was not sleeping because my pulse went too low and I was forced to wake up in order to get my resting pulse to raise enough to keep me alive. After stopping the medication my resting pulse went back up to its normal rate of around 60-75.

review: given low dose lisinopril moderately high bp, dropped points months side effects came....pain literally everywhere, bloodshot dry eyes, tachycardias, skin flushing, vision loss, corneal ulcer, stomach pains, sore joints, skin redness. ended er. eye doctor didnt know was, internal medicine doctor tested sorts things, couldnt figure out. finally stopped medicine symptoms went away, except blood pressure even higher. cant take ace inhibitor now. bad drug dont risk life toxic product.
full_review:
Given low dose lisinopril for moderately high BP, dropped it about 10 points.  After 3 months the side effects came....pain literally everywhere, bloodshot dry eyes, tachycardias, skin flushing, vision loss, corneal ulcer, stomach pains, sore joints, skin redness.  Ended up in the ER.   Eye doctor didnt know what it was, internal medicine doctor tested me for all sorts of things, couldnt figure it out.
I finally stopped the medicine and all of my symptoms went away, except for blood pressure which is even higher.   I cant take any ACE inhibitor now.  Bad drug dont risk your life on this toxic product.

Dry cough, weakness, nodding off at mid day than insomnia at night, worse starting having anxiety issues.  Now instead of a ACE Im taking a ARB Olmesartan 10mg. Then I got twitches all over my body. In my arms and legs, but the most annoying was on my head. I had constant twitches on the left side of my head. One of the worst symptoms was chest pain. Had to have ECG done and it came back abnormal. They think it was because lisinopril caused my sodium to drop low. Stopped lisinopril and it came back normal.

review: auditioned eleven blood pressure medicines. far, lisinopril least objectionable. one thing, really works. blood pressure a.m mg smallest tablet make. two months ago, lisinopril, went er. slight increase head pain repeated craniotomies, definitely less medicines ive tried. also retain water, hair loss, lower blood sugar (not good hypoglycemic), somewhat wakeful sleep. worst symptom makes impotent point penile atrophy. good medicine women.
full_review: I have auditioned eleven blood pressure medicines.  So far, lisinopril is the least objectionable.  For one thing, it really works.  My blood pressure is down to 11778 at 10 a.m. This is on only 2.5 mg, which is 12 of the smallest tablet they make. Two months ago, before lisinopril, I went to the ER because I was at 170104.  I do have a slight increase in head pain where I have had repeated craniotomies, but it is definitely less than any of the other medicines Ive tried.  I also retain water, have some hair loss, have lower blood sugar (not good for me because I am hypoglycemic), and somewhat wakeful sleep.  But the worst symptom is that it makes me impotent to the point of penile atrophy.  A good medicine for women.

review: started taking lisinopril years ago. worked lower hbp along w metoprolol), minor cough. finally figured years caused major stomach issues time. couldnt figure out, gave cut ton foods diet, miserable. switched losartan stomach issues went away overnight im able eat like normal person again. lisinopril inflamed gi tract caused hurt constantly. found could called intestinal angioedema doctors skeptical. lowered blood pressure, im glad something else works well wout side effects.
full_review: I started taking 10mg Lisinopril 5 years ago. It worked to lower my HBP along w 100mg Metoprolol (11070), and I only had a very minor cough. BUT I finally figured out after 5 years that it caused all of my MAJOR stomach issues over this time. We couldnt figure it out, so I gave up and cut a ton of foods out of my diet, which was miserable. I was switched to Losartan and my stomach issues went away OVERNIGHT and Im able to eat like a normal person again. Lisinopril inflamed my GI tract and caused it to hurt constantly. I found out this could be called intestinal angioedema but my doctors are skeptical. It lowered my blood pressure, but Im glad to be off of it and on something else that works just as well wout side effects.

When swim season came, I had been trying to get into shape but fatigued too easily in practice to ever get a good workout in. At my first swim meet, I almost had a heart attack after a race. Lisinopril cured my high BP but ended my swimming career. If your a serious athlete, I dont recommend taking this medicine. Its effective but your endurance will diminish greatly.

review: med kept bp right long time,but also caused kidneys fail.so make sure m.d.pay close attention bun creatnine levels.you pay attention well.all beta blockers cause problem stay one extended period time.dont let dr.tell nothing shouldnt take.research tell aint you.
full_review: Being on that med kept my bp right for a long time,but it also caused my kidneys to fail.So make sure you have your M.D.pay close attention to your BUN and your creatnine levels.You pay attention to it as well.All beta blockers cause a problem if you stay on the same one for an extended period of time.Dont let the Dr.tell you nothing about what you should and shouldnt take.Research and tell him no if it aint for you.

review: prescribed daily high blood pressure. believe supposed do, much more. taking it, developed annoying throat tickle accompanied excessive mucus production throat. would happen day also went night point would wake literally gagging got hacked up. got progressively worse longer took wife wits end excessive snoring. also, found much less alert drug point rear ended car commute work one morning. would highly advise anyone take medication extreme caution. since stopped taking side effects gone.
full_review: I was prescribed 10-20mg daily for high blood pressure. I do believe it did what it was supposed to do, and much more. While taking it, I developed a very annoying throat tickle which was accompanied by excessive mucus production in my throat. This would happen during the day and also went on all night to the point I would wake up literally gagging until I got it all hacked up. It got progressively worse the longer I took it and my wife was at her wits end with my excessive snoring. Also, I found that I was much less alert while on the drug to the point I rear ended at car on my commute to work one morning. I would highly advise anyone to take this medication with extreme caution. I have since stopped taking and all side effects are gone.

review: took year seem worked well thought. started coughing thinking sinuses. shortness breath walking long distances. sleeping good final night woke throat closing up, tongue swollen reaction landed intense care kidney problems. going specialist rest life med done. family prescribed medicine recommend take this. market prove fatal medical intervention taken. physician hospital told lisinipril taken day years go health. medication still prescribed?
full_review: I took this for a year and it seem to have worked well or so I thought.  Until I started coughing thinking it was my sinuses.  Then shortness of breath when walking long distances.   I was sleeping good until the final night I woke up with my throat closing up, my tongue swollen this reaction landed me in intense care with kidney problems.  I will be going to a specialist for the rest of my life to what this med has done.  When my family has been prescribed this medicine I recommend  them not to take this.  Why is is it on the market it can prove fatal if medical intervention is not taken.  The physician in the hospital told me lisinipril taken for a day or years can go against your health.  Why has this medication still prescribed?

review: experience lisinopril short one. slightly elevated bp since early never anything late. given low dose lisinopril first. took maybe months scheduled follow-up doctor. almost immediately started taking it, coughing began. side effects aware of. told doctor cough switched low dose losartan. cough gone immediately years ago issues losartan works intended lowering bp.
full_review: My experience with lisinopril was a short one. I have had slightly elevated BP since I was in my early 20s but never did anything about it until I was in my late 30s. I was given low dose lisinopril first. I took it maybe 3 months which was my scheduled follow-up with my doctor. Almost immediately after I started taking it, the coughing began. No other side effects that I am aware of. I told the doctor about the cough and he switched me to a low dose of losartan. Cough was gone immediately. That was over 10 years ago and no issues at all with losartan and it works as intended for lowering my BP.

review: medicine worked well friend, start coughing like crazy whole week find lisinopril makes cough. changed medicine amlodipine nightmare. come back doctors office changed cozaar. hope medicine work me.
full_review: This medicine worked so well on my friend, but for me I start coughing like crazy for a whole week before I did find it was Lisinopril that makes me cough. I changed the medicine to Amlodipine and it was a nightmare. I just come back from the doctors office he changed me to Cozaar. I hope this medicine will work for me.

review: irritating post nasal drip, runny nose, cough disrupted life! thought allergies cold took months connect lisinopril. see dr. tomorrow glad get rid drug side effects. sleep interupted night getting adequate rest. work embarrasing keep blowing nose coughing. people hyper-aware germs days swine flu thing, (and work surgery.)
full_review: The very irritating post nasal drip, runny nose, and cough has disrupted my life!  I thought I had allergies or a cold and it took me months to connect it to lisinopril.  I see my Dr. tomorrow and will be so glad to get rid of this drug and its side effects.  My sleep was interupted all night so I was not getting adequate rest.  And at work it was embarrasing to keep blowing my nose and coughing.  People are hyper-aware of germs these days because of the swine flu thing, (and I work in surgery.)

review: ive severe headachesmigraines twice month since seven years old. adult, headaches brutal hours feeling like id shot left eye, nothing helped. always low-to-normal blood pressure jumped post-menopause despite thin, active, non-smoker, etc. hypertension meds tried either made headaches worse made tired could barely get bed. lisinopril also made tired, degree figured could live with. months later, realized hadnt headache since id started taking it. fifteen months later still migraine-free. unbelievable!
full_review: Ive had severe headachesmigraines about twice a month since I was about seven years old. As an adult, my headaches were brutal: 36 hours of feeling like Id been shot in the left eye, and NOTHING helped.  I always had low-to-normal blood pressure until it jumped up post-menopause despite my being thin, active, a non-smoker, etc. The hypertension meds I tried either made my headaches worse or made me so tired I could barely get out of bed. Lisinopril also made me tired, but to a degree that I figured I could live with. A few months later, I realized I hadnt had a headache since Id started taking it. Fifteen months later I am still migraine-free. Unbelievable!

review: zestril (originally mg since reduced) past years pressure stabilised years. last years, started chronic dry irritating coughs; year problems erection libido. zestril medicine take.
full_review: I have been on Zestril (originally 10 mg and since reduced to 5mg) for the past 8 years and my pressure had stabilised all these years. In the last 3 years, I started having some chronic dry irritating coughs; and this year have been having problems with erection and libido. Zestril is the only medicine I take.

review: recd report blood work upcoming physical dec. little stumped... potassium high bun creat high. long story short lisinopril couple years problems...or thought. increased months ago. vision changes, significant...but also near fatal truck accident....so visual changes crash???or anti-hypertensive??? also increase really bad anxiety...oh lovely - kind feel like could jump skin. downer, yes med brought bp alone grateful. annoyed possible side effects shared. also increased heart rate, palpitations, sweating...(so enjoyable) yep done whining call doc. tomorrow.
full_review: Just recd report of blood work for upcoming physical in Dec. Little stumped... Potassium high BUN and Creat high. Long story short I have been on Lisinopril for a couple of years with no problems...or so I thought. Increased to 40mg about 6 months ago. Vision changes, significant...but I also had a near fatal truck accident....so were the visual changes from the crash???or the anti-hypertensive??? Also increase in really bad anxiety...oh so lovely - the kind where you feel like you could jump out of your skin. Now not to be a downer, yes the med brought my BP down and for that alone I am very grateful. I am just annoyed that the possible side effects were not shared. Also increased heart rate, palpitations, sweating...(so enjoyable) yep done whining will call doc. tomorrow.

review: mother severe allergic reaction lisinopril. taken er swollen tongue shortness breath. heart rate high. doctor questioned medicines blood pressure. immediately thought reaction caused lisinopril. fourth case seen. taken month dose).
full_review: My Mother had a severe allergic reaction to Lisinopril. She was taken to the ER for swollen tongue and shortness of breath. Her heart rate was high. When the doctor questioned her about her medicines for blood pressure. They immediately thought the reaction had been caused by lisinopril. She was the fourth case that they had seen. She had only taken it for about a month (10mg dose).

review: started taking lisinopril mg two months ago ok untill two weeks ago stools started get real soft got dirreaha gassy wind day. never problems bowels im years old im going going another pill.
full_review: I started taking lisinopril 10 mg about two months ago it was ok untill two weeks ago stools started to get real soft then got dirreaha very gassy wind all day.  I  never had problems with my bowels Im 79 years old so Im going off them and then going on another by pill.

review: given lisinopril chf (chronic heart failure) high bp following serious chf problem went undetected year. gained lbs one year. strength work, desire anything socially felt weak time. slept four hours night. quickly angered slightest irritation. family said different person. doc changed meds feel like old self. get liver kidney checked urine problem.
full_review: I was given lisinopril for CHF (chronic heart failure) and high bp following a serious CHF problem that went undetected for a year.  I gained 22 lbs in one year.  I had no strength to do any work, no desire to do anything socially and felt weak all the time.  I slept only four hours at night.  I was quickly angered at the slightest irritation.  Family said I was a different person. My doc changed my meds and now I feel like my old self.  I now have to get my liver and kidney checked as I now have a urine problem.

review: started two weeks ago. first time bp medication. week later serious problems neck. debilitating pain including weaknesspain shoulders. driving difficult. occasional sharp stabbing pain right shoulder blade. charlie horse lower calfs middle night. dedicated exercise unable participate activities. two weeks starting days ago) saw dr follow visit. actually laughed hearing neck shoulder pain ive never heard this. actually asked im sure didnt something cause it. also mentioned dont feel good...my head feels funny. (it lower bp.) havent taken anything days neck pain almost gone...i turn head now. shoulder blade pain subsiding. thinking getting new dr.
full_review: Started two weeks ago on 10mg. First time on any BP medication. About a week later had serious problems with my neck. Debilitating pain including weaknesspain in shoulders. Driving was difficult. Occasional sharp stabbing  pain under right shoulder blade. Charlie horse in lower calfs in middle of night. I am dedicated to exercise and have been unable to participate in activities. Two weeks after starting (3 days ago) saw Dr for follow up visit. She actually laughed when hearing of my neck and shoulder pain Ive never heard of this. She actually asked if Im sure I  didnt do something to cause it. I also mentioned that I just dont feel good...my head feels funny. (It did lower my bp.) I havent taken anything for 3 days and my neck pain almost gone...I can turn my head now. Shoulder blade pain subsiding. Thinking of getting a new Dr.

review: took lisinopril months, good lowering blood pressure, however months taking bad allergic reaction. various tests docs think lisinopril. still get severe swelling eyes also red itchy. medicine almost months told may take months leave system may get horrible symptoms does.
full_review: Took Lisinopril for 18 months, it was very good at lowering blood pressure, however after 16 months of taking it I had very bad allergic reaction. After various tests docs think its Lisinopril. I still get severe swelling of eyes which are also red and very itchy. Have been off medicine for almost 3 months but have been told it may take up to 6 months to leave my system so may get these horrible symptoms until it does.

review: took medication recommended doctor hyper tension. prescribed day. second night taking ace inhibitor ended e.r. first night took felt funny figured normal body trying adjust. night woke dead sleep couldnt catch breath. passed woke girlfriend (god bless heart) shaking me. know really scared made question lot things health choices life. one love taking medication. feel like could died know bodys safeguard mechanism kept alive. take.
full_review: Took this medication recommended by my doctor for hyper tension.  Prescribed 10mg once a day.  The second night of taking this ACE inhibitor I ended up in the E.R.  The first night I took it I felt funny but figured this was a normal because my body was trying to adjust.  That night I woke from a dead sleep and couldnt catch my breath.  I passed out and woke up to my girlfriend (God bless her heart) shaking me.  All I know is it really scared me and made me question a lot of things about my health choices and life.  No one I love will be taking this medication.  I feel like I could have died but know my bodys safeguard mechanism kept me alive.  Do not take.

review: caused erectile dysfunction. didnt realize lisinopril culprit. thought getting old years). switched another hypertension medication immediate - unexpected - improvement. wish known couple years ago!
full_review: Caused Erectile Dysfunction.  I didnt realize Lisinopril was the culprit.  I thought that I was just getting old (52 years).  Switched to another hypertension medication and there was an immediate - and unexpected - improvement.  I wish I had known that a couple years ago!

review: hi severe cervicogenic migraines caused trapped nerve neck accompanied severe neck pain migraines per week lasting hrs, daily neck pain months every med sun mris, multiple physios relief. put lisinopril due heart condition within hrs neck pain gone migraines ceased completely.
full_review:
Hi

Severe cervicogenic migraines caused by trapped nerve in neck accompanied with severe neck pain. 2-3 migraines per week lasting 24 hrs, daily neck pain for 9 months on every med under sun, 2 MRIs, multiple physios no relief. Put on Lisinopril due to heart condition and within 24 hrs all neck pain gone and migraines ceased completely.

review: husband taking lisinopril right month, add days that. last week noticed complaining dealing pretty rough heartburn, last days increased dramatically. isnt one complain anything medical related has. also episodes feeling bloated without visible distention could see noticed. heavy feeling sits (upper middle abdomen) well tonight rather hours ago discomfort upper abdomen tenderness, bloated feeling, increase burping, diarrhea, nausea later progressed vomiting. threw bilegreen color. cant lay down.
full_review: My husband has been now been taking Lisinopril right at 1 month, add a few days to that. The last week I noticed him complaining and dealing with some pretty rough heartburn, which just in the last 3 days has increased dramatically. He isnt one to complain about anything medical related but this has. He also has had more episodes of feeling bloated without any visible distention I could see or noticed. Its a heavy feeling that just sits there (upper middle abdomen) Well tonight or rather about 4 hours ago he had the same discomfort in upper abdomen with tenderness, bloated feeling, increase in burping, diarrhea, nausea that later progressed to vomiting. He threw up bilegreen color. Cant lay down.

review: suffered migraines entire life. i’ve tried several medications. relpax migraine medication insurance didn’t want cover. elevated bp due overweight started lisinopril since minimal migraines! lower bp plans come medication enjoy migraines anymore!
full_review: I have suffered from migraines for my entire life. I’ve tried several medications. Relpax was my migraine medication that my insurance didn’t want to cover. I had elevated BP due to being overweight and started lisinopril and have since had minimal migraines! I now have lower BP but have no plans to come off of this medication as I enjoy not having migraines anymore!

review: took months gradually increasing heavy uncontrolled productive cough box tissues every days, coughing spitting. md said related. chest ct showed scar tissue months, previous yearly chest x-rays always negative. insisted stopping, cough subsided days.
full_review: Took it 6 months with gradually increasing heavy and uncontrolled productive cough, 1 box tissues every 2 days, coughing and spitting.  MD said not related.  Chest CT showed scar tissue after the 6 months, previous yearly chest x-rays always negative.  Insisted on stopping, cough subsided after 3 days.

review: diagnosed mild hypertension months ago doc put drug per day. far, moderated bp, working fine me. havent experienced coughs side effects ive reading about.
full_review: Was diagnosed with mild hypertension 3 months ago and my doc put me on the drug at 10m per day. So far, it has moderated my BP, and working fine for me. I havent experienced any of the coughs and side effects that Ive been reading about.

review: year old male diagnosed high blood pressure months ago (otherwise healthy). starting lisinopril diuretic, medication lowered mg lisinoprilday mgday experienced extreme fatigue. medicine lowered bp appears still fatigue every days associated drop pulse even less beatsmin. appear normal rest pulse drops fatigue. wondering anyone else noticed drop pulse associated fatigue? doctors say lisiniprol cant cause never problem prior taking lisinopril even high blood pressure.
full_review: I am 69 year old male diagnosed with high blood pressure 7 months ago (otherwise healthy). After starting with lisinopril and a diuretic, the medication was lowered to just 20 mg lisinoprilday and then to 10 mgday because I experienced extreme fatigue. The medicine has lowered my BP but there appears to be still the fatigue every few days associated with a drop in my pulse to 40 or even less beatsmin. I appear now to have a normal at rest pulse of 58-60min when it was about 70 with no drops and fatigue. I am wondering if anyone else has noticed a drop in pulse associated with their fatigue? My doctors say lisiniprol cant cause this but I never had this problem prior to taking lisinopril even with high blood pressure.

review: ive taken years sudden felt like going anaphylactic shock × worse ended er epipen would work turns lisinopril said could taking years take could happen tell im never taking
full_review: Ive been taken this for 5 years now and all of a sudden it felt like i was going in to anaphylactic shock but 10 × Worse I ended up at the ER because my EpiPen would not work it turns out it was from the lisinopril they said that I could be taking this for 30 years or just take it once and this could happen I tell you what Im never taking it again

review: developed low back, pelvic hip pain affected mobility. difficulty sitting bending without severe pain. took medicine days realizing cause symptoms days almost discomfort gone.
full_review: Developed very low back, pelvic and hip pain that affected my mobility.  I had difficulty sitting and bending without severe pain.  I took this medicine for 6 days before realizing that it was the cause of my symptoms. I have now been off of it for 3 days and almost all of the discomfort is gone.

review: mildly raised blood pressure nurse practitioner advised try lisinopril get - suffering mild ed time months ed much worse - found study online showed% men took lisinopril developed made worse, ed. losartan helped never got back lisinopril - kind male castration?
full_review: I had mildly raised blood pressure 13085 and the nurse practitioner advised me to try lisinopril to get me down to 12080 - I had been suffering from mild ED at that time. After 6 months the ED was much worse - I found a study online that showed 80% of men over 60 who took lisinopril developed or made worse, their ED.  Losartan helped but never got back to where I was before lisinopril - kind of male castration?

review: ive medication years ive never problem it. blood pressure controlled. one day suddenly broke small bumps welts, swollen bottom lip, swollen hands, throat hurt. husband took urgent care center taken emergency room hospital via ambulance. couldnt believe happening. knew something wrong think serious taken hospital. given benadryl thru i..v. meds. advised stop taking lisinopril immediately put different blood pressure medication. appointment pcp next week. swelling completely gone away itching still effect.
full_review: Ive been on this medication for about 3 years and Ive never had a problem with it. My blood pressure was controlled. One day I suddenly broke out with small bumps and welts, swollen bottom lip, swollen hands,  and my throat hurt. My husband took me to the urgent care center and from there I was taken to the emergency room at the hospital via ambulance.  I couldnt believe this was happening.  I knew it was something wrong but did not think it was too serious to be taken to the hospital. I was given benadryl thru an I..V. and other meds. Advised me to stop taking lisinopril immediately and put me on a different blood pressure medication. I have an appointment with my PCP next week. The swelling has completely gone away but the itching is still in effect.

I was very allergic to this medicine I was swollen really badly  my lips  as well as my  tongue. I was very allergic to his medicine.  I needed to be taken of this medicine immediately !!!!!!
