I had only mild headaches my first couple of days but no other symptoms and headaches now are gone.  I think it is going to be great for me.

review: started drug aug second time year ! went earlier year severe calf pain, ache time ! tried diet exercise lower bp genetics kinda took ! so, started drug make sure wasn’t crazy first time sure enough weeks ache back ! darn it. doctor prescribed losarten reading sounds like worse side effects ! bp , sure def going drug , want walk normal again! make sure u read take drug!
full_review: I started this drug on Aug 3, 2019 for the second time this year ! I went off it earlier in the year because of the severe calf pain, they just ache all the time ! Tried to diet and exercise to Lower BP but genetics kinda took over ! So, I started the drug again just to make sure I wasn’t crazy the first time and sure enough with in about 6 weeks the same ache was back ! Darn it. So doctor prescribed losarten and reading about that it sounds like worse side effects ! BP is 12394 , not sure what to do now but def going off this drug , I want to walk normal again! Make sure u read before you take any drug!

review: normal bp life recently spiked rocket high scared hell me, asked doctor put amlodipine, initially, reduced months now, headache first two days starting medicine, headache gone, particular side effects, occasionally constipate, bp spikes, heart fluttering. bp usually normal day time, higher night time. dont dare measure bp night time normally higher sometime around, phobia measuring bp night time.
full_review: Having had normal BP all my life only recently spiked to rocket high 180 that scared the hell out of me, I asked my doctor to put me on amlodipine, initially 5mg, now I reduced it to 2.5mg. Have been on it for 8 months now, having headache for the first two days after starting the medicine, then headache gone, no particular side effects, only occasionally constipate, BP spikes, heart fluttering. BP now usually normal in the day time 12080, higher at night time. I dont dare to measure BP at night time as it is normally higher sometime around 140, I have phobia in  measuring BP at night time.

review: given amlodipine bp rose due grief. im year old female already taking propranalol simvastatin. amlodipine work bp normal feeling ill, dying. stopped taking amlodipine couple days twice returned it. times wasnt taking felt better, stronger normal know med making feel way.
full_review: I was given Amlodipine when my BP rose due to grief. Im 68 year old  female already taking Propranalol and Simvastatin. The Amlodipine  did  work and my BP is now normal but I have the feeling of being very ill, dying. I have stopped taking the Amlodipine for a couple of days twice and then returned to it. Both times when I wasnt taking it I felt better, stronger and more normal so I know it is the med making me feel this way.

review: mg amlodopine high blood pressure. controls bp without question causes sexual dysfunction. ed, overall lack desire sensitivity. suspect cause lower testosterone result drug. cialis works ed, doesnt fix sensitivity lack desire. convinced something else causing issue, perhaps high bp itself days medicine like night day. take medicine, problems return. doctor seems unconcerned issue since meds control bp much write cialis script. cant expect deal this? surprised isnt reported people. maybe me.
full_review: On 10 mg of Amlodopine for high blood pressure. It controls the BP but without question it causes sexual dysfunction. Not just ED, but overall lack of desire and sensitivity. I suspect the cause is lower testosterone as a result of the drug. Cialis works for the ED, but doesnt fix the sensitivity nor the lack of desire. I was convinced it was something else causing the issue, perhaps the high BP itself. But 5 days off the medicine and its like night and day. Take the medicine, and the problems return. Doctor seems unconcerned about this issue since you have to be on meds to control your BP so not much I can do but write the Cialis script. I am only 39. You cant expect me to just deal with this? I am surprised this isnt more reported with people. Maybe its just me.

review: today first day taking drug. started kick hour taking it. seemed good job lowering bp... however, many comments makes feel zombie-like. attempted go sleep laid bed hours straight without ever falling asleep. one moment almost fell asleep, however, ended jumping gasping air... believe taking drug next day.. ever again! based normal sleep, wouldve passed within first hours trying sleep drug kept minding going night long. based dose. blood pressure day went doctor. good luck all...
full_review: Today was the first day of taking the drug. It started to kick in about an hour after taking it. It seemed to do a good job of lowering my BP... however, as many of the comments above it makes you feel zombie-like. When I attempted to go to sleep I laid in bed for 8 hours straight without ever falling asleep. There was one moment when I almost fell asleep, however, I ended up jumping up and gasping for air... I do believe I will not be taking this drug the next day.. or ever again! Based on my normal sleep, I wouldve passed out within the first 1-2 hours of trying to sleep and this drug just kept my minding going all night long. This is based on a 5mg dose. My blood pressure the day I went to the doctor was 150120. Good Luck All...

review: ive taking month great results side effects, weather got colder doctor increased dose, partly wanted better result high blood pressure well. sudden increase caused severe sleepiness tight chest. cut back ease increase ifwhen side effects decrease. believe caution know doctor takes stand.
full_review: Ive been taking 2.5mg for a month with great results and no side effects, until the weather got colder so the doctor increased dose to 5mg, partly because he wanted a better result to my high blood pressure as well. The sudden increase has caused severe sleepiness and a tight chest. I cut back to 3mg for now to ease into it and will increase to 5mg ifwhen the side effects decrease. I believe in caution and I know my doctor takes the same stand.

review: many wont read far coments, found amlodepine work well taking different way. i, too, strong side effects daily. swollen ankles worst,, nausea, tiredness, etc culprits too. asked doctor smallest pill (mg) was. started using day, spreading out. words pill (or approximate times spread out). actually take pills total), still spread out. me, still right effect bringing bp, side effects dispersed much manageable. sit soft chair use recliner reduce ankle swelling.
full_review: Many wont read this far into the coments, but I found Amlodepine to work well by taking it in a different way.  I, too, had some strong side effects on (1) 10mg or (2) 5mg daily.  Swollen ankles were worst,, but nausea, tiredness, etc were culprits too.  I asked my doctor what the smallest pill (mg) was.  It is 2.5.  I started using 4 in a day, but spreading them out.  In other words, a 2.5 pill at 7am, 12pm, 5pm and 10pm (or approximate times spread out).  I now actually only take 3 pills (7.5 total), but still spread them out.  For me, it still has the right effect of bringing down the BP, but the side effects are dispersed out so they are MUCH more manageable.  I sit in a soft chair or use the recliner to reduce ankle swelling.

review: first, quite effective - significantly - lower blood pressure. side effects, works within. downside take achieve full drop, tolerance develops shortly months - taking regularly. good step diuretics, enough itself. addition fantastic prevent migraines; combining lisinopril much better amlodipine alone.
full_review: At first, its quite effective - and significantly does - to lower blood pressure. It has few side effects, and works within 30min-1.5hrs. The only downside is that it can take 6-8hrs to achieve the full drop, and tolerance develops shortly - about 4 months - after taking it regularly. Its a good step above diuretics, but its not enough by itself. In addition its fantastic to prevent migraines; Combining it with Lisinopril is much better than Amlodipine alone.

review: blood pressure issue. another drug put didnt work. doc suggested amlodipine generic norvasc. first day bp something like. took new med afternoon late, within hours. thought fast doc said give days start working. second day noticed becoming edgy almost scared. anxiety started creeping in. started feeling tingling infingers feet. third day tingling turned slight numbness areas. also got severe headaches back head. legs arms felt weak well. almost day im water retention. im coming drug.
full_review: Had blood pressure issue. Another drug that I was put on didnt work. Doc suggested Amlodipine which is the generic for Norvasc. First day my bp was something like 14590. Took new med on the afternoon late, and within 2 hours it was down to 11770. I thought that was fast because Doc said to give it a few days to start working. Second day I noticed myself becoming edgy and almost scared. Anxiety was started creeping in. Started feeling tingling infingers and feet. The third day the tingling turned to slight numbness in those areas. I also got severe headaches to the back of my head. Legs and arms felt very weak as well. Its almost day for and im having water retention. Im coming off of this drug.

review: started amlopidine months ago. bp dr.s. goes time afternoon, goes every while, causing spaced feeling. ive terrible headaches week, dizziness, cough. cant drive.. getting this, felt much better before. retired started med. totally independent, stuck home.
full_review: Started on the Amlopidine 3 months ago. Bp was 15074 at Dr.s.  Now it goes to 145 about 1 time in afternoon, but goes down to 9958 every once and a while, causing me spaced out feeling.  Ive had terrible headaches all this week, dizziness, cough. Cant drive..  I am getting off this, because I felt much better before.  I had just retired when I started this med.  Was totally independent, now stuck at home.

review: i’m year old female. previously ramipril stop due permanent tickling annoying cough developed. began taking amlodipine months ago. couple bouts dizziness, neck pain, swollen hands, etc never thought could due medication, recently reading side effects. recently anxiety levels sky rocketed, motivation, concentration mood significantly plummeted-i going request gp changes meds stop awful low mooddepressed state, sure it’s medication.
full_review: I’m a 51 year old female. Previously on Ramipril which I had to stop due to the permanent tickling annoying cough which I developed. Began taking Amlodipine 5mg some months ago. Had a couple of bouts of dizziness, have had neck pain, swollen hands, etc but had never thought this could be due to this medication, until recently and reading up on the side effects. Very recently my anxiety levels sky rocketed, my motivation, concentration and mood significantly plummeted-I am now going to request my GP changes my meds to stop my awful low mooddepressed state, as I am sure it’s because of this medication.

review: started med...as side effects ive swelling hands, feet throat area. one item would like add list is...insomnia. three nights row. see dr. next week.
full_review: I started this med: 31813...As for side effects Ive had all but swelling in hands, feet and throat area. One item I would like to add to the list is...Insomnia. Three nights now but not in a row.  I see the Dr. next week.

review: amlodipine since diagnosed raynauds syndrome years ago. many years mild. got point hand wrist would turn black reaching fridge ask help. doctor said lucky, cut digits they’re black. always rushed warm fingers toes. take mg leg swells enough save me.
full_review: I am 74 and have been on Amlodipine since diagnosed with Raynauds syndrome about 10 years ago. I had it for many years before that but only mild. When it got to a point that my hand and wrist would turn black just from reaching into the fridge I had to ask for help. Doctor said I was lucky, they cut off digits when they’re black. I always rushed to warm up and I have all my fingers and toes.  I can only take 2.5 mg or my leg swells but it has been enough to save me.

review: migraine since. would get least week manageable weeks one horrendous every months would leave stuck bed day wiped nervous system edge. felt like senses place even able focus opening door handle. started taking amlodipine weeks ago realised today i’ve single migraine. visual disturbances aura issues either. minimal occasional headache goes away without need pain relievers. glad medication another effect. suspected would case widens blood vessels one consultants suggested migraines caused blood vessels contract causing migraine.
full_review:
Had migraine since I was 19 and now 45. 
Would get at least 1 a week that was manageable but very few weeks one that was horrendous and every 6 months 1 that would leave me stuck In bed all day wiped out and all my nervous system was on edge. Felt like my senses were all over the place not even able to focus on opening a door handle. 

Started taking Amlodipine 8 weeks ago and realised today I’ve not had a single migraine.  No visual disturbances or other aura issues either.  Minimal occasional headache that goes away without any need for pain relievers. 

Glad that this medication has another effect. I suspected this would be the case as it widens the blood vessels and one of my consultants suggested my migraines were caused when the blood vessels contract causing the Migraine.

review: male, served fireman years, suffered migraine least two week age. mine related food, alcohol, vinegar etc. hell years. tried called preventative medicines avail, managed control imigran. last year prescribed amlodipine slightly high blood pressure. amazement migraine stopped completely. gone two week zero! life changing say least. enjoy alcohol, pizza, cheese, vinegar, chocolate ! hope helps someone live normal life.
full_review: I am a 62 male, served as a fireman for 33 years, and suffered with migraine at least two a week from the age of 21. Mine being related to food, alcohol, vinegar etc. Has been hell for years. I have tried all the so called preventative medicines to no avail, but managed to control them with Imigran. Last year I was prescribed Amlodipine 5mg for slightly high blood pressure. To my amazement my migraine has stopped completely. So I have gone from two a week to zero! Life changing to say the least. I now enjoy alcohol, pizza, cheese, vinegar, chocolate ! Hope this helps someone to live a normal life.

review: ive med ten years find quick acting effective. bp meds side effects. take nebivolol, norvasc telmisartan, latter two maximum dosage. im, male.
full_review: Ive been on this med for more than ten years and find it quick acting and effective. All BP meds have side effects. I take nebivolol, norvasc and telmisartan, the latter two maximum dosage. Im 78, male.

full_review:
Hi. I just started this amlodipine 4 days ago and since I started I’ve had this gnawing pain in my stomach. Never had it before so I can only attribute it to this drug but I’m only on 2.5 mg.
I don’t know if it’s going to be worth staying on this unless the stomach ache stops. I’ve had to use an ice pack on my stomach because of the discomfort I guess I’m wondering if after 4 days can you just stop taking it I know if you’re on it for a considerable amount of time you have to be careful but it’s only been 4 days. 
We’ve tried a few different medications but I have side effects to  the blood pressure meds and the only time my blood pressure is really elevated as when I go to my doctors appointment at home it’s not that bad.  This was a last ditch effort to try a BP Med.  I much rather just make a few lifestyle changes which I’ve already done but they say that you still may need a medication even with changes

review: days amlopidine, last cut. many symptoms scare me, flushing, sleepiness, pounding heart , palpitations felt neck , muscle twitching, reflux. since reflux lessened little, also pounding heart, feeling palpitations day, feel something skin time time. asking dr monday take pill. worried read needs wean people worst symptoms even heart attack stopping abruptly.
full_review:
15 days on amlopidine 5mg, the last 6 I cut it down to 2.5.
I did it because I was having many symptoms that scare me, flushing, sleepiness, pounding heart , palpitations felt on neck , muscle twitching, reflux.   Since I am on 2.5 the reflux lessened a little, and also pounding heart, feeling some palpitations about once in the day, but now I feel something in the skin all over from time to time.  Asking dr on Monday to take me off the pill.  But I am worried because I read that it needs to be wean off because there have been people that had worst symptoms  even heart attack after stopping them abruptly.

review: prescribed norvasc, high blood pressure. ive always low blood pressure, rheumatoid arthritis doc put prednisone result high blood pressure. hence, norvasc. prescribed mg., first day taking it, every day since, major heart palpitations. nice feeling. also feel wired. far, liking medication all! medications, treat illness symptoms, bring entirely new set problems?
full_review: I was just prescribed Norvasc, for my high blood pressure.  Ive always had low blood pressure, but my Rheumatoid Arthritis Doc put me on prednisone and the result was high blood pressure.  Hence, Norvasc.  I was prescribed 5 mg., and the first day of taking it, and every day since,  I have had major heart palpitations.  Not a nice feeling.  I also feel WIRED.  So far, not liking this medication at all!  Why do medications, to treat illness and symptoms, bring an entirely new set of problems?

review: taking amlodipine years now, also ms side effects put ms. hospital really bad tongue mouth ulcers, last years also hospital badly bloated stomach, look like months pregnant, (both side effects) tests come back ok. balance terrible recently two bad falls week! constant ringing ears, cramp feet night, feel tired sleep afternoons, swollen feet ankles. researching side effects amlodipine made realise symptoms probably due awful drug. seeing doc next week get changed
full_review: I have been taking Amlodipine for about 3 years now, I also have MS so some of the side effects I have been having I put down to MS.  I  have been under the hospital for really bad tongue and mouth ulcers, for the last 2.5 years and also under the hospital for a badly bloated stomach, I look like I am 7 or 8 months pregnant, (both side effects) all tests have come back ok. My balance is terrible and recently had two bad falls in a week! I have constant ringing in my ears, cramp in my feet at night, feel tired and have to have a sleep most afternoons,  Swollen feet and ankles. Researching the side effects of Amlodipine has made me realise all these symptoms are probably due to this awful drug.  Will be seeing doc next week to get it changed

review: medication many side effects think all. redness face, swelling ankles hands, severe knee pain, nausea name few. left knee much fluid aspirated three times one doctor said word. read posts decided stop taking felt better days knee doesnt hurt poison every morning......
full_review: This medication has many side effects and I think that I had them all. Redness of the face, swelling of ankles and hands, severe knee pain, nausea to name a few. My left knee had so much fluid I had it aspirated three times and not one Doctor said a word. I read some posts and decided to stop taking it and I felt better in a few days and my knee doesnt hurt. 5mgs of poison every morning......

review: started day. within days bp raised significantly. dosage increased, large rise bp. another increase day bp skyrocketed whole body swelling days amlodipine bp close normal
full_review: I was started on 2.5mg a day. Within 2 days my BP raised significantly. The dosage was increased to 5mg, again a large rise in BP. Another increase to 10mg day and BP skyrocketed with whole body swelling. 2 days off amlodipine and BP is close to normal

review: following massive bp spike history high blood pressure started three weeks ago. day one blinding debilitating headache but, positive, bp dropping. second week headache eased chest & stomach pain, leg cramps, left leg swelling, fatigue & dizziness became increasingly worse. three blackout falls (two badly), doctor advised stop immediately. three days pains & steadier worrying arrythmia. credit dropped bp. happy take ride side effects impact great me. clearly medicine work though. lifestyle, diet & careful consideration meds.
full_review:
Following a massive BP spike and a history of high blood pressure I started on 5mg three weeks ago. From day one I had a blinding debilitating headache but, on a positive, my bp was dropping. Second week headache eased but chest & stomach pain, leg cramps, left leg swelling, fatigue & dizziness became increasingly worse. After three blackout falls (two very badly),  the doctor advised me to stop immediately. Three days off it and now no pains & steadier but have worrying arrythmia. To its credit it has dropped my BP. 
I was happy to take it and ride out any side effects but the impact was too great for me. Clearly this medicine does work for some though. Lifestyle, diet & careful consideration to any meds.

review: years mgday. clearly causing legs swell, nevertheless, persisted. eventually, elephant legs much take, stopped amlodipine, cold turkey. lost pounds water next days low behold, blood pressure went way, way down! hit los, prompted stop another bp med, losartan, turned causing chronic leg pain! chlorthalidone, bp bit high, sure way go next. maybe try cutting salt. get elephant legs amlodipine, maybd cut dose cut drug, try different way lower bp.
full_review: I was on this for about 2 years, 10 mgday. It was clearly causing my legs to swell, but nevertheless, I persisted. Eventually, the elephant legs were too much for me to take, so I stopped the amlodipine, cold turkey. I lost 8 pounds of water over the next few days and low and behold, blood pressure went way, way down! I hit as los as 10959, which prompted me to stop another BP med, losartan, which turned out to have been causing my chronic leg pain! I am now only on chlorthalidone, with a bp a bit high at 13582, not sure which way to go next. Maybe try cutting salt. If you get the elephant legs from amlodipine,  maybd cut the dose or cut out the drug, try a different way to lower BP.

review: extremely dizzy , lightheaded bouts vertigo. insomnia common symptoms came kind depression feeling like world spinning. bp control! effective side effects much.
full_review:
Extremely dizzy , lightheaded and bouts of vertigo. Insomnia was common and with having all those symptoms came a kind of depression from feeling like the world was spinning 247. But my BP was under control!
So effective but the side effects for me were too much.

review: taking amlodipine days now. first day felt fine, second day panic attack train work, shook core havent felt right since. fluttering heartbeat, feeling nervous anxious reason, feeling like im totally body moment. woke mild panic attack couldnt sleep another hour. ringing ears tingling fingers toes. taking perindopril combi, never adverse reaction previous blood pressure medication. im scared keep taking medication, thought imagining things researched found many, many others similar worse reactions. scheduled doctor appointment change meds. im&f
full_review: Have been taking Amlodipine for 4 days now. After first day felt fine, second day had a panic attack on the train to work, shook me to the core and havent felt right since. Fluttering heartbeat, feeling nervous and anxious for no reason, feeling like Im not totally in my body or in the moment. Woke up at 4am and had a mild panic attack and couldnt sleep for another hour. Ringing in ears and tingling fingers and toes. Taking this with perindopril combi 5mg, have NEVER had any adverse reaction to previous blood pressure medication. Im so scared to keep taking this medication, thought I was imagining things until I researched and found many, many others similar and worse reactions. Have scheduled doctor appointment to change meds. Im 20&F

review: gp visit said bp slightly high age. put amlodipine weeks ago, horrible nightmares, swollen hands feet.tinnitus unbearable, told effects would wear stick it weeks got thought flu, badly congested chest point couldnt speak without losing breath. week ago, fast heart like heart trying punch way chest. ended a@e, fast tachy, heavy chest, arm pains, symptoms heart attack. stopped three days. irregular beats subsiding, feeling little better. panic attacks like wouldnt believe drug, banned, wait another days stays system days minimum.gp denied symptoms drug, is! waiting see ep successful ablation af years ago see undone good work.
full_review:
After GP visit he said my BP was slightly high age 50. Put me on 5mg amlodipine, that was 6 weeks ago, horrible nightmares, swollen hands and feet.Tinnitus which is unbearable, told the effects would wear off stick with it.4 weeks in got what I thought was flu, badly congested chest to the point couldnt speak without losing breath.
A week ago, fast heart like my heart was trying to punch its way out of my chest. Ended up in A@E, fast tachy, heavy chest, arm pains, symptoms of a heart attack.
Stopped now for three days. Irregular beats now subsiding, and feeling a little better. Panic attacks like you wouldnt believe and its down to this drug, should be banned, Now having to wait another 9 days as it stays in your system for 11-15 days minimum.GP denied any of the symptoms were down to this drug, it is! So now waiting to see my EP who did my successful ablation for AF years ago to see if its undone any of his good work.

review: advised doctor stopped taking amlodipine. prescribed years ago always believed high blood pressure readings stressed doctors convinced right. nightmare problems frequent urination, sometimes times hour good day, every two hours (good days exceptional) bathe week skin itchy unbearable. get extreme dizzy spells although year still feel hot flushes menopause. medication like poison me. one really believed spoke practice nurse totally agreed come gave doctor readings taken bp monitor which, although stopped two weeks before, completely normal (in readings low ) trust judgement. feel stolen last five years me...
full_review: I have advised my doctor that I have now stopped taking Amlodipine.  I was prescribed it 5 years ago but have always believed my high blood pressure readings were only when stressed out or at the doctors and now I am convinced that I am right.   I have had nightmare problems with frequent urination, sometimes 6 times an hour and on a good day, every two hours (good days are exceptional)   I can only bathe once a week as my skin is so itchy its unbearable.  I now get extreme dizzy spells and although I will be 70 this year I still feel hot flushes as if I am in the menopause.   This medication has been like poison to me.  No one really believed me until I spoke to the practice nurse and she totally agreed that I should come off it and gave the doctor the readings I had taken with my own bp monitor which, although I had stopped it over two weeks before, was completely normal (in some readings as low as 60 )  trust your own judgement.  I feel it has stolen the last five years from me...

review: mg lisinopril many years issues blood work revealed kidney issues (which lisinopril cause) md took lisinopril. bp ok started creeping up. prescribed mg amlodipine week ago. medication making feel awful; tired unmotivated actually feel depressed (well makes sense slows heart rate) also experienced constipation something i’m willing deal with. called md’s office today nurse advised discontinue, gladly do! sensitive medication probably typical. hope find something else put back lisinopril monitor closely
full_review: I was on 5 mg of Lisinopril for many years with no issues until blood work revealed some kidney issues (which Lisinopril can cause)  My MD took me off Lisinopril. BP was ok for a while but started creeping up. I was prescribed 5 mg of Amlodipine a week ago. This medication is making me feel awful; I am tired and unmotivated I actually feel depressed (well that makes sense if it slows the heart rate) I have also experienced  constipation which is not something I’m willing to deal with. I called the MD’s  office today and  nurse advised me to discontinue, which  I will gladly do! I am very sensitive to medication so this is probably not typical. I hope they can find something else or just put me back on Lisinopril and monitor me closely

review: im lbs norvasc repeated bp readings. norvasc brought bp first months. started getting heart palpitations. would also start feeling flushed & dizzy. became progressively worse point couldnt stand dizziness. heart palpitations occurred frequently. doctor took blood, ekg also two stress tests. negative (bp went back - average). stopped taking norvasc months, doctor put lisinopril. diet improved past months (i always done cardio), stopped bp meds days bp (which take several times day) hovers. im longer dizzy feel flush. still get heart palpitations every hours hasnt fully explained. bottom line (imo), without meds changed diet (which good start - needed make adjustments).
full_review:
Im 55 and 195 lbs. Was on 5mg Norvasc after repeated BP readings of 160+80. Norvasc brought my BP down to 14080 for the first 3 months.  Then I started getting heart palpitations. I would also start feeling flushed & dizzy. It became progressively worse to the point I couldnt stand because of my dizziness. Heart palpitations occurred frequently.  Doctor took blood, EKG and also did two stress tests. All were negative (BP went back up to 16575 - on average).

I stopped taking Norvasc after 6 months, Doctor put me on 10mg Lisinopril.  As my diet improved over the past 6 months (I have always done cardio), I stopped any BP meds.  It been 24 days and my BP (which I take several times a day) hovers between 12075 to 14182. Im no longer dizzy or feel flush.  Still get heart palpitations every few hours that hasnt fully been explained.  Bottom line is (IMO), I can do without meds by having changed my diet (which was good to start with - Just needed to make some adjustments).

review: put high blood pressure got terrible pains legs. started get brown staining legs. every doctor saw said know could side effect tablet. im truly angry, legs mess nhs longer veins ha told treatment correct pay for. shame company shame let terrible drug get licenced use. thank god think makers need sort consequences drug. live this! company prescribe drug making loads money..... hand left disgusting legs.... eone needs put right!
full_review: I was put on it for high blood pressure and got terrible pains in my legs. I then started to get brown staining on my legs. Every doctor I saw said they did not know what it was and could not be a side effect of the tablet. It is Im truly angry, my legs are a mess and the NHS no longer does veins so I ha ve been told any treatment to correct this I will have to pay for. Shame on the company and shame on those who let this terrible drug get licenced for use. Thank god I am off it but I think the makers need to sort out the consequences of this drug. I have to live with this! The company and those who prescribe this drug are making loads of money..... I on the other hand am left with disgusting legs.... So eone needs to put this right!

review: amlodipine week started experiencing: occasional double vision, hip pain, serious nightmare. sound asleep sudden throat felt like worst case acid reflux ever could catch breath; immediately came upright could breath; feeling immediately went away indication acid reflux occurred (no terrible taste throat, soreness) assume realistic nightmare, fact could breath seemed real. im sure want continue taking drug. sometimes feel like guinea pig pharmaceutical companies.
full_review: I have been on Amlodipine for 1 week now and here is what I have started experiencing: occasional double vision, some hip pain, and a very serious nightmare. I was sound asleep when all of a sudden my throat felt like I was having the worst case of acid reflux I have ever had and I could not catch my breath; I immediately came upright because I could not breath; the feeling immediately went away but there was no indication that acid reflux had occurred (no terrible taste in my throat, no soreness) so I assume it was a very realistic nightmare, but the fact I could not breath seemed very real.  Im not sure I want to continue taking this drug. Sometimes I feel like a guinea pig for pharmaceutical companies.

review: started amlodipine months ago blood pressure dropped weeks noticed footankle swelling, doctor prescribed diuretic, didnt work. bad itch bumpy blistery looking rash. past month, im exhausted, dull nagging headache, general malaise, shortness breath, lethargic, gained lbs. used power walk weights miles week, stopped due shortness breath. ride bike get winded point dizziness nausea. glad found reviews think blood pressure medicines.
full_review: Started  amlodipine 3 months ago and blood pressure dropped from 16090 to 13570. After 2 weeks I noticed footankle swelling, doctor prescribed diuretic, didnt work. Now bad itch and bumpy blistery looking rash. For the past month, Im exhausted, dull nagging headache, general malaise, shortness of breath, lethargic, gained 5 lbs. I used to power walk with weights 3 miles 5X week, but stopped due to shortness of breath. When I ride my bike I get winded to the point of dizziness and nausea. Glad I found these reviews I think its the Blood pressure medicines.

review: blood pressure meds years now. blood pressure borderline high anxiety usually, get real anxious goes way. tried lisinopril past best results. time around doctor tried norvasc. soon started taking blood pressure went up, feet ankles swelled got headaches. also bad panic attack blood pressure went sky high. didn’t control whatsoever. haven’t taken today yesterday went grocery take bp see was. kids fighting assumed going high actually better it’s weeks. don’t recommend medication. also get migraines supposed prevent well made head hurt.
full_review: I have been off and on blood pressure meds for years now. My blood pressure is borderline high from anxiety 135:86 usually, but when I get real anxious it goes way up to about 150110. I have tried lisinopril in the past with the best results. This time around my doctor tried me on norvasc 5mg. As soon as I started taking it my blood pressure went up, my feet and ankles swelled and I got headaches. I also had a bad panic attack and my blood pressure went sky high. It didn’t control it whatsoever. I haven’t taken it today or yesterday so I went to the grocery to take my bp to see what it was. My kids were fighting so I assumed it was going to be high and it was actually better than it’s been in a few weeks. Don’t recommend this medication.  I also get migraines and this is supposed to prevent them as well and it made my head hurt.

review: idea physician prescribed migraines. initially prescribed hypertension. also migraines, since taking this, headaches decreased dramatically. rarely migraine more. blessing! love medication. worked wonders quality life.
full_review: I had no idea my physician prescribed this to me for migraines. I was initially prescribed this for hypertension. I also have migraines, but since taking this, my headaches have decreased dramatically. I rarely have a migraine any more. Its been a blessing! I love this medication. Its worked wonders for my quality of life.

review: amlodipine weeks now. first week worst crazy fast heartbeats, sweating, farting hot flashes. week symptoms started subside thing lightheaded stand fast. blood pressure crazy high like stroke level, medication around. gotten better since history high blood pressure, numbers always high.
full_review: I have been on amlodipine for about 3 weeks now. The first week was the worst with the crazy fast heartbeats, sweating, farting and the hot flashes. But after that week the symptoms started to subside and now the only thing I have is lightheaded when I stand up too fast. My blood pressure was crazy high like 220119 stroke level, and now after the medication its around 15799. It has gotten better but since I have a history of high blood pressure, my numbers will always be high.

review: prescribed march attempts starting medication extreme headaches-felt like head vice. several calls later better outcome taking night per pharmacy feel tightness chest raising stress levels believe high bp originates. also struggle depression low feelings help manage. prescribed simvastatin time. going stop amlodipine.
full_review: Prescribed 19 March 2021. Had 3 attempts at starting this medication as such extreme headaches-felt like head in a vice. Several calls later had better outcome taking at night per pharmacy but now feel tightness in chest which is raising my stress levels which I believe is where the high BP originates. Also struggle with depression and these low feelings do not help me manage. Prescribed simvastatin at same time. Going to stop the amlodipine.

review: using amolpodine months. terrible side effects drug. ankles legs swell retain water. one stage; gained kilograms retained water. dont know do. would rather taking drugs feel choice. go gym times day made life style changes lower blood pressure work; put drug doctor. looking options.
full_review: I have been using Amolpodine for about 5 months. I have terrible side effects with this drug. My ankles and legs swell up and I retain water. At one stage; I gained 5 kilograms as I retained water. I just dont know what to do. I would rather not be taking any drugs but I feel I have no choice. I go to the gym 3 times a day and made life style changes to lower my blood pressure but when this did not work; I was put on the drug by my doctor. I am looking at other options.

review: amlodipine ten years. past years experienced increasing swelling feet ankles made walking uncomfortable. tried coming medicine swelling feet completely gone. feet gone two sizes back original size. pain gone feet walk like twenty year old.
full_review: I have been on amlodipine for about ten years. For the past few years I have experienced increasing swelling of my feet and ankles and it made walking uncomfortable. I tried coming of the medicine and all swelling in feet has completely gone. My feet have gone down two sizes back to my original size 4. All the pain gone in my feet and I walk like a twenty year old.

review: started norvasc hospital severe hypertension days starting it, slayed butt! stayed another week follow dr’ appt. time exhausted didn’t move, stayed recliner! constant head ache, ankles swelled twice size brought blood pressure little! horrible bc i’m usually pretty active! dr put another class drug working great!
full_review: I started Norvasc 10mg in hospital for severe hypertension. 5 days after starting it, It slayed my butt! Stayed on for another week until follow up Dr’ appt. During that time I was so exhausted I didn’t move, I stayed in my recliner! Constant head ache, my ankles swelled twice their size and only brought my blood pressure down very little!  How horrible bc I’m usually pretty active! Dr put me on another class of drug and its working great!

review: regular unilateral migraines many years used take sumatriptan per week. history high blood pressure. prescribed amlodipine eight weeks ago, havent migraine since. side effects either. first days mild bilateral headache, since then, nothing all.
full_review: Had regular unilateral migraines for many years and used to take Sumatriptan once per week. No history of high blood pressure. I was prescribed Amlodipine 5mg eight weeks ago, and havent had a migraine since. I have had no side effects either. The first 2-3 days I had a mild bilateral headache, but since then, nothing at all.

review: yo female diagnosed (freakishly) high blood pressure mg. amlodipine prescribed along losartan others. pressure control, side effects horrendous: swollen gums, pain calves, dizziness, shortness breath, extreme fatigue, unusual weakness, belching, gas, cracked, dry itchy skin, changes vision. swollen feet ankles...i could go on. cardiologist discontinued today difference! much, much better! whew!
full_review: 67 yo female diagnosed with (freakishly) high blood pressure.  266177.  10 mg. amlodipine was prescribed along with Losartan and a few others. Pressure has been under control, but the side effects have been horrendous:  Swollen gums, pain in calves, dizziness, shortness of breath, extreme fatigue, unusual weakness, belching, gas, cracked, dry and itchy skin, changes in my vision.  Swollen feet and ankles...I could go on.  My cardiologist discontinued it today and what a difference!  Much, much better!  Whew!

review: i’m years old female taking amlodipine approximately months consecutively. couple months experienced something strange... lower back went me. never happened before. couldn’t stand straight least week! hair thinning rapidly well! i’m scared also lot weird dreams nightmares drink strong coffee get day without sleeping.
full_review: I’m 44 years old female and I have been taking amlodipine 5mg  for approximately  6 months consecutively. After about a couple months I experienced something strange... my lower back went out on me.  This never happened before. I couldn’t stand up straight for at least a week! My hair has been thinning out rapidly as well! I’m scared now and I also have a lot of weird dreams  nightmares and have to drink strong coffee to get through the day without sleeping.

review: diagnosed hypertension june. given amlodipine together another arb medication. didnt swollen feet ankles suffered insomnia anxiety medication. lowered stabilized bp somehow months afternoon bp would still go much+. experimenting herbal supplements like olive leaf extract lower bp hopefully transition herbal supplements safely successfully. rx meds altho agree grateful point time, med also helped me.
full_review: I was diagnosed with hypertension in June of 2019. I was given amlodipine 5mg together with another ARB medication. No I didnt have swollen feet and ankles but I suffered from insomnia and anxiety because of this medication. It lowered and stabilized my BP somehow after a few months but in the afternoon my BP would still go up as much as 140+ over 90+. I am experimenting with herbal supplements like olive leaf extract to lower my BP and hopefully I can transition to herbal supplements safely and successfully. Rx meds are not for me altho I do agree and and am grateful that in some point in time, this med has also helped me.

review: took one tablet amlodipine besylate wednesday morning. seven hours later, noticed pink tissue going toilet peed. stopped taking it. blood urine lasted friday. (i noticed small flecks red friday, too.) higher bp reading due stress led doctor prescribing extra prescription. one stressors white coat syndrome. now, wants visit urologist. side effects less output urine less frequent urination loose stools thursday. weakness pain legs friday. dizziness symptoms gone saturday. saturday, feeling much better.
full_review: I took one tablet of amlodipine besylate on Wednesday morning.  Seven hours later, I noticed pink tissue going down the toilet when I peed.  I stopped taking it. Blood with the urine lasted until Friday. (I noticed a few small flecks of red on Friday, too.) A higher bp reading due to stress had led to the doctor prescribing  this extra prescription.  One of my stressors is white coat syndrome. Now, he wants me to visit a urologist. My other side effects were less output of urine and less frequent urination.  I had 3 loose stools on Thursday. Weakness and pain in the legs on Friday. Most dizziness and all other symptoms gone by Saturday. On Saturday, I was feeling much better.

review: lowering blood pressure side effects amlodipine months. another medication anxiety got off. got off, started side effects hot flashes, irritability, nausea, muscle pain, dizziness, continued constipation able sleep. decided look side effects amlodipine found side effects getting anxiety medicine amlodipine. wean drug take one years alone give side effects lower pressure itself.
full_review:
10 for lowering blood pressure
2 for other side effects 

I have been on amlodipine for about 10 months. I was on another medication for anxiety but got off.  When I got off, I started having side effects such as hot flashes, irritability, nausea, muscle  pain,  dizziness, continued constipation and not being able to sleep. I decided to look up side effects of amlodipine and found out that the side effects was not from getting off of the anxiety medicine but from the amlodipine. I am about to wean myself off of this drug and take the one I have been on for years alone that does not give me side effects but does not lower my pressure by itself.

review: review dated august says used medication years, actually correct time months used years. way could stand use years months way long is. body aches left yet months use. stopped immediately adverse affects stopping aches pains using still apparent, i’m hoping pains aches permanent months use.
full_review: My review dated August 14 says I used this medication for 10 years,  actually the correct time is only 3 months used  not 10 years.  There is no way I could stand to use this 10 years, 3 months was way too long as it is.  Body aches have not left yet after 3 months of use.  I stopped immediately with no adverse affects from stopping but my aches and pains from using this are still apparent,  I’m hoping my pains aches are not permanent after only 3 months of use.

review: put drug months ago existing dose ramapril) working well prescribed years ago. initially started) dose began notice muscle cramps walking half mile, meanwhile blood pressure improve much doctor increased mg, point made connection drug muscle cramps increase muscle pain kicked earlier earlier within weeks could barely walk distance all,i realised seemed coincide started increased drug!i seen doctor agreed come drug,i also suffered blotchy red skin patches left foot ulcer sure also connected not? also constantly feel tired often going sleep minutes sit down!
full_review: I was put on this drug 6 months ago as my existing dose of Ramapril (10mg) was not working as well as when prescribed 8 years ago. Initially I started on  a (5mg) dose and began to notice muscle cramps when walking more than about half a mile, meanwhile my blood pressure did not improve much so doctor increased this to 10 mg, at this point I had made no connection between the drug and the muscle cramps but after this increase the muscle pain kicked in earlier and earlier and within a few weeks I could barely walk any distance at all,I then realised that this seemed to coincide with when I started and then increased this drug!I have seen my doctor and we have agreed that I come off this drug,I have also suffered blotchy red skin patches on my left foot and an ulcer but not sure if this is also connected or not? I also constantly feel very tired often going to sleep minutes after I sit down!

review: amlodipine month feel tired. aching muscles also. work gym like always noon tired, headache, swollen feet, ankles sometimes hands, swelling varies worst evening. getting hot. blood pressure good though. call new doctor tomorrow discuss cant imagine feeling bad every day.
full_review: I have been on Amlodipine for a month and I feel so tired. I have aching muscles also. I work out at my gym like always but by 12 noon I am so tired, have a headache, swollen feet, ankles and sometimes hands, swelling varies with the worst by evening. I am now getting so hot. My blood pressure is good though. I will call my new Doctor tomorrow and discuss all this as I cant imagine feeling so bad every day.

review: amlodipine great drug keeping bp low take pm benicar morning. problem amlodipine take wines bp drops get lightheaded doc said hold back amlodipine im going couple drinks sure anyone experiences mixing alcohol talk lightheadedness wow.i big drinker benefits outweigh risks. good combo benicar amlodipine went unless im stressed bp meds going help relaxed.
full_review: Amlodipine has been great drug for keeping BP low I take it in the PM and benicar in the the morning.  The only problem I have with amlodipine is if I take it and have a few wines my BP drops to 10960 get lightheaded so doc said hold back on amlodipine if Im going to have a couple drinks not sure if anyone experiences this when mixing with alcohol but talk about lightheadedness wow.I m not a big drinker so the benefits outweigh the risks. Good combo benicar and amlodipine for me went from 15085 to 11770 unless Im stressed out then no BP meds going to help until your relaxed.

review: year ago started high blood pressure issues . cardiologist put dose months, blood pressure actually going , dr. added another taken day. notice ankles little swollen, knew one effects. started second pill february soon noticed side effects. feet couple nights fat couldnt see toes! soon noticed flushing arms chest, tingling arms, inner body tremors, ringing ears, going bathroom times night, red eye lids, chills , sweating, dry mouth right, leg burning , weird dreams, sick stomach , discharge, sharp icepick headaches, dizzy, hr ! back forth dr times months trying find sort infection going on. took days ago, inner body tremors left! caused amlodipine! walk away!
full_review: About a year ago I started having some high blood pressure issues . My Cardiologist put me on 2.5 dose. After about 8 months, my blood pressure was actually not going down , so my Dr. added another 2.5 to be taken 2xs a day. I did notice my ankles were a little swollen, I knew that was one  effects. I started my second pill in February and soon after I noticed more side effects. My feet for a couple nights were so fat that you couldnt see my toes! Soon after I noticed flushing in my arms and chest, tingling in my arms, inner body tremors, ringing in my ears, going to the bathroom 3-4 times at night, red eye lids, chills , sweating, dry mouth right, leg burning , weird dreams, sick to my stomach , discharge, sharp icepick headaches, dizzy, HR was up and down ! I was back and forth to the Dr 5 times for about 2 months trying to find out if I had some sort of infection going on. I took myself off 90 days ago, only inner body tremors are left! All were caused from Amlodipine! WALK AWAY!

review: taking norvasc months found feet ankles hands swelling up, also gained weight even though walk every day. doctor put avapro monitor next months.
full_review: After taking Norvasc 10mg for 3 months I found my feet ankles and hands were swelling up, also gained weight even though I walk every day. My Doctor has put me on Avapro and I will monitor it for the next 3 months.

review: terrible time blood pressure medicine. received mg hydrochlorothiazide lab work doctor said losing much potassium took it. take triamterene mg tablet. medicine gave potassium also two diuretics. experienced increased bruising weakness legs cramping lower legs difficult get pool exercising. taking amlodipine mg tablet. ankles feet swell something awful, legs feel swollen well developed terrible rash across breasts year old female.
full_review: I have had a terrible time with blood pressure medicine.  I received 25 mg on Hydrochlorothiazide but after lab work my doctor said I was losing too much potassium so he took me off it.  He then had me take Triamterene, 37.5-5.25 mg tablet.  This medicine gave me potassium but also had two diuretics.  I experienced increased bruising and weakness in my legs and cramping in my lower legs that it was very difficult to get out of the pool after exercising.  I am  now taking Amlodipine 5 mg tablet.  My ankles and feet swell up something awful, my legs feel very swollen as well and I have developed a terrible rash across my breasts.  I am a 63 year old female.

review: thought amlodipine good pressure. taking several years, find different. asking doc change med insisted working others could handle it. find lump neck, end story. upset.
full_review: I thought Amlodipine was good for my pressure. After taking it for several years, I find out different. I had been asking my doc to change my med but he insisted that it was working for me when others could not handle it. Now I find a lump on my neck, end of story. I am very upset.

review: put amlodipine twice day losartan day three days ago going er high bp already experienced side affects, tiredness vivid dreams, i’m afraid else coming drug, kept bp normal range. previously put clonidine doctor, since told it’s number line starter drugs bp. given lisinopril caused awful cough. another two drugs prescribed one back order another one available. amlodipine losartan. afraid take drug twice day read it’s usually given day. even take meds i’m stressed out, bp medication next recalled?
full_review:
I was put on Amlodipine 5mg twice a day and Losartan 50mg once a day three days ago  after going to the ER with high bp 200114 I have already experienced side affects, tiredness vivid dreams,  I’m afraid what else is coming with this drug, It has kept my BP normal range.
Previously I was put on Clonidine by my doctor, I was since told it’s number 6 in the line of starter drugs for bp. Then I was given Lisinopril  caused me an awful cough. Another two drugs prescribed  one on back order another one not available. Now Amlodipine and Losartan. 
I am so afraid now to take this drug twice a day as I read it’s usually given once  a day. Before I even take the meds I’m stressed out, what bp medication is next to be recalled?

review: ive amlodipine almost year months later developed huge swollen feet ankles. buy diabetic shoes feet huge. developed double vision. thought stroke. went hospital stayed days, went thru mris cat scans etc. blood pressure still. stopped amlodipine feet went down, vision cleared days. bad, bad drug.
full_review: Ive been on amlodipine for almost a year. About 3 months later I developed huge swollen feet and ankles. I had to buy diabetic shoes my feet were so huge. Then I  developed double vision. Thought I was having a stroke. I went to the hospital stayed 3 days,  went thru MRIs  and CAT scans etc. blood pressure still in the 155-198.  I stopped  amlodipine and  feet went down, vision cleared up in 2 days.  bad, bad drug.

review: lupus diagnosed years kidney problems high blood pressure. enalapril keeping pressure given help. also anemia due chronic disease thought thats causing problems read experiences others. almost passed times, exhausted, depressed, calf hurts, felt doom gloom feeling, really sucked, cried day reason. took days mg. going quit start working little instead. thank everyone posted, relieved hear symptoms cause could fixed.
full_review: Lupus diagnosed for 8 years with kidney problems and high blood pressure.  Enalapril 10mg not keeping pressure down so I was given this to help.  I also have anemia due to chronic disease so I thought thats what was causing my problems until I read these experiences from others.  I have almost PASSED OUT 3 times, VERY EXHAUSTED, DEPRESSED, CALF HURTS, felt a doom and gloom feeling, really SUCKED, CRIED ALL DAY for no reason.  Only took it for 5 days 2.5 mg.  Going to quit and start working out a little instead.  Thank you to everyone who posted, I was SO RELIEVED to hear my symptoms had a cause that could be fixed.

review: issues drug. ive taking years..i know eat right, put less salt system, blood pressure gets really low, like two numbers top bottom, take every day regulate
full_review: I have not had any issues with this drug. Ive been taking it for over 3 years..I do know that when I eat right, and put less salt in my system, my blood pressure gets really low, like two numbers at the top and bottom, so I will take it every other day which will regulate it to 12080

review: taken amlodipine months got serious left leg pains. started taken garlic cloves cup lemon juice tbsp honey add oz water blend blender small food processor simmer mixture stove minutes. let cool. drink oz daily week. take week week. lower blood pressure feel pain starting go away slowly.
full_review: Taken amlodipine for 3-4 months got serious left leg pains.  Started taken 2 garlic cloves with 12 cup lemon juice and 1 tbsp honey add 16 oz water blend in blender or small food processor then simmer mixture on stove 7 minutes. Let cool.  Drink 8 oz daily for 1 week.  Take week off do 1 more week.  Can do this to lower blood pressure and I feel the pain starting to go away slowly.

review: started amlodipine stopping lisinopril due throat swelling taking one year. amlodipine took days begin working lowering blood pressure introduction. dosage daily. didnt lower blood pressure much. went days. side effects included: sore arms legs lower legs felt sore full blood (heavy) facial flishing profucious sweating feet hands headaches notable lack energy sleepiness , nervousness recommend using drug last resort dont need immediate drop blood pressure. remember everyone different may work well you. long walks seemed help sore legs.
full_review:
Started amlodipine after stopping lisinopril due to throat swelling  after taking for one year. Amlodipine took 5 days to begin working on lowering my blood pressure after introduction.  My dosage was 5mg once daily.  It didnt lower my blood pressure very much.  Went from 165111 to 145100 in 5 days.  
Side effects included:
Very sore arms and legs
Lower legs felt sore and full of blood (heavy)
Facial flishing
Profucious sweating from feet and hands 
Headaches 
Notable lack of energy and sleepiness , nervousness 
  I recommend using this drug ONLY if its your last resort and you dont need an immediate drop in blood pressure.  Remember everyone is different this may work well for you. Long walks seemed to help with the sore legs.

review: switched norvasc another blood pressure medicine week ago. sure helping yet blood pressure liking side effects. migraine everyday since started taking it.
full_review: I was switched to Norvasc from another blood pressure medicine about a week ago. I am not sure if its helping yet for my blood pressure but I am not liking the side effects. I have had a migraine everyday since I started taking it.

review: years old. taking amlodipine since april year. taking sometimes split half. side effects vivid dreams, occasional constipation. lately started checking bp evening much higher. morning bp range evening runs higher. take bp meds morning. going back doc see dose wearing evening need split dose take half morning half night take higher dose.
full_review: I am 67 years old. Been taking amlodipine since April of this year. Taking 5mg but sometimes split in half. Side effects have been very vivid dreams, occasional constipation. Lately I started checking my BP in the evening and it is much higher. Morning BP is in the range of 12475 while evening runs 154 80 or higher. Take BP meds in morning. Going back to doc to see if the dose is wearing off by evening and I need to split dose and take half in the morning and the other half at night or take a higher dose.

review: using months amlodipine developed pain lower back, groin, thigh calf left side only. stopped taking pain still there. user know long painful side affects last lasted aches pains.
full_review: After using for 3 months amlodipine 10mg developed pain in lower back, groin, thigh and calf on left side only.   Stopped taking 7-22-2019 and pain is still there.  Does any user know how long painful side affects last or have lasted to those who have had same aches and pains.

review: took drug high blood pressure. started hydrochlorothiazide lot side effects it. switched over, took one night got hours sleep. next day took blood pressure insanely high. highest blood pressure reading ive had. went urgent care suggested go er. er lot tests couldnt find anything hours taking amlodipine blood pressure still hasnt gone down. could give drug negative reading would. stay clear amlodipine. highly dont recommend.
full_review: Took this drug for high blood pressure. Started out on hydrochlorothiazide but had a lot of side effects from it. Then switched over, took it one night and only got 4 hours of sleep. Next day I took my blood pressure and it was insanely high. Highest blood pressure reading Ive had. I went to urgent care and they suggested I go to the ER. At the ER they did a lot of tests and couldnt find anything. 48 hours after taking amlodipine blood pressure still hasnt gone down. If I could give this drug a negative reading I would. Stay clear of amlodipine. Highly dont recommend.

review: began taking amlopidine high blood pressure year ago. worked fine several months til started swelling pain feet legs. attacks gout thought causing problem pain swelling went long gout. got could hardly walk. wife noticed swelling side effect. quit medicine immediately, noticed huge difference within week. medicine mths, still problems swelling pain although near severe. also developed knots calves medicine went away since stopping medicine. fear irreversible damage.
full_review: I began taking this amlopidine for high blood pressure about a year ago. It worked fine for several months til I started having swelling and pain in my feet and legs. I was having some attacks of gout and thought that was it that causing the problem but the pain and swelling went on long after the gout. I got to where I could hardly walk. My wife noticed that swelling was a side effect. I quit the medicine immediately, and noticed a huge difference within a week. I have been off the medicine for 3-4 mths, but still have some problems with swelling and pain although not near as severe. I have also have developed knots in my calves while on this medicine that has not went away since stopping the medicine. I fear I have irreversible damage.

review: chest pain went er days ago. blood pressure high considering i’m yo woman. started amlodipine mg day. first days mild symptoms headache, dizziness tiredness day felt rush pressure head, numbness face neck right side, anxiety severe panic attacks. went back er said probably slept wrong hurt neck, need let body get used new meds. told continue taking med. panic attack continued next two days along facial numbness, muscle weakness, headache, vivid dreams, insomnia, excessive thirst, twitching legs neck pain. thank goodness found page. felt like going crazy. i’ve decided stop taking medication. recommend even though help lower blood pressure. worth side effects. could give would.
full_review: I was having chest pain so I went to the ER 6 days ago. My blood pressure was 189107mmg which is very high considering I’m a 31 yo woman. They started me on amlodipine 5 mg once a day. For the first 3 days I had mild symptoms of headache, dizziness and tiredness. The 4th day I felt a rush of pressure in my head, numbness In my face and neck on my right side, anxiety and SEVERE PANIC ATTACKS. Went back to the ER where they said I probably slept wrong and hurt my neck, and I just need to let my body get used to the new meds. They told me to continue taking the med. The panic attack continued over the next two days along with facial numbness, muscle weakness, headache, vivid dreams, insomnia, excessive thirst, twitching in my legs and neck pain. Thank goodness I found this page. I felt like I was going crazy. I’ve decided to stop taking this medication. I do not recommend even though it did help lower my blood pressure. Not worth the side effects. If I could give it a 0 out of 10 I would.

review: male yo. palpitations lisinopril, switched mg amlodipine day, severe reaction (irregular hearbeat, fluctuating bp, lightheaded, etc), ended er. various tests, docs didnt find anything wrong, said dont take anymore. real fun began later night. woke severe panic attack turned bath salts (recreational drug) episode: compulsively waving arms pacing floor, twidding fingers toes, grunting, finally depersonalization (watching outside body). subsided+ minutes, panicanxiety attacks every day months after. never anxiety issues before years later, still careful, cant control anxiety life gets bit difficult. switched back lisinopril + metoprolol, bp back down, without palps. occasionally need take anti-anxiety meds. others report similar reactions, may banned countries.
full_review:
Male, 56 yo. Was having palpitations with lisinopril, so I was switched to 10 mg amlodipine. On 2nd day, had severe reaction (irregular hearbeat, fluctuating BP, lightheaded, etc), ended up in ER. After various tests, docs didnt find anything wrong, but said dont take it anymore. The real fun began later that night. Woke up with severe panic attack that turned into a bath salts (recreational drug) episode: compulsively waving arms and pacing the floor, twidding fingers and toes, grunting, and finally depersonalization (watching yourself from outside your body). It subsided after 20+ minutes, but had panicanxiety attacks every day 2 months after. I never had anxiety issues before. 2 years later, and I still have to be careful, as I cant control anxiety when life gets a bit difficult. I switched back to lisinopril + metoprolol, so my BP is back down, without palps. But I occasionally need to take anti-anxiety meds. Others report similar reactions, which 
may be why its banned in some countries.

review: i’ve medication amlodipine months. first everything great. good blood pressure, side effects. however, three weeks ago, started awful flushing, (thinking may carcinoid syndrome), fatigue, nausea, chills. chills bad times shake uncontrollably. could see dr chuckle said, “i think i’m reaction amlodipine.” reading stories site, made executive decision stop taking this. two days ago. i’m feeling slightly better, stuff stays system days. like flu. i’m currently hoping improvement even blood pressure goes up. trade-off much better side effects. also, i’ve recently clean upper lower gi scope, carcinoid.
full_review: I’ve been on this medication amlodipine a few months. At first everything was great. Good blood pressure, no side effects. However, about three weeks ago, I started to have awful flushing, (Thinking I may have carcinoid syndrome), fatigue, nausea, and chills.  The chills have been so bad that at times I shake uncontrollably.  I could see my Dr chuckle when I said, “I think I’m having a reaction to the amlodipine.”  After reading stories on this site, I made the executive decision to stop taking this. That was two days ago. I’m feeling only slightly better, but this stuff stays in your system for up to 11 days. It has been like I have the flu. I’m currently hoping for more improvement even as my blood pressure goes up. The trade-off is much better than these side effects. Also, I’ve recently had a clean upper and lower GI scope, so no carcinoid.

review: took one mg pill am, became immediately tired. fell asleep. vivid dream. feel pain kidneys. getting tension headache hours later. reading reviews cant believe medicine legal. diet exercise better choice.
full_review:
Took one 5 mg pill at 11 am, became immediately tired. Fell asleep. Had VERY VIVID dream. Feel pain in kidneys. Getting a tension headache now just 2 hours later.
  Reading other reviews I cant believe this medicine is legal. Diet and exercise is the better choice.

review: take amlodipine tablet last years lots side effect. get doctor keep give stomachs medicine help side effects. last days since stopped taking already better
full_review: I take amlodipine tablet 10mg and last 3 years  and I have had lots of side effect. I have to get my doctor keep give me stomachs medicine to help the side effects.  It has now only been  last 4 days  since I stopped taking them I am already better

review: started taking mg amlodipine feb. stopped taking weeks ago. last months, extreme muscle spasms thighs, lower legs & feet. extreme floor crying & praying. also frequent urination throughout day( almost bought depends), massive headaches morning, hot flashes, chills & joint pain, list goes & on!! poison killing me. take !!!!!! shortness breath & almost fainted work it. fast heartbeat& extreme lethargy. bp one morning .didnt take pill morning. explain that? feel percent better. stomach bug weeks now. dont take!!!!
full_review: I started taking 10 mg of the Amlodipine in Feb 2016. I stopped taking it 3 weeks ago. In the last 2 months, I have had extreme muscle spasms in my thighs, lower legs & my feet. They were so extreme that I was on the floor crying & praying. I also was having frequent urination throughout the day( almost bought Depends), massive headaches in the morning, hot flashes, chills & joint pain, and the list goes on & on!! This poison was killing me. Do not take !!!!!! I was having shortness of breath & almost fainted at work because of it. Fast heartbeat& extreme lethargy. BP was 120 over 80 one morning .Didnt take my pill that morning. Explain that? Feel 100 percent better. Have had a stomach bug off & on for 2 weeks now. Dont take!!!!

review: two years now, lightheaded first went away quick swelling feet every then. put legs little goes away, doesnt cause pain. side effects even problems getting erection, wife likes that. worried first. problem meds either far. also works best exercise.
full_review: On it for two years now, was lightheaded at first but that went away quick and have had only swelling in my feet every now and then. I just put my legs up a little then it goes away, this doesnt cause me any pain. Other than that no side effects not even having any problems getting an erection, wife likes that. She was worried about that at first. No problem with other meds either so far. Also it works best with exercise.

full_review: I was on amlodipine for 3 weeks. I stopped taking it 8 days ago. I have had and still have weakness and tightness in my arms  and shoulders. I also have a burning in my arms. I have also had flushing. Also bad stomach problems and urinary problems. Will these problems go away?

review: years age black male athletic. put amolodopine years ago, increased one week ago. get night several times pee something new since increasing. noticed someone’s comments issue said two cardiologist looked weird couldn’t happen...well does! also side effects dizziness feeling chest indigestion. told doctor feeling lethargy, take blood test vitamin levels mine low take vitamin d, helps.

full_review: I have been taking 5mg norvasc for about a year then my doctor said to me to increase to 7.5 mg and thats when I started getting heart palpitations and headaches and blood pressure still was high around 147 88 heart rate 69bpm. Then my doctor said take 5mg norvasc like before but add 2mg coversyl - that made me have palpitations very tired fatigued and out of breath, headaches and felt like someone is strangling me and felt anxious. Basically couldnt function so I went back to just 5mg and going to see cardiologist.  I feel like a guinea pig trying different medicine with no results. Im still tired out of breath sometimes laboured breathing BP is still high, get cramps in stomach, I must have gone to hospital  and my doctor so many times.

full_review: Started Amlodipine 5mg on May 25 2022. Started getting side effects on second day which was itching and  dry mouth. As days went on body soreness, sore throat, upper back pain. On the 5th day really bad chest soreness and tightness. Was unable to do my daily activities and exercises. I stopped taking it and on the 2 day of stopping I feel much better. I will try to eat much healthier and lose weight. I refuse to take this poison.

review: prescribed amlodipine high blood pressure. brought normal. however, side effects terrible: frequent urination, constipation followed minutes later uncontrollable diarrhea, blurry vision, cough, fatigue sleepiness. would go out, would take medicine. found amlodipine causing problems took airplane flight. take want go bathroom flying. didnt take days almost symptoms disappeared. took problems came back stopped taking it. put clonidine lower bp gave cough sleepiness.
full_review:
I was prescribed Amlodipine for high blood pressure.  It brought it down to normal.

However, the side effects were terrible: frequent urination, constipation followed 10 minutes later by uncontrollable diarrhea, blurry vision, cough, fatigue  and sleepiness.

When I would go out, I would not take the medicine.  I found out that Amlodipine was causing my problems when I took an airplane flight.  I did not take it because I did not want to go to the bathroom when we were flying.  I didnt take it for 2 days and almost all my symptoms disappeared.  I took it again and all the problems came back so I stopped taking it.

O was put on Clonidine and that did not lower my BP but gave me a cough and sleepiness.

review: tia found high blood pressure hospital gave something caused huge adverse reactions. given brand name sample pcp (expensive) worked due price switched generic equivalent meds. adjusted dosage find best me. settled amlodipine quinapril. taking+ years side effects say caused drugs. (i experience things reported know caused issues have). nothing serious. twice tried reduce quinapril systolic slowly went weeks hit went back. since started taking bp regularly years old pounds, exercise, watch diet. works great me.
full_review:
After a TIA I found I had high blood pressure 170110
In the hospital they gave me something that caused HUGE adverse reactions.  I was then given a brand name sample by my PCP (expensive) that worked but due to price he switched me to the generic equivalent of 2 meds.  We adjusted the dosage of each to find the best for me.  Settled on Amlodipine 10mg and Quinapril 40mg.   Have been taking these for 5+ years with no side effects that I can say are caused by the drugs.  (I experience some of the things reported but know some are caused by other issues I have).   Nothing is serious.   We twice tried to reduce the Quinapril to 20mg but the systolic slowly went up over 2-3 weeks and when it hit 160 I went back to 40mg.  Since I started taking these my BP has been about 13474 regularly.  I am now 68 years old 175-180 pounds, exercise, and watch my diet.   Works great for me.

review: used amlodipine mg years. worked really well bring bp really high. started issues intestines. stopped eating several foods reacted bad, got eczema eyes. woke nights stomach pains urinating such. stopped amlodipine consulting gp within days issues disappeared.... however, still high bp must look alternative guess.
full_review: I have used Amlodipine 5 mg for 1.5 years. Worked really well to bring my BP down from really high. After a while I started having issues with my intestines. I stopped eating several foods because I reacted bad, got eczema under my eyes. Woke up most nights because I had stomach pains after urinating and such. I stopped with the amlodipine after consulting my GP and within 2 days all my issues disappeared.... however, still have high BP now so must look for alternative I guess.

I have never felt other side effects other than the swelling.

review: would get migraines weekly wasnt migraine headache turned tension headache later lead back migraine. tried everything put everything. finally, tried amlodipine next day, headache migraine. amazed. take every night bed. didnt feel dizzy havent swelling. worried cause blood pressure runs low already, im much better side effects.

I tried everything and was put on everything. Finally, I tried amlodipine and the next day, no headache no migraine. I was amazed. I take it every night before bed. I didnt feel dizzy and havent had any swelling. I was worried cause my  blood pressure runs low already, but Im doing so much better now and no side effects.
