review: prescribed amlodipine, prevent migraines migraine since. mild regular headaches blue moon. take angina. consistent migraines.
full_review: Prescribed  amlodipine in 2010,  to prevent migraines and not had a migraine since. Very mild regular headaches once in a blue moon. Take it for Angina and am 47. Had consistent migraines from 7 to 37.

review: awful swelling feet ankles point shoes longer fit. itchiness area well. flushed face. medication lower blood pressure much wasnt worth suffering side effects.
full_review:
Awful swelling in feet and ankles to the point that some of my shoes no longer fit.  Itchiness in that area as well.  Flushed face.
Medication did not lower my blood pressure very much at all so it wasnt worth the suffering of the side effects.

review: yo healthy f wslightly high bp. put amlodipine june hours joints hurt. felt like fog, anxiety elevated. told dr healthy running marathons barely run due above. told dr didnt feel right. told benefits outweighed side effects. august went urgent care & asked lyme test cuz aches neck pain - negative. thanks giving week elbow pain unbearable, trouble walking downstairs knees hurt, knees thighs swollen. called dr. went off. immediately fog lifted, still anxious dont feel right. joints still achy & knees hurt. backneck trouble past two weeks hoping theyll go away ill feel better. hate amlodipine. started hct, see dr next week.
full_review: 56 yo HEALTHY F wslightly high BP. Put me on amlodipine in June. In 48 hours my joints hurt. Felt like I was in a fog, anxiety elevated. Told Dr I was healthy running 12 marathons and now can barely run 3km due to above. Told Dr I just didnt feel right. Told benefits outweighed side effects. August went to Urgent Care & asked them to do Lyme test cuz of aches and neck pain - negative. Thanks giving week elbow pain unbearable, trouble walking downstairs knees hurt, knees and thighs swollen. Called Dr. Went off. Immediately fog lifted, still anxious as I dont feel right. Joints still achy & knees hurt. Backneck trouble past two weeks hoping theyll go away and Ill feel better. HATE amlodipine. Started on HCT, see Dr next week.

review: past two years i’ve heart palpitations high blood pressure (average). went er ekg done showed abnormalities. referred cardiologist prescribed amlodipine hypertension. told get propanol (used aura migraines) start amlodipine. unfortunately days developed headache felt like migraine, fatigue, nausea, resting heart rate (my normal heart rate) went er diagnosed sinus tachycardia due medication complications. told go back propanolol taking amlodipine lower heart rate help headache. i’m day ankles feet swollen feel like problems one medication asking primary get immediately.
full_review: For the past two years I’ve been having heart palpitations and high blood pressure (average is 150101). I went to the ER and had an EKG done which showed some abnormalities. I was referred to a cardiologist who prescribed amlodipine for the hypertension. I was told to get off my propanol (used for my aura migraines) and to start amlodipine 10mg. Unfortunately I was on it for only 3 days and developed a headache that felt like a migraine, had fatigue, was nausea,  and a resting heart rate of 132 (my normal heart rate is 70-80) went to the ER was diagnosed with sinus tachycardia due to medication complications. Was told to go back on propanolol while taking amlodipine to lower my heart rate and to help with the headache. I’m on day 7 now and my ankles  feet are swollen.  I am 24 and feel like I should not be having all these problems from one medication will be asking my primary to get off of it immediately.

review: drug amlodipine feeling like end life. take it, immediately feel nauseated followed worst migraine i’ve ever had. i’m going doctor monday change meds.
full_review: This drug amlodipine has me feeling like it is the end of my life.  When I take it, I immediately feel nauseated and it is followed by the worst migraine I’ve ever had. I’m going to the doctor on Monday for them to change my meds.

review: medication week now. seems work well. always bit vertigo cant attest dizziness claims. doesnt work well previous lopressormicardis regimen well see. plan lower potassium levels due side effects two addition high blood pressure.
full_review: Been on the medication for about a week now. Seems to work well. Always had a bit of vertigo so cant attest to the dizziness claims. Doesnt work as well as my previous LopressorMicardis regimen I was on but well see. The plan is to lower potassium levels due to the side effects of the other two in addition to the high blood pressure.

review: hello everyone years old, almost seven years since started taking amlodipine besylate. still dose daily since. bp, put lbs last two years. suffer graves disease thyroid. related medication. point is, got lbs, actually stopped taking amlodipine; bp normal. weight loss due graves disease ( hyperthyroidism). radiation treatment, gained weight bp elevated again. started taking amlodipine besylate again, dose since. side effect noticed makes somewhat hypervigilant, nothing concerned about.
full_review: Hello everyone! I am now 35 years old, and it has almost been seven years since I started taking Amlodipine Besylate. I am still on the same dose of  5mgs daily since 2011. My BP is 12572, but I have put on 60 lbs in the last two years. I do suffer from Graves Disease of the Thyroid. This is  not related to the medication. The point is, when I got down to 114 lbs, I actually stopped taking Amlodipine; my bp was normal. The weight loss was due to Graves Disease ( Hyperthyroidism). Then I had radiation treatment, gained weight now my bp is elevated again. I now started taking Amlodipine Besylate again, same dose since 2011. The only side effect I noticed is it makes me somewhat hypervigilant, but nothing to be concerned about.

review: suffering crippling headache sent bp! emergency doctor prescribed amlodipine family doctor, monitoring bp, continued prescription. almost entirely headache-free since drug. take one mg pill daily. experienced side effects.
full_review: I was suffering from a crippling headache that sent my BP to 200! The emergency doctor prescribed amlodipine and my family doctor, who had been monitoring my BP, continued the prescription. I have been almost entirely headache-free since being on this drug. I take one 5 mg pill daily. I have not experienced any side effects.

review: week favorably impressed. bp time. bit lightheaded - hour two taking it. side effects. feel good thankful bp down. would like try. discuss doctor. far, absolutely complaints - positive experience.
full_review: On 10mgday for a week and favorably impressed.  Has BP between 11572 and 13585 for most of the time.  A bit lightheaded - more so for an hour or two after taking it.  No other side effects.  Feel good and thankful BP is down.  Would like to try 5mg at 8am and 5mg at 8pm.  Will discuss this with my doctor. But so far, absolutely no complaints - just a positive experience.

review: cardiologist started amlodipine coronary artery spasms year half ago. miracle, first day medication never another migraine headache. cardiologist surprised hear migraines gone. migraines years. normal headaches stop within hour. asked cardiologist amlodipine could taken rest life. told safe take long necessary. didnt side effects presented. thank goodness bringing events led medication.
full_review:
My cardiologist started me on Amlodipine for coronary artery spasms a year and a half ago. It was a miracle, from the first day on this medication I never had another migraine headache. The cardiologist was surprised to hear that my migraines were gone. I had migraines for 46 years. Now I have normal headaches that stop within an hour. I asked the cardiologist if Amlodipine could be taken the rest of my life. He told me that it is safe to take it as long as necessary. I didnt have any side effects that presented.
I thank goodness for bringing me through the events that led me to this medication.

review: im year old male moderately high bp year ago. started spiking high. dr put amlodipine besylate months ago. bp today. like meds, effect everyone differently, drs tell me, one least number side effects. following things noticed since taking drug. legs seem little weaker noticed significant swelling one main side effects. night discomfort legs generally thigh muscles. pain discomfort like ran treadmill hour. nothing keeps awake. overall, works me.
full_review:
Im a 65 year old male who has had moderately high BP until about a year ago. Then it started spiking with a high of 198100. My Dr put me on Amlodipine Besylate 5mg about 10 months ago. BP today 11971. 

Like all meds, this will effect everyone differently, but from what the Drs tell me, its the one with the least number of side effects. The following are things I have noticed since taking this drug.
1. My legs seem a little weaker than before but have not noticed significant swelling which is one of the main side effects. 
2. At night I have discomfort in my legs generally the thigh muscles. Not pain but discomfort like I ran on a treadmill for an hour. Nothing that keeps me awake.
Overall, it works for me.

review: years tried numerous meds migraines point neurologist sent migraine specialist run ideas. specialist put norvasc within week, migraines completely stopped. kind relief years! even gotten approved botox told positive results, cancelled botox. love medicine.
full_review: Through the years I had tried NUMEROUS meds for migraines to the point that my neurologist sent me to a migraine specialist because he had run out of ideas.  The specialist put me on Norvasc and within a week, my migraines had completely stopped. I have not had this kind of relief in years! He had even gotten me approved for Botox and when I told him my positive results, he cancelled the Botox. Love this medicine.

review: drug-induced raynaud’s add medication, adderall. start winter, got worse ever before. fingers toes used go numb pale, significant pain associated it. started amlodipine quickly noticed difference, pain gone, toes still going numb. increased dose weeks happy. rarely numbness cold times per month) cold frequently walking classes. flying winter break, experience swelling feet, it. flying suggest standing walking little help prevent this.
full_review:
I have drug-induced Raynaud’s from my ADD medication, Adderall. At the start of this winter, it got worse than it had ever been before. My fingers and toes used to just go numb and pale, but now there was significant pain associated with it. I started Amlodipine 2.5mg And quickly noticed a difference, as the pain was gone, but my toes were still going numb. I increased to a dose of 5mg after 2 weeks and am happy. Rarely I have numbness in the cold (2 times per month) and I am in the cold frequently walking to classes. 

When I was flying over winter break, I did experience swelling in my feet, but that was it. When flying I suggest standing and walking a little to help prevent this.

review: drug worked fast reducing high blood pressure. lisinopril developed hives, swollen lips tongue doctor switched norvasc. seem still occasional hives severe may triggered heat. az time year quite hot.
full_review: This drug has worked very fast in reducing high blood pressure. I was on lisinopril but developed hives, swollen lips and tongue so doctor switched me to Norvasc. I seem to still have occasional hives but not as severe and may be triggered by heat. AZ this time of year is quite hot.

review: weeks ago took one single tablet amlodipine blood pressure. brought bp nicely within hours side effects night horrendous, nauseous, felt like blood vessels head going burst. stopped taking tablets straightaway still pain one single spot right side head weeks blood vessel damaged. worrying nice waking night weird pain head. wish never taken tablet waiting referral neurologist find whats going on.
full_review: 11 weeks ago I took just one single tablet of Amlodipine for blood pressure. It brought down BP nicely within 2 hours but the side effects the night after where horrendous, nauseous, felt like all the blood vessels in my head were going to burst. Stopped taking tablets straightaway but still have pain on one single spot on right side of my head after 11 weeks as if a blood vessel is damaged. Very worrying and not nice to be waking up at night with this weird pain in my head. Wish I had never taken that tablet and am waiting for referral to a neurologist to find out whats going on.

review: medication changed life! age thought would go grave migraine. started around age. diagnosed high blood preasure ran gambet different drugs figure worked best me. fine tuning stages treatment prescribed amlodipine combination another drug. life changing!!!!! migraines least times week suddenly realised weeks month......no headache! oh take time figure out! happy new life!!!!!!!
full_review: This medication changed my life!  At age 60 I thought I would go to my grave with a migraine.  This started at around age 16. Then being diagnosed with high blood preasure I ran the gambet of a few different drugs to figure out what worked best for me.  In the fine tuning stages of treatment I was prescribed Amlodipine in combination with another drug.  Life changing!!!!!  I had migraines at least 3 times a week and suddenly I realised it had been 2 weeks, then 3 then a month, then 2......no headache!  Why oh why did it take all this time to figure it out!  So very Happy with my new life!!!!!!!

review: oh god, iu begin years use, worst side effects show years later. list: fatigue, tiredness, headaches, migraine, visual disturbances, ear infection, swollen ankles, muscle tension, neck pain, tremors, cold hands feet, severe anxiety, depression, panic attacks, depression, tearfulness, sexual dysfunction, loss hair, frequent urination, gastric problems, diarrhea would half it... ruined life even caused bp spikes late stage, insidious drug banned everywhere! better bp meds! amlo cheapest first docs offer...
full_review: Oh my God, where do IU begin? After 3 years use, worst side effects show up 2.5 years later. Here is my list: fatigue, tiredness, headaches, migraine, visual disturbances, ear infection, swollen ankles, muscle tension, neck pain, tremors, cold hands and feet, severe anxiety, depression, panic attacks, depression, tearfulness, sexual dysfunction, loss of hair, frequent urination, gastric problems, diarrhea and that would be half of it... It ruined my life and even caused my bp spikes at late stage, its an insidious drug and should be banned everywhere! There are better bp meds! Amlo is cheapest and first docs offer...

review: horrible migraines years bp got little high prescribed amlodipine. haven’t take imitrex weeks. medicine life changing :) :) :)
full_review: I have had horrible migraines for 30 years. At 62 my BP got a little high and I was prescribed amlodipine. I haven’t had to take an Imitrex in 6 weeks. This medicine has been LIFE CHANGING for me :) :) :)

review: (for me), serious side effects medicine taking days. fatique, flushing, fluid retention severe swelling feet ankles. go back doctor today. doctor gave high blood pressure.
full_review: I am having (for me), serious side effects from this medicine and I have only been taking it for 30 days.  Fatique, flushing, fluid retention and severe swelling of the feet and ankles.  I go back to the doctor today. My doctor gave it to me for high blood pressure.

review: doesnt work lower blood pressure. started medicine months ago hasnt done anything. dr added benzepril top blood pressure still same. switching beta blocker next time go office. gave stars although doesnt work, havent experienced adverse effects plus!
full_review: Doesnt work to lower blood pressure. I started this medicine 8 months ago and it hasnt done anything. My dr added Benzepril on top of this and my blood pressure is still the same. Switching to a beta blocker next time I go to his office. Gave it 2 stars because although it doesnt work, I havent experienced other adverse effects which is a plus!

review: prescription helped blood pressure immensely legs ankles really swollen time. asked doctor take did. prescribed another medication working fine. thank god dont swelling legs ankles scraggly actually walk exercise discomfort.
full_review: This prescription helped with my blood pressure immensely but had my legs and ankles really swollen all the time. I asked my doctor to take me off and he did. Her prescribed me another medication and its working fine. Thank God I dont have the swelling of my legs and ankles and scraggly actually can walk or exercise with no discomfort.

review: begin!!! taking year now. bp readings around. first experienced flushing, slight headaches, came dizziness. year later, knees starting hurting, shortness breath reason, hip started killing me, numbness limbs. tried stop taking bp shot right up. like do?! bp medicines cause sort side effects. dr. put atenolol seems working far well see.
full_review: Where do I begin!!! I have been taking 5mg for about a year and 12 now. My BP readings have been around 13580 to 14085. At first I only experienced the flushing, slight headaches, then came the dizziness. A year later, my knees starting hurting, shortness of breath for no reason, my hip started killing me, numbness in my limbs. I tried to stop taking it but my BP shot right up. Its like what do you do?! All BP medicines cause some sort of side effects. My Dr. put me on Atenolol and that seems to be working so far but well see.

review: ive amlodipine high bp. first time lasted week. side effects...itchy skin, dizzy headaches. time month...dizzy, headaches, sleeping, itchy skin fatigued
full_review: Ive been on amlodipine 5mg for high BP. First time I was on them I only lasted a week. Side effects...itchy skin, dizzy and headaches. This time been on them a month...dizzy, headaches, not sleeping, itchy skin and fatigued

review: experience, found amlodipine mg effective losartan mg. nearly years used take enalapril mg twice daily,but bp time ranging. therefore shifted amolodipine mg times years back could see fantastic change bp. could get amlodipine days took losartan morning night found bp.
full_review: From my experience, I found that Amlodipine 5 mg is more effective than Losartan 50 mg. Nearly 10 years I used to take Enalapril 5 mg  twice daily,but BP that time was  ranging from 15085 to 16095. Therefore I shifted to Amolodipine 5 mg 2 times about 3 years back and could see a fantastic change in my BP between 11070 and 12080.  In between when I could not get Amlodipine for few days I took Losartan 50 morning and 25mg at night and I found my BP 14085 or 90.

review: ive norvasc couple years. itll keep bp down. biggest issue fatigue. energy ive depressed thought fatigue causing depression. ?? doc sent get tests fatigue. waiting results.
full_review: Ive been on norvasc a couple years. Itll does keep my BP down. Biggest issue is fatigue. No energy at all Ive been depressed  I thought the fatigue was causing the depression. ?? Doc sent me to get some tests because of the fatigue. Waiting results.

review: prescribed drug three weeks ago cardiologist mg. already losartan atenolol well. pressure still little high around. amlodipine bring pressure whole day. take morning afternoon pressure better take pressure morning it’s still around. biggest positive migraine prevention. haven’t one three weeks don’t think ever would stayed drug take drug going forward. side effects severe. feet ankles swell. bad taste mouth. insomnia worse. biggest problem fatigue. afternoon feel like zombie. hard get job done. find sit still zone out. good productivity. drug ever taken produced side effects severe discontinued use one did.
full_review:
I was prescribed this drug three weeks ago by my cardiologist. 5 mg.  I am already on losartan and atenolol as well. Pressure was still a little high around 13090. Amlodipine does bring the pressure down but not for the whole day. I take it in the morning and in the afternoon my pressure is better but when I take my pressure in the morning it’s still around 13090.

The biggest positive was migraine prevention. I haven’t had one in three weeks and I don’t think I ever would again if I stayed on this drug but I will not take this drug going forward. The side effects are too severe. 

My feet and ankles swell. I have a bad taste in my mouth. My insomnia is worse. The biggest problem is fatigue. In the afternoon I feel like a zombie. Very hard to get my job done. I find I just sit still and zone out. Not good for productivity.  No drug I have ever taken produced side effects so severe that I have discontinued its use but this one did.

review: read comments. im sorry people continue problems & scared side affects. glad say side affects didnt know it. ive taken amlodipine years bp stable time, around. lost & life changed better. bp went area, take atorvastatin cholesterol years, may even need now, im & pace maker electrical problem brain heart, also take hydrochlorathiazide diuretic it. nothing bad say meds. im hanging & must say, help got diet & losing weight!!! help & push away table. time belch burp deep eating, thats time stop eating, dont feel filled meal, nutrition & decent meal, cut portions!!!
full_review: I have read most all the comments. Im so sorry for you people who continue to have problems & are scared from side affects. I am glad to say if I had any side affects I didnt know it. Ive taken amlodipine for about 6 years with BP not stable some of the time, around 14090. I lost about 25lbs & my life changed for the better.  My  BP went down to 11665 in this area, I take atorvastatin for cholesterol for 10 years, may not even need it now, Im 64 & have a pace maker for an electrical problem from brain to heart, I also take hydrochlorathiazide which has a diuretic in it. I have nothing bad to say about these meds. Im hanging in there & I must say, the most help I got was diet & LOSING WEIGHT!!! Help yourself & push away from the table the 1st. time you belch or burp deep when eating, THATs the time to stop eating, you dont have to feel filled up after a meal, just nutrition & a decent meal, cut them portions!!!

review: dr. wants put amlodipine, tell way! dr. put living nightmare! blurred vision, shakes tremors, unbelievable nervousness, weight gain, sorts stuff!
full_review: If your Dr. Wants to put you on amlodipine,  tell him NO WAY! My Dr. put me on it and its been a living nightmare! Blurred vision,  the shakes or tremors, unbelievable nervousness, weight gain, and all sorts of other stuff!

review: hi nice people high blood press...me..i amlodipine almost month..i think reading helpful comments ill stop. im scared blood press lower higher. lost pounds need lose another hoping weight loss lower bp. hypoglycemia lately noticed pulse extremely high heart raced fast terrified. im pretty healthy eat ok. never racing heart since started med. im concerned im big pharm meds person. rather healthy way. best wishes read this. thank you, connie
full_review: Hi nice people with high blood press...Me 2..I have been on this Amlodipine almost 1 month..I think after reading your Helpful comments Ill stop.  Im scared as my Blood Press is 17090 and lower and higher.  I just lost 20 Pounds and need to lose another 20 hoping weight loss will lower BP.  I have hypoglycemia and lately I noticed my PULSE was extremely HIGH and my heart raced so fast I was terrified.  Im pretty healthy and eat OK.  I never had racing heart before just now since I started with this Med.  Im very concerned and Im not a  BIG PHARM  meds person. I rather do the healthy way.  Best wishes to all who read this. Thank You, Connie

review: taking three weeks. lowered bottom number blood pressure almost low. average. caused dizziness, light-headed little shortness breath. slowed pulse also. good medicine dont want dizziness.
full_review:
Taking for three weeks. Lowered the bottom number of my blood
pressure almost too low. Average now is 11663. Caused some dizziness, light-headed and little shortness of breath. Slowed
pulse down also. Good medicine but dont want dizziness.

review: taking several weeks began smelling smoke..it almost unbearable. several weeks searching answer. discovered people experienced smelling smoke traced chemical mineral (?) di-calcium chloride, phrosphoric acid magnesium phosphate. .. many names compound.. keeps product seperating like; nut butters, orange juice , frappicinos, counter drugs ,liquid vitamins ( sublingual b experience). amlodipine insert fine print smelling smoke listed side effect. took weeks quitting smoke smell left me. side effect pleased effectiveness.
full_review: After taking this several weeks I began smelling smoke..It was almost unbearable.  After several more weeks searching for an answer. I discovered other people who had experienced smelling smoke and traced it to a chemical mineral (?)  Di-calcium chloride,  or phrosphoric acid or magnesium phosphate. .. there are many names for this compound..  It keeps product from seperating  like; nut butters, orange juice , frappicinos,  over the counter drugs ,liquid vitamins ( sublingual B12 my experience). In Amlodipine the  insert very fine print smelling smoke was listed as  a side effect.   It  took more than 4 weeks after quitting   before the smoke smell left me.  But for this side effect I was pleased with its effectiveness.

review: reduces blood pressure quite rapidly, side-effects, particularly flushing, blushing night urination, rather frequent urination. case small headache, simply need cut part dosage.
full_review: It reduces blood pressure quite rapidly, but it has some side-effects, particularly flushing, blushing and above all night urination, rather frequent urination. In case of a small headache, you simply need to cut down a part of a dosage.

review: amlodipine several months. nothing help reynauds syndrome. disappointed, especially since recommended several doctors. several disturbing side effects taking drug, including losing hair faster rate normal (more hairs brush, finding hairs food, hair clothing, etc.) depression.
full_review: I was on amlodipine for several months. It did nothing to help my Reynauds Syndrome. I was very disappointed, especially since it had been recommended by several doctors. I had several disturbing side effects while taking this drug, including losing my hair at a faster rate than normal (more than a few hairs in my brush, finding hairs in food, hair on my clothing, etc.) and depression.

review: year old female high blood pressure. trying zestril, lopressor, (doctor discontinued due side effects) prescribed norvasc. taking weeks noticeable side effects. thought finally found right medicine. started notice left knee would really bother walking (such grocery shopping.) next couple days, feet, legs knees extremely swollen, tight warm touch. severe discomfort, since knew edema possible side effect medicine, showed doctor. discontinued norvasc. another new one, maybe find right one soon!
full_review: 30 year old female with high blood pressure. After trying Zestril, and then Lopressor, (doctor discontinued both due to side effects) I was prescribed Norvasc. I had been taking it for about 2 weeks with no noticeable side effects. I thought finally I found the right medicine. Then I started to notice my left knee would really bother me after walking (such as grocery shopping.) Over the next couple of days, my feet, legs and knees were extremely swollen, tight and warm to the touch. I was not in any severe discomfort, but since I knew edema was a possible side effect of this medicine, I showed my doctor. He discontinued the Norvasc. Now on to another new one, maybe I will find the right one for me soon!

review: suffered migraines many years getting week more, doctor prescribed imigran, onset, much use sick them, anyway, told hypertension, prescribed amlodpine mg initially! almost immediately migraine gone, changed blood pressure medication advice doctor, migraines came back two days, back amlodipine me, migraine, went pharmacist explained works way, would recommend. miracle stuff.
full_review: Suffered migraines for many years getting them once a week or more, Doctor prescribed Imigran, at onset, not much use when you are sick with them, anyway, I was told I had hypertension, prescribed Amlodpine, 5 MG initially and then 10MG! Almost immediately the migraine were gone, I changed blood pressure medication once on the advice of my Doctor, the migraines came back with two days, back on Amlodipine for me, no more migraine, I went to the pharmacist who explained why it works in this way, I would recommend. Miracle stuff.

review: ive amlodipine besyate mg tablets months. side effects swelling feet, ankles lower legs. cpap + oxygen (one year months). blood pressure. hmm, ... heavy sleeper always dreams, usually struggling issues dreams. now, usually sleep hours .... dont know danged long! female (well last time looked down!) late. iam obese dont exercise like should, experienced others going through. dont know make this, yes, thankful blessing. feel bad went awful experiences glad got med! noticed many reviewers mention fit exercise, med, horrific side effects ---- fit? obese??? gives?
full_review: Ive been on AMLODIPINE BESYATE 5 mg tablets about 5 months. Side effects is swelling on both feet, ankles and lower legs. Am on CPAP + oxygen (one year + 4 months). My blood pressure was 18085, ... now 12478 - 11375. Hmm, ... am a heavy sleeper and ALWAYS dreams, usually struggling with issues in the dreams.  Now, usually sleep 9 to 11 hours .... and dont know why so danged long! Am female (well I was the last time I looked down!) and in my late 70s.  Iam obese  and dont exercise like I should, have not experienced what others are going through. I dont know what to make of all this, and yes, I am thankful for my blessing. Feel bad that some of you went through AWFUL experiences and glad you got off that med!  I noticed many reviewers mention they are fit and exercise, but with this med, having horrific side effects ----  fit? obese??? what gives?

review: yo male tried ramipril first great reducing blood pressure also turned zombie, foggy head constantly tired believe bad interaction lipitor. taking amlodipine months side-effects way less totally gone. trouble sleeping, tiredness, constant numbnesstingling left hand weight gain (assuming water gain?). trying tough may end taking bp meds all. (was range starting drugs).the side effects make feel right.
full_review:
47 yo male tried Ramipril first which was great at reducing blood pressure but also turned me into a zombie, foggy head and constantly tired and I believe bad interaction with Lipitor. 

Have been taking Amlodipine for 2 months and the side-effects are way less but not totally gone. Have had trouble sleeping, some tiredness, constant numbnesstingling in left hand and weight gain (assuming water gain?).

Trying to tough it out but may end up not taking BP meds at all. (Was in the 14090ish range when starting the drugs).The side effects do not make me feel right.

review: every time take amlodipine dose mg mg even diuretic, feet, ankles, calves swell within days. tried different times. lower blood pressure, could fit swollen feet sneakers regular shoes. also want think kidney failure swollen feet. never use amlodipine again.
full_review: Every time I take amlodipine at any dose 5 mg or 10 mg even with a diuretic, my feet, ankles, and calves swell within 2-3 days.  I have tried it 3 different times.  It did lower my blood pressure, but I could  not fit my swollen feet into sneakers or regular shoes.  I also did not want to think I had kidney failure from the swollen feet. I will never use amlodipine again.

review: amlodipine work raynauds months, still flairs every time go outside get chill usual. difference im swollen over, heart races feel exhausted. maybe high blood pressure already using dual drug...maybe. me.....going now!
full_review: Amlodipine DOES NOT WORK for Raynauds! Been on for 2 months, still having flairs every time I go outside or get a chill as usual. Only difference is now Im swollen all over, my heart races and I feel exhausted. Maybe if you have high blood pressure already and are using this as a dual drug...maybe. For me.....Going off of this NOW!

review: tia found high blood pressure. hospital gave something caused huge adverse reactions. given brand name sample pcp (expensive) worked due price switched generic equivalent meds. adjusted dosage find best me. settled amlodipine quinapril. taking+ years side effects say caused drugs. (i experience things reported know caused issues have). nothing serious. twice tried reduce quinapril systolic slowly went weeks hit went back. since started taking bp regularly years old pounds, exercise, watch diet. works great me.
full_review: After a TIA I found I had high blood pressure 170110. In the hospital they gave me something that caused HUGE adverse reactions. I was then given a brand name sample by my PCP (expensive) that worked but due to price he switched me to the generic equivalent of 2 meds. We adjusted the dosage of each to find the best for me. Settled on Amlodipine 10mg and Quinapril 40mg. Have been taking these for 5+ years with no side effects that I can say are caused by the drugs. (I experience some of the things reported but know some are caused by other issues I have). Nothing is serious. We twice tried to reduce the Quinapril to 20mg but the systolic slowly went up over 2-3 weeks and when it hit 160 I went back to 40mg. Since I started taking these my BP has been about 13474 regularly. I am now 68 years old 175-180 pounds, exercise, and watch my diet. Works great for me.

review: started taking amlodipine three months. started feeling high anxiety. believe mg making blood pressure go heart rate go up. one worse pills ever took. advised pill many negatives, get palpitations. dizzy ,ear ringing nightmares.
full_review: Started taking amlodipine for three months. I started feeling high anxiety. I believe 10 mg is making my blood pressure go up and heart rate go up.  It one the worse pills I ever took. Be advised this pill has so many negatives, you get palpitations. Dizzy ,ear ringing and nightmares.

review: taking amlodipine bp several weeks reactions rx-- coughing numbness hands. experiencing trigger finger -- first one hand other-- particularly ring fingers, plus numbness aching fingers. doctor says wouldnt amlodipine, reading might less common side effect.
full_review: I have been taking Amlodipine for BP for several weeks after having reactions to other RX-- coughing and numbness in hands.  Now I am experiencing trigger finger -- first one hand and now the other-- particularly the ring fingers, plus some numbness and aching in all fingers.  My doctor says it wouldnt be the Amlodipine, but I am reading that it might be a less common side effect.

full_review: I just have to start Amlodipine medicine for high blood pressure but want to know what time I should take, morning or evening and what are the side effects.  Please if anybody can share their views.  thanks

review: year old male entered va medical system. taking amlodipine days intermittent swelling ankles feet. new life. ringing ears years, able ignore it. noticed getting louder also. symptom% new patients. see doctor pharmacy tech next days. sleeping feet elevated heart worked well last night. ask get calcium channel blocker check side effects new one. product also angina, dont that. elevated blood pressure.
full_review: I am a 62 year old male who just entered the VA medical system. I have been taking Amlodipine for about 40 days and am now having intermittent swelling of my ankles and feet. This is new in my life. I have had ringing in the ears for over 30 years,  and I am able to ignore it. But I have noticed it getting louder also. This is a symptom in 1% of new patients. I will see my doctor and the Pharmacy tech in the next 3 days. Sleeping with my feet elevated over my heart worked well last night. I will ask to get off this calcium channel blocker and check for side effects on the new one. This product is also for Angina, I dont have that. Just elevated blood pressure.

review: started taking metaproplol mg high bp couple months ago wasnt agreeing . dr. started amlodipine mg day. blood pressure great side affects unbearable. thought loosing mind like think stable person weeks anxiety attacks vivid odd dreams dry mouth like never seen started taking half pill thinking might help. nope change done drug far worst month life. thanks reviews read today assure alone drug taken market. calling dr. today going start walking every day. thanks everyone!!
full_review: I started taking metaproplol  25 mg for high BP a couple months ago it wasnt agreeing . So my Dr. started me on Amlodipine 5 mg a day. My blood pressure has been great but the side affects are unbearable. I thought I was loosing my mind and I like to think of myself as a stable person. After 2 weeks of anxiety attacks vivid odd dreams dry mouth like I have never seen I started taking half the pill thinking it might help. Nope no change I am done with this drug and it has been by far the worst month of my life. Thanks to all the reviews I read today to assure me that I am not alone and this drug should be taken off the market. I am calling my Dr. today and going to start walking every day. Thanks everyone!!

review: love medication. slight puffiness around ankles important thing longer suffer anxiety-which severe suffering me. sure sleep lot call living zone. works me. grateful.
full_review: I love this medication.  I have slight puffiness around ankles but the most important thing is I no longer suffer anxiety-which is severe suffering for me.  Sure I sleep a lot more but I call it living in the Zone.  It works for me.  I am grateful.

review: blood pressure seemed control average...been valsartan, first low dose finally highest dose blood pressure went high again. scared then? dr added amlodipine, always felt sensitive medication, knew reputation norvasc. side effects minimal, ive taking years dont side effects, blood pressure back, worked me!
full_review: My blood pressure seemed out of control...140112 on average...been on valsartan, first at a low dose, 80mg then 160mg, then 240mg finally 320mg the highest dose and then blood pressure went high  again.  It scared me  because what then? Dr added amlodipine, I always felt sensitive to medication, and knew of the reputation of Norvasc. My side effects were minimal, Ive been taking it over 2 years now and dont have ANY side effects, and my blood pressure is back to 13080 to 85, it worked for me!

review: normally healthy year old female retired nurse. mid april diagnosed hypertension. saw dr due extreme headache took bp home shocked. started amolodipine. worked well last wednesday noticed slight swelling ankles. knew could side effect, wasnt concerned. next day swelling increased could barely shuffle. friday pain spread knees saw pa dr office. diagnosed acute poly inflammatory arthritis. chills slight temperature. went home thinking heck why. saturday morning much pain could walk. swelling spread knees pain wrist finger joints. called call md. told stop amlodipine started prednisone wanted start metroprolol.
full_review:
I am a normally healthy 67 year old female and a retired nurse. In mid April I  was diagnosed with hypertension. 180103.
I saw the Dr due to extreme headache and after I took my BP at home I was shocked. He started me on Amolodipine 5mg. It worked well but last Wednesday I noticed slight swelling in my ankles. I knew it could be a side effect, so I wasnt too concerned. Then by the next day the swelling had increased and I could barely shuffle. By Friday AM  the pain had spread to my knees and I saw the PA at my Dr office. He diagnosed me with Acute Poly Inflammatory Arthritis. I had chills and slight temperature. I went home thinking what the heck and why. By Saturday Morning I was in so much pain I could not walk. The swelling had spread to my knees and the pain to my wrist and finger joints. I called the on call MD. He told me to stop the Amlodipine and started me on Prednisone and wanted me to start Metroprolol.

review: lacunar stroke new cardiologist changed two meds. went losartanmetoprololdoxazosin losartancarvedilolamolodopine seriously thought going die. ended serious complications new drugs. went back old meds issues went away. tried one time. never taking carvedilol amolodopine again.
full_review: I had a lacunar stroke and my new cardiologist changed two of my meds. I went from LosartanMetoprololDoxazosin to LosartanCarvedilolAmolodopine and I seriously thought I was going to die. I ended up having most of the serious complications of both new drugs. I went back to old meds and all of the 20 issues went away. Then I tried one at a time. I am never taking Carvedilol and Amolodopine again.

review: wake night severe cramps. never cramp life started taking medicine. frequency cramps times per week, minimum. cramp bad sometimes start cold sweat. ask doctor change medicine.
full_review: I wake up at night with severe cramps. I never had a cramp in my life until I started taking this medicine. The frequency of cramps is about 3 to 4 times per week, minimum. The cramp is so bad sometimes that I start on a cold sweat. I will ask my Doctor to change medicine.

review: started menstrual migraines monthly mid-thirties. gotten point lasting upwards hours uncontrollable vomiting moderate pain day two migraine. started taking treximet anti-nausua medicine work migraine started still living life around avoiding triggers. also developed mild hypertension years. dr. prescribed amlopine migraines decreased intensity. upped dosage time control hypertension migraine intensity decreased proportionally time. time got, migraines gone. still get little headachy month, that, mild headache.
full_review: I started having menstrual migraines monthly in my mid-thirties.  They had gotten to the point of lasting upwards of 18 hours with uncontrollable vomiting and moderate pain for a day or two before and after the migraine.  I  started taking Treximet and an anti-nausua medicine which did work when the migraine started but was still living my life around avoiding triggers.  I also developed mild hypertension during these years.  My dr. prescribed 2.5mg amlopine and the migraines decreased in intensity.  He upped dosage over time to control the hypertension and my migraine intensity decreased proportionally each time.  By the time I got to 10mg, the migraines were gone.  I still get a little headachy each month, but its just that, a mild headache.

review: drug worst side effects years age, african american, fit & muscular. i’ve never experienced side effects discomfort like i’ve feeling past months. i’ve trying ride thinking side effects would fade away “like cardiologist said” no, drug effecting life beautiful kids & wife. working full time job cleaning houses (would clean houses day shift) barely sweep home floors without fatigued. side effects ruin past christmas & thanksgiving. i’m happy i’ve read reviews thought alone experiencing episodes severe dizziness, lightheadedness, tightness chest area, nausea, fatigue, tiredness, feeling fainting symptoms, confusion, mood swings, dry mouth, pressure neck head area, bad anxiety, anxious nervousness depression.
full_review: THIS DRUG HAS THE WORST SIDE EFFECTS!!!! I am 34 years of age, African American, very fit & muscular. I’ve never experienced side effects or discomfort like I’ve been feeling for the past 6 months. I’ve been trying to ride it out thinking the side effects would fade away “like the cardiologist said” but no, this drug has been effecting my life from my 3 beautiful kids & wife. I was working a full time job cleaning houses (would clean 3 houses by myself in a day shift) now I can barely sweep my home floors without being fatigued. The side effects ruin my 2021 past Christmas & Thanksgiving. I’m so happy I’ve read these reviews and I thought I was all alone experiencing these episodes of severe dizziness, lightheadedness, tightness in the chest area, nausea, fatigue, tiredness, feeling fainting symptoms, Confusion, mood swings, dry mouth, pressure in the neck head area, Bad anxiety, anxious and nervousness and depression.

review: ive longtime cant stand them. thought going mad pulsating headaches could sleep. felt like drum head, muscle weakness, cramps, itchy skin, muscle spams legs, arm, shaking legs, arms hands. horrible
full_review: Ive been on these for a longtime but now cant stand them. I thought I was going mad having pulsating headaches could not sleep. felt like drum in  my  head, muscle weakness, cramps, itchy skin, muscle spams in legs, arm, shaking legs, arms and hands. Horrible

review: put high blood pressure...developed murmur. loud murmur. doc suspected aortic stenosis (as). now, right doc taken norvasc, contraindicated as. told pa, took & put lisinopril. murmur went away. (well, years later put ciproflagyl horrible time flagyl.)...saturday asked doc could hear murmur...nope! early thursday morning admitted, murmur. loud previous one. hopefully, recover current nonsense, able rid murmur well. hope.
full_review:
I was put on this for high blood pressure...developed a murmur.  A very LOUD murmur.
The doc suspected aortic stenosis (AS).  Now, right then and there the doc should have taken me off Norvasc, because it is contraindicated for AS.   I told my PA, who took me off & put me me on lisinopril.  Murmur went away.  (Well, until a few years later when I was put on ciproflagyl and had a horrible time with the flagyl.)...Saturday I asked the doc if he could hear a murmur...NOPE! Very early Thursday morning as I was being admitted, I now had a murmur.  Not as loud as the previous one.  Hopefully, after I recover from the current nonsense, I will be able to rid myself of this murmur as well.   I hope.

review: awhile. caused irregular heartbeat pulse. scary. went back mgsday, issues. switched medicine morning nighttime, titrated mgsday. things changed worse: throbbing left side head, legs heavy cramping. could walk. scary stuff. please use.
full_review: Been on it for awhile. Caused irregular heartbeat and pulse. Very scary. Went back on 2.5 mgsday, no issues. Switched the medicine from morning to nighttime, and titrated up to 5 mgsday. Then things changed for the worse: throbbing on left side of head, legs were heavy and cramping. Could not walk. Scary stuff. Please do not use.

review: first developed high bp pregnant son. cant remember medication placed pregnant, prescribed amlodipine pregnancy bp refused return normal years ago last year worked great time excellent regulating bp zero side-effects. year ago bp started spiking again. doc raised mg helped little while, sadly isnt helping anymore. really wish could increase dosage, medicine didnt make side effects start new one, losartan. begin taking tomorrow, worried, side-effects look terrifying. crossing fingers.
full_review: I first developed high BP when pregnant for my son.  I cant remember the medication I was placed on while pregnant, but I was prescribed Amlodipine after pregnancy when my BP refused to return to normal.  That was 9 years ago and until last year it worked great.  I was on 5mg for that time and it was excellent at regulating my BP with zero side-effects.  A year ago my BP started spiking again.  My doc raised me to 10 mg and it helped for a little while, but sadly isnt helping anymore.  I really wish they could just increase the dosage, this medicine didnt make me have any side effects and now I have to start a new one, Losartan.  Will begin taking it tomorrow, but am worried, the side-effects look terrifying.  Crossing fingers.

review: blood pressure dropped from, heart rate dropped form. waking night breath, stopped. lot phlegm, reduced. cant say enough medicine. breathing greatly improved.
full_review: Blood pressure dropped from, 190110 to 15881,  heart rate dropped form 97 to 58.  I was waking up at night out of breath, this stopped.  I was having a lot of phlegm, this was reduced.  I cant say enough about this medicine.  My breathing is greatly improved.

review: put dosage friday. monday contacting doctor telling could take side effects. migraine level headaches, lightheadedness, dizziness, racing heart. suffer graves disease hypertension. medication made worse. would recommend all.

Migraine level headaches, lightheadedness, dizziness, racing heart.  I suffer from graves disease and hypertension.  This medication made me worse.  Would not recommend it at all.

review: hypertension took bad trip hospital, initially put lisinopril. made feel terrible, started amlodipine. taking one month, dizziness gets worse passing day. legs heavy honestly don’t know do. natural remedies treat hypertension- feel like life changed ever since started taking pills. feel room spinning doctor prescribed serc, that’s helping. can’t live like forever... bp well controlled now, feel horrible can’t stand it!
full_review: Hypertension took me on a bad trip to the hospital, so I was initially put on lisinopril. That made me feel so terrible, then I started on amlodipine 5mg. I have been taking it for one month, and the dizziness gets worse with each passing day. Now my legs are heavy and honestly I don’t know what to do. Are there any natural remedies to treat hypertension- I feel like my life has changed ever since I started taking these pills. I feel the room spinning and my doctor prescribed serc, but that’s not helping. I can’t live like this forever... My BP is well controlled now, but I feel so horrible I can’t stand it!

review: blood pressure pretty high. doctor gave amlodipine hydrochlorothiazide counteract swelling legs. first made groggy started taking bed. really helped, still felt little groggy inactive, started taking amlodipine morning night bedtime. helped tremendously. hydrochlorothiazide gives cramps legs sometimes, better stroke, think ill live it.
full_review: My blood pressure can be pretty high.  My doctor gave me 10mg of amlodipine and hydrochlorothiazide to counteract swelling in legs.  At first it made me groggy so I started taking it before bed.  That really helped, but I still felt a little groggy when I was inactive, so I started taking 5mgs of amlodipine in the morning and then 5mg at night before bedtime.  This helped tremendously.  The hydrochlorothiazide gives me cramps in my legs sometimes, but its better than a stroke, so I think Ill live with it.

review: doctor recommended taking norvasc high blood pressure take mg day noted beginning time frame never got another headache suffered migraines years still havent one headache even minor headache drink beer, alcohol never nothing causes headache amazing almost miracle thank doctor.
full_review: In 2005 my doctor recommended taking Norvasc 4 high blood pressure I only take 5 mg a day and I noted beginning with that time frame I never got another headache again and I had suffered from migraines for 30 years it is now 2018 and I still havent had one headache not even a minor headache and I can drink beer, alcohol and never nothing causes a headache its just amazing its almost a miracle thank you doctor.

review: pill everyone. took medication weeks high blood pressure (hbp) control medication long enough show side effects me. first days felt pressure back head later toward end first-week experiencing occasional shortness breath muscle weakness (not tiredness). dont want side effects them, talk healthcare provider today. doc took med nonetheless. effectiveness: wasnt able bring diastolic pressure time manage couple times. works, others much, like medication.
full_review: Its not the pill for everyone. I took this medication for 2 weeks with other high blood pressure (HBP) control medication and it was long enough to show its side effects for me. The first 3 days I felt pressure in the back of my head and later toward the end of first-week I was experiencing occasional shortness of breath and muscle weakness (not tiredness). You dont want any of these side effects if you do have them, talk to your healthcare provider today. My doc took me off this med nonetheless. As for effectiveness: it wasnt able to bring down my diastolic pressure under 95 most of the time but I did manage 85 couple of times. To some it works, others not so much, just like any other medication.

review: amlodipine mg right years. originally started lisinopril bp consistent basis lifelong readings. lisinopril gave bladder spasms matter took tried times methods month. problems, discomfort, side effects amlodipine. since pressure start wasnt high, body didnt show effects lowering normal pressure know happen allowed pressures consistently markedly elevated. match body chemistry thankful second medication tried.
full_review: I am 63 and have been on amlodipine 5 mg for right at 5 years. I was originally started on Lisinopril for a BP of 13090 on a consistent basis after lifelong readings of 11070. Lisinopril gave me bladder spasms no matter when and how I took it and I tried all times and methods for a month. I have had no problems, no discomfort, no side effects from the amlodipine. Since my pressure at the start wasnt that high, my body didnt show any effects of the lowering to a normal pressure as I know will happen if I had allowed my pressures to be consistently markedly elevated. It is the match for my body chemistry and I am thankful it was only the second medication tried.

review: started taking medication months ago daily first month daily. seen slim difference high blood pressure. however get constant leg cramps weak legs, shortness breath & gained pounds. good thing say migraines returned. good medication blood pressure. also say since taking seem lost interest things normally enjoy doing. definitely switch meds reading forum. good luck all.
full_review: I started taking this medication about 3 months ago 5mg once daily the first month, then 2x daily. I have seen slim to no difference in my high blood pressure. However I get constant leg cramps and weak legs, shortness of breath & have gained about 8 pounds. Only good thing I have to say is my migraines have not returned. Not a good medication for blood pressure. I also have to say since I been taking this I seem to have lost interest in the things I normally enjoy doing. Definitely am switch meds after reading this forum. Good luck to you all.

review: taking atenolol irregular heart beats also heart rate low sixties low forties sleeping . tried every thing desperate point pacemaker. thanks pharmacy let information amlodipine. heart rate steady, blood pressure. yes, get swelling ankles, given lasix mg. going two years.
full_review: I was taking Atenolol and was having irregular heart beats also my heart rate were from low sixties to low forties when sleeping . Tried every thing and desperate to the point of having a Pacemaker. Thanks to a pharmacy that let me into some information about Amlodipine. MY heart rate is steady at 68-78, blood pressure 12068. Yes, I do get the swelling in the ankles, was given Lasix 20 mg. Going on two years.

review: severe headaches often accompanied nausea vomiting whole life. migraine tablets years relief terms prevention came prescribed amlodipine moderately elevated blood pressure. take one mg day reduced painkiller use weeks episode vomiting ever since starting tablets years ago. life changing me.
full_review: I had severe headaches often accompanied by nausea and vomiting my whole life. I have been on migraine tablets for over 20 years but the only relief in terms of prevention came from being prescribed with Amlodipine for moderately elevated blood pressure. I take one 10 mg a day and have reduced my painkiller use to once 1-2 weeks with no further episode of vomiting ever since starting these tablets 5 years ago. It has been life changing for me.

review: taken mg generic amlodipine twice day. zydus. imprint z small pill perhaps best calcium channel blocker, used years, problems reactions. recalledunavailable. switched epic brand, initial side effects, like sweating hot weather, tiredness, dizziness. unavailable, pharmacy switched pills imprint ig initial sweats, fine months, available. switched imprint pills, make bp go higher, stopped, went higher still) got cipla, imprint c. hate pharmacies switching brands every month save cents, brands discontinue pill mergebuy another firm, lose good pill lines merged. two pills bio-activity, bio-absorption, added fillers, negative side effects. yet doctors & pharmacists consider equivalent - phooey & double phooey!!!
full_review:
Taken 5 mg of generic Amlodipine twice a day. Zydus 5mg. imprint Z3 a small pill and perhaps the best of the calcium channel blocker, I used it for 2 years, no problems or reactions. Then it was recalledunavailable. I was switched to Epic brand, some initial side effects, like sweating in not hot weather, tiredness, dizziness. When that was unavailable, pharmacy switched me to pills with the imprint IG238 and again initial sweats, but fine for 4 months, then not available.  Was switched to imprint 210 pills, make my bp go higher, when stopped, it went higher still. On (3318) got Cipla, imprint C127.
I hate pharmacies switching brands every month to save 3 cents, or brands that discontinue a pill to mergebuy out another firm, and we lose a good pill when lines merged. No two pills have the same bio-activity, bio-absorption, added fillers, or negative side effects.  Yet doctors & pharmacists consider them all equivalent - Phooey & Double Phooey!!!

review: lot research. amlodipine seems best migraine preventative us stubborn nearly daily migraines dont seem respond typical medications, least long term. two preventatives years: inderal amitriptyline. weaning medications. getting one headache week first couple weeks mg, think two weeks since last one. side effects me. miracle. verapamil seems effect, requires high doses mgday. must try medication tried others without lasting effects.
full_review:
I did a lot of research. Amlodipine seems to be the best migraine preventative for those of us with stubborn nearly daily migraines that dont seem to respond to the typical medications, at least in the long term. I was on two other preventatives for years: Inderal and Amitriptyline. I am now weaning off of both these other medications. I was getting about one headache a week for the first couple weeks at 10 mg, now I think its been two weeks since my last one. No side effects for me. Its a miracle. Verapamil seems to have the same effect, but requires very high doses up to 720 mgday.

You MUST try this medication if you have tried the others without lasting effects.

review: prescribed bp also nearly eliminated migraines. started migraines years ago high bp year ago. first bp prescription amlodipine daily. lowered bp *almost* importantly nearly eliminated migraines (from previous per month year none severe enough require real migraine medications). believe amlodipine also expanded intensified whatever fatigue might normally experience, *for me* acceptable tradeoff (yes, fatigue limiting, migraines limiting excruciatingly painful). see person taking amlodipine bp might unhappy side effects, migraines far far worse.
full_review: Prescribed for BP but also nearly eliminated migraines. I started having migraines 13 years ago and high BP 1 year ago. My first BP prescription was 5-10mg amlodipine daily. It lowered my BP and *almost* more importantly nearly eliminated all migraines (from previous 2-3 per month to a few for the year of which none were severe enough to require real migraine medications). I believe amlodipine has also expanded and intensified whatever fatigue I might normally experience, but *for me* that is an acceptable tradeoff (yes, fatigue can be limiting, but migraines are limiting and excruciatingly painful). I can see where a person taking amlodipine only for BP might be unhappy with the side effects, but the migraines are far far worse.

review: first prescribed combination pill amlodipine-benazepril days taking suffered allergic reaction called angieodema (face swelled up) turns im allergic benazepril. went days medication day dizzy spell work pressure. dr. called new prescription amlodipine days maybe enough time. however pressure spiked today!!! feel great however, dont muscle cramps. experience rapid heart beat days ago. concern maybe mgs low. dr saying wait weeks get full effect pill. update weeks.
full_review: I was first prescribed a combination pill Amlodipine-Benazepril 1020mg and after 29 days of taking it I suffered an allergic reaction called Angieodema (Face swelled up)  and it turns out Im allergic to Benazepril. I went 4 days with no medication and on the 4th day had a dizzy spell at work pressure was 150118. Dr. called in a new prescription of just Amlodipine 10mg, its only been 7 days so maybe its not enough time. However my pressure spiked today to 154120!!! I feel Great however, I dont have any muscle cramps. I did experience a rapid heart beat a few days ago. My concern is maybe the mgs are too low. Dr is saying to wait 2 weeks to get full effect of the pill. I will update in 2 weeks.

review: hormonal migraines sine. would horrible migraines menstrual cycle month. developed high blood pressure & doctor prescribed linsinopril & didnt lower enough added amlodipine. took months never migraine wonderful. but, developed waves severe fatigue feeling crappy much time. developed swelling feet & ankles & diastolic blood pressure almost time. researched medicines ive taking & decided monitor blood pressure & stop amlodipine. instantly felt better & blood pressure actually went down. dont know migraine return. worth side effects!
full_review: I have had hormonal migraines sine I was 17.  I would have horrible migraines through my menstrual cycle each month.   I developed high blood pressure & my doctor prescribed Linsinopril & when that didnt lower it enough he added Amlodipine.   I took it for about 9 months and never had a migraine which was wonderful.   BUT, I developed waves of severe fatigue and was feeling crappy all over much of the time.  I developed swelling in my feet & ankles & my diastolic blood pressure was almost 100 all the time.  I researched the medicines Ive been taking & decided to monitor my blood pressure & stop the Amlodipine.  I instantly felt better & my blood pressure actually went down.  Dont know if migraine will return.  Not worth the side effects!

review: second time tried amilopidine high blood pressure. first time lasted days. suffered side effects switched ramipril lasted months cough got me. tried amolipidine again. first week side effects. week fine weeks im itching covered welts - im allergic amlodipine
full_review: Second time tried 5mg amilopidine for high blood pressure. First time lasted 3 days. Suffered most of the side effects so switched to Ramipril which I lasted 2 months but the cough got me. Tried amolipidine again. First week had most of the side effects. After week 3 I was fine. 6 weeks in Im itching all over covered in welts - so Im allergic to amlodipine

review: end stage renal disease, i’ve dialysis years years old man. norvasc mg best medication bp hgmm med since take bp pulse good well. medication works me, tried everything out. gave med points, gums swelling pay lot dentist. ( teeth good ).
full_review: I have end stage renal disease, I’ve been on dialysis for 13 years. I am 29 years old man. For me Norvasc 2x5 mg is the best medication, when I was 17 I had a BP of 225110 Hgmm  and with this med since I take my BP is 115-14075-80 and my pulse is good as well. No other medication works for me, we tried everything out. I only gave this med 8 points, because my gums are swelling and I have to pay a lot for dentist. ( my teeth are good ).

review: medication months results great me. also work days week. feel much better longer nagging headaches. exercise get total benefit.
full_review: I have been on this medication for a few months and the results have been great for me.  I also work out 5-7 days a week. I feel much better and I no longer have those nagging headaches. You should exercise to get the total benefit.

review: took mg stuff yesterday. later felt heart beating arms woke heart beating fast. got up, got worse. knew may heart attack got dressed called. heart beat per minute stroke level bp. paramedics told sit shaking over. went er minutes bp pulse. took blood said didnt heart attack. stuff dangerous me.
full_review: I took 2.5 mg of this stuff yesterday at 5pm. Later I felt my heart beating in my arms. At 1 AM I woke up with my heart beating very fast. Got up, and it got worse. I knew I may have a heart attack so I got dressed and called 911. My heart beat 170 per minute and I had stroke level BP. The paramedics told me to sit and I was shaking all over. Went to the ER and in about 30 minutes my BP was 17585 and my pulse down to 95. They took my blood and said I didnt have a heart attack. This stuff is so dangerous for me.

review: ive taken norvasc generic, amlodopine. taking amlodopine now. side effects, does, love it. wish it. brings around. bad cant take more. everything weve tried add, headaches headaches, aches pains. dont get symptoms bp. like rush, anything. would take something makes feel way? quality life, know? im year old woman reasonably decent health
full_review:
Ive taken both Norvasc and its generic, amlodopine. I am taking amlodopine 10mg now.

No side effects, just does what it does, and I love it.

Just wish it did all of it. It only brings it down to around 16090- down from 230150. Too bad I cant just take more. Everything weve tried to add, headaches and headaches, and aches and pains. 

I dont get symptoms from from my BP. More like a rush, if anything. Why would take something that makes me feel that way? Quality of life, you know?

Im a 50 year old woman in reasonably decent health but for this

full_review: Was taking amlodipine 5mgday when I could for high blood pressure. It did help lower my blood pressure, but the migraines I got from it were unbearable. Each time I went off them the pain would slowly go away over the course of 2-3 days.

review: doctor prescribed amlodipine besylate borderline) hypertension april. used get migraine attack least month due work stress, eye stress insufficient sleep. day started amlodipine now, migraine history me. then, realize side-effect medication blessing!
full_review: The doctor prescribed me with Amlodipine Besylate 5mg for borderline (14090) hypertension in April 2012. I used to get migraine attack at least once a month due to work stress, eye stress and insufficient sleep. On the day I started Amlodipine until now, migraine is now history to me. Only then, I realize side-effect from medication can be a blessing!

review: used get migraines days every excedrin would work half time, half needed imitrex. month taking mgday amlodipine, initially prescribed borderline hypertension), headaches went onceweek, treatable one excedrin. need imitrex every two months instead two three times week. difference life! dont understand medication isnt used frequently migraine sufferers.
full_review: I used to get migraines 2 days out of every 3, and 2 Excedrin would work about half the time, the other half I needed Imitrex.  After about a month of taking 5 mgday of amlodipine, which was initially prescribed for borderline hypertension (14090), my headaches went to onceweek, and they were all treatable with one 1 Excedrin.  I only need Imitrex now once every two months instead of of two or three times a week.  What a difference in my life!  I dont understand why this medication isnt used more frequently for migraine sufferers.

review: adjusting drug knee foot pain id enduring gone (after taking month) today ran flight stairs wasnt winded heart didnt miss beat. id also experienced remarkable vivid dreams. walking day helps go easy salt. also eat banana morning take pill.
full_review: After adjusting to the drug the knee and foot pain Id been enduring is gone (after taking it for a month) and today I ran up a flight of stairs and I wasnt winded and my heart didnt miss a beat. Id also experienced remarkable vivid dreams. Walking 6k a day helps and go easy on the salt. I also eat a banana in the morning when I take my pill.

review: got prescribed amlopidine high blood pressure. however, years beforehand suffered terrible migraines weekly-(ish) frequency. crippling, affected vision, would often last days time. anyhow, bp slightly raised consistently, family history hypertension, current doctor suggested take amlopidine. reluctant take hed said take rest life months taking them, however, realized hadnt migraine while months ... still migraine. amazing! mentioned doctor told amlopidine used treatment migraines. well - works - blessing - liberating! hope continues work.
full_review:
I got prescribed Amlopidine for high blood pressure.

However, for years beforehand I had suffered with terrible migraines at a weekly-(ish) frequency. They were crippling, affected my vision, and they would often last for 1-3 days at a time. 

Anyhow, as my BP had been slightly raised consistently, and as my family have a history of hypertension, my current doctor suggested I take Amlopidine.  I had been reluctant to take it as hed said once on them I should take for the rest of my life.

After 3 months of taking them, however, I realized that I hadnt had a migraine for a while. 6 months further on ... still no migraine.  Amazing!   

I mentioned this to my doctor who then told me that Amlopidine was being used in the treatment of migraines.

Well - it works - What a blessing - its been liberating!   

I hope it continues to work.

review: doesnt really help lower bp me. week taking it, im starting experience weak limbs tiredness, like procartia. procartia caused major swelling ankles improved lowering dose. ankles feet getting swollen medication. also experiencing gut issues. also think affecting breathing like procartia does.. modern medicine failed
full_review: Doesnt really help lower bp for me. After a week of taking it, Im starting to experience weak limbs and tiredness, just like I did with Procartia. Procartia caused major swelling of ankles but improved after lowering my dose. Now my ankles and feet are getting more swollen with again this medication. Also experiencing gut issues. Also I think this is affecting my breathing like Procartia does.. Modern medicine has me failed again

review: didn’t realize amlodipine giving problems. many stated forum. stopped taking days ago feel improvement already. fatigue, dizziness ,back pain, congestion, indigestion, bloating, blurred vision, rash. i’ve years lowered blood pressure time went things started happening more. started googling found page. glad did. post time time updates. thanks all.
full_review: Didn’t realize it was amlodipine that was giving me all these problems. Many of which stated in this forum. I stopped taking it 2 days ago and feel improvement already. Fatigue, dizziness ,back pain, congestion, indigestion, bloating, blurred vision, rash. I’ve been on it for a few years and it lowered my blood pressure but as time went by all these things started happening and then more and more. I started googling and found this page. Glad I did. I will post from time to time for updates. Thanks all.

review: dr. told bp cholesterol high. prescribed amlodipine besylate statin. research drugs found horrible reviews. put drugs somewhere started lifestyle change dieting going gym. week bp check pharmacy bp high went home, started amlodipine. started feeling dizzy, headaches, back pain weak. stopped using friend mentioned moringa bitters. tried three days went bp check, found bp high. however, noticed symptoms associated amlodipine stopped taking moringa. confused though.
full_review: My Dr. told me that my BP and Cholesterol were high. He prescribed Amlodipine Besylate 5mg and Statin.  I did a research on the drugs and found some horrible reviews. I put the drugs somewhere and started a lifestyle change through dieting and going to the gym.  After a week I did a BP check at a Pharmacy and my BP was very high so I went home, started the Amlodipine. I started feeling dizzy, had headaches, back pain and weak.  I stopped using it when a friend mentioned Moringa Bitters. I tried it for three days and went for BP check, I found out that my BP was  very high.  However, I noticed that all the symptoms associated with the Amlodipine stopped when I was taking the Moringa. I am confused though.

review: ive amlodipine almost days now. ive nausea night insomnia (luckily, row), really sucks. bp feel great insomnia. im mg. wondering mg would work? anyone know lessing dosage would work?
full_review: Ive been on Amlodipine for almost 8 days now. Ive had nausea off and on and this is my 2nd night of insomnia (luckily, not in a row), but it really sucks. My BP is down and I feel great other than the insomnia. Im on 5 mg. wondering if the 2.5 mg would work? Anyone know if lessing the dosage would work?

review: using mg’s blood pressure. sensitive new med changes multiple drug allergies. medication, thus far mg per day, smooth transition. compared long time beta blocker use, feel much clear headed, able focus feel like zombie struggling feel energetic day. amazing added bonus taking medication, virtually eliminated significantly reduced migrainecluster headaches.
full_review:
Using 2.5 mg’s for blood pressure. I am very sensitive to new med changes and have multiple drug allergies. This medication, thus far, at 2.5 mg per day, has been a smooth transition. Compared to my long time beta blocker use, I feel much more clear headed, able to focus and not feel like a zombie struggling to feel energetic each day. 
An amazing added bonus to taking this medication, it has virtually eliminated if not significantly reduced my migrainecluster headaches.

review: started amlodopine year ago blood pressure dropped made feel ill usual. high anxiety since starting amlodopine, i’ve put weight, constantly swelling feet, hands eyes, blood pressure usually good numbers feel perfect. cut back dosage mg severe swelling, lately blood pressure somewhere found need take mg twice day now. i’m going try eliminate amlodopine go one hoping less side effects. amlodopine makes feel like-year-old body aches pains swelling everywhere. it’s even point right foot swells bad makes foot feel broken can’t walk. told pharmacist medication cannot effective own. i’ll see losartan works out.
full_review: I started in Amlodopine about a year ago at 10mg my blood pressure dropped down to 11570 which made me feel ill, 170100 was my usual. I do have high anxiety and since starting Amlodopine, I’ve put on weight, constantly swelling in my feet, hands and my eyes.  On 5mg, My blood pressure was usually at 13090 which are good numbers for me where I feel perfect.  I cut back the dosage to 5 mg Because of the severe swelling, but lately my blood pressure is  somewhere about 14595 and have found I need to take 5 mg twice a day now.  I’m going to try to eliminate Amlodopine and go with the other one hoping there will be less side effects. Amlodopine makes me feel like I have a 90-year-old body with all aches and pains and swelling everywhere. It’s even to the point now where my right foot swells so bad that it makes my foot feel broken and I can’t walk. I was told by the pharmacist that this medication cannot be effective on its own. I’ll see how Losartan works out.

review: horrible side effects including premature ventricular complexes (pvcs), cough, insomnia dizziness. pvc burden excessive% taking amlodipine. effective treating high blood pressure cost? pvc induced cardiomyopathy??? must pretty good propaganda drug, ignorance, carelessness, physicians almost invariably deny side effects ignore patient concerns listed side effect!! wonder subject late night legal commercial someday.
full_review: Horrible side effects including premature ventricular complexes (PVCs), cough, insomnia  and dizziness.  My PVC burden was excessive at 30 to 50% when taking amlodipine.  It is effective at treating high blood pressure but at what cost?  PVC induced cardiomyopathy???  There must be some pretty good propaganda about this drug, ignorance, carelessness, or all of the above because physicians almost invariably deny the side effects and ignore patient concerns of a LISTED SIDE EFFECT!! Wonder if this will be the subject of some late night legal commercial someday.

review: year old female high blood pressure. doctors prescribed many different high blood pressure medications years none stabalized pressure. month ago, changed norvasc. (i also take mg tenormin taken couple years daily). day taking norvasc, pressure dropped immediately. feel like new person. side effects all. feel life back now.
full_review: I am a 55 year old female with very high blood pressure.  The doctors have prescribed many different high blood pressure medications for me over the years and none have stabalized my pressure.  About a month ago, they changed me to Norvasc 10MG.  (I also take 50 MG of Tenormin which I have taken for a couple of years daily).  After a day of taking Norvasc, my pressure dropped immediately.  I feel like a new person.  No side effects at all.  I feel as if I have my life back now.

review: prescribed norvasc mg er one day went high blood pressure side effects start three weeks later, first side effect started pinpoint little balls blood legs warm feeling face tingling numbness arms legs. also fatigue weakness body. stop taking medication asked doctor give something else feeling horrible, put another medication years ago still feeling side effects. would never ever recommend drug anyone.
full_review: They  prescribed Norvasc 5 mg at the ER one day when I went with high blood pressure the side effects did not start until three weeks later, The first  side effect  started with pinpoint little balls of blood in my legs then a warm feeling in my face and then tingling and numbness in my arms and legs. I also have fatigue and weakness all over my body. I stop taking this medication  and asked the doctor to give me something else because I was feeling horrible, he did and put me on another medication that was 3 years ago and I am still feeling the side effects. I would never ever recommend this drug to anyone.

My blood pressure shot up to 250 over 126 the pain in my head was so bad I thought I was going to pass out thankfully I was already a patient in the hospital and the doctors were able to get my pressure down fast and started me on Amlodipine 5 mg it seems like its working good and a few side effects but Ill keep taking it.
