I have lost over 25 lbs, cholesterol, glucose levels dropped, I engage in both low & high impact workouts 5 days a week and this med has done nothing to lower my blood pressure, in fact has increased it!!  I went from low dose (25 mg to 50 mg) over a 2 month test period & the blood pressure was status quo and terrible side effects including dizziness, nausea, shortness of breath, migraines.

review: awful experience!! caused high levels anxiety depression. made blood pressure spike. also caused dry blurry eyes weird head pains. soon came switched beta blockers difference phenomenal. effects people different ways always try make judgement. thank
full_review:
Awful experience!!

Caused high levels of anxiety and depression.  This then made my blood pressure spike.

Also caused dry blurry eyes and weird head pains.

As soon as I came off and switched to beta blockers the difference was phenomenal.

It effects people in different ways so always try it yourself and make your own judgement.

Thank you

review: male. started taking cozaar days ago, add current regiment diuretic betablocker, bp climbing days taking it, bp went mg dose; smaller even manufacturer recommends. med works.....and fast. side effects me.
full_review:
Male 56. I started taking Cozaar just 4 days ago, to add to my current regiment of diuretic and betablocker, as my BP was climbing.  After only 4 days taking it, my BP went from 170102 down to 12969, and I am only on a 25 mg dose; smaller than even what the manufacturer recommends.
This med works.....and fast.   NO side effects for me.

review: losartan months now. maybe side effects first, none really now. take mg night, & bp went. took months however get low, wasnt immediate. believe probably saved life year old female.
full_review:
Been on losartan about 8 months now. Maybe a few side effects at first, but none really now. I take 50 mg at night, & my BP went from 190100 to 12575.
It took months however to get that low, it wasnt immediate. I believe it has probably saved my life. 60 year old female.

review: losartan years. done decent job lowering (genetic) moderately high bp, daily headache, acid reflux (controlled daily prilosec), rapid weight gain. cannot tolerate beta-blockers (terrible headaches & vivid nightmares), doc felt needed extra med accompany hydrochloride). ergo, losartan. bra size went “b” cup “ddd” practically overnight (not good thing), face swollen, cannot get weight control spite runningfast walking miles times week. eat little (never foodie), drink socially, dairy, mostly fruits veggies. recently noticed pain hips, attributed aging (i healthy yr old). see primary care physician two weeks hope conversation re: getting drug.
full_review:
I have been on Losartan for 4.5 years. it has done a decent job of lowering my (genetic) moderately high BP, but I have had a daily headache, acid reflux (controlled with a daily Prilosec), and rapid weight gain. I cannot tolerate Beta-Blockers (terrible headaches & vivid nightmares), and my doc felt I needed an extra med to accompany my hydrochloride). Ergo, Losartan. My bra size went from a “B” cup to a “DDD” practically overnight (not a good thing), my face is swollen, and I cannot get my weight under control in spite of runningfast walking 3.5 miles 4-5 times a week. I eat very little (never been a foodie), and drink only socially, no dairy, mostly fruits and veggies.
I have recently noticed pain in my hips, which I attributed to aging (I am a very healthy 67 yr old).
I see my primary care physician in two weeks and hope to have a conversation re: getting off this drug.

review: ive taking medication month doctor decided switched this. helps blood pressure half day bedtime blood pressure sky high again. legs, feet, hands go numb cramp. severe back pain along headaches general feeling unwell. whole body hurts recalls lately alarming. cant wait see doctor get medicine!
full_review: Ive been taking this medication for about a month after the doctor decided to switched to this. It helps with blood pressure for about half a day and by bedtime blood pressure is sky high again. Legs, feet, and hands go numb and cramp. Severe back pain along with headaches and just a general feeling of being unwell. My whole body hurts 247 with all the recalls lately is alarming. I cant wait to see the doctor and get off this medicine!

review: favor lose weight get medication. first two weeks taking losartan great went abruptly downhill. can’t breathe, dry mouth, constantly feel like cold. side effects medication horrible. i’m changing lifestyle habits get losartan.
full_review: Do yourself the favor and lose weight to get off this medication. The first two weeks of taking Losartan was great and then it went abruptly downhill. I can’t breathe, I have dry mouth, and I constantly feel like I have a cold. The side effects of this medication is horrible. I’m changing my lifestyle habits to get off of Losartan.

review: tolerated losartan much better lisinopril - lisinopril, developed much cough everybody experiences, vasovagal response - like gagging, dry heaving, matter at, warning! quickly discontinued request placed losartan. double dose, since blood pressure losartan atenolol years young, nonsmoker, bit chunky pounds - okay, well lot chunky, mostly eating much ben & jerrys chunky monkey ice cream. nevertheless, chilled time leg cramps night. nothing interrupts day evening....
full_review: I tolerated Losartan MUCH better than Lisinopril - with Lisinopril, I developed not so much the cough most everybody experiences, but a vasovagal response - like gagging, dry heaving, no matter what I was doing or where I was at, with no warning!  So that was quickly discontinued at my request and I was placed on Losartan.  Now I am on a double dose, since my blood pressure was at 168114 on not only Losartan BUT atenolol - at 56 years young, nonsmoker, and just a bit too chunky, at 180 pounds - okay, well a lot of chunky, mostly because of eating too much Ben & Jerrys Chunky Monkey ice cream.  Nevertheless, now I am chilled all the time and leg cramps at night.  Nothing that interrupts my day or evening....

review: straight point: losartan short time; med caused severe back pain leg pain; experience tingling; stopped taking it; side effects terrible
full_review: Straight to the point: been on losartan for a very short time; this med has caused me to have severe back pain and leg pain; I experience the tingling; I stopped taking it; the side effects are terrible

review: started mg, went mg mg. bp really control (hypotension - hypertension) heart rate resting gained pounds night. cozaar experience energy level much better previous years taking lisinopril, however bp control side affects experienced acceptable. something work.
full_review: Started at 25 mg, then went to 50 mg and then to 100 mg. While my BP was not really under control (hypotension - hypertension) and my heart rate was 112 while resting and I gained 12 pounds over night. During my Cozaar experience my energy level was so much better than it had been over the previous 10 years taking lisinopril, however BP control and the side affects I experienced were just not acceptable. There has to be something out there that will work.

review: losartan mg years side effects. since december blood pressure high getting migraines dr. upped. since wasnt working upped blood pressure still high. may went back dr. also retaining water switched losartan hctz. since feel pressure gone now. used average switching im averaging. june started feel super tired. ive taking online classes couldnt bring work. go work get home want sleep want do. also felt little depressed dont want anything go anywhere, go work cause feel extremely lazy.
full_review: I was on losartan 25 mg for 2 years and had no side effects. Since December my blood pressure was high and I was getting migraines so my Dr. upped it to 50mg. Since it wasnt working she upped it to 100mg but my blood pressure was still high. In May I went back to the Dr. because I was also retaining water so she switched me to losartan 100mg HCTZ 12.5. Since then I feel my pressure has gone down now. I used to average at 14090 but after switching Im averaging 11780. In June I started to feel super tired. Ive been taking online classes and couldnt bring myself to do my work. I just go to work and when I get home I just want to sleep and that is all I want to do. I have also felt a little more depressed to where I dont want to do anything or go anywhere, I go to work only cause I have to but after that I just feel extremely lazy.

review: i’m yr old female. med take losartan year now. bp often. side effects getting worse. insomnia, headaches, diarrhea, dizzy, tired, feet hurt, lay day longer energy exercise. enjoy couple glasses wine times week try stay low carb watch salt intake. i’m thinking would better taking since quality life gone down.
full_review: I’m a 58 yr old female. The only med I take is 25mg of losartan for over a year now. BP was about 14095 too often. My side effects are getting worse. Insomnia, headaches, diarrhea, dizzy, tired, feet hurt, have to lay down once a day and no longer have the energy to exercise. I enjoy a couple of glasses of wine a few times a week and try to stay low carb and watch my salt intake. I’m thinking I would be better off not taking this since my quality of life has gone down.

review: forced take losartan instead diovan insurance company refuses pay brand name drugs. really great insurance co. would rather realize huge profits expense patients health. well, losartan terrible me. noticeable side effects diovan. losartan ive hair loss also bad tingling left arm fingers. doctor told carpal tunnel syndrome without hesitation, know losartan thats causing condition never starting losartan. also causes tired lightheaded, side effects medicine.
full_review: I was forced to take Losartan instead of Diovan because my insurance company refuses to pay for brand name drugs.  Really great the insurance co. would rather realize huge profits at the expense of patients health.  Well, Losartan is terrible for me.  I had no noticeable side effects from Diovan.  But with the Losartan Ive had not only hair loss but also very bad tingling down my left arm into my fingers.  My doctor just told me its carpal tunnel syndrome without any hesitation, but I know its the Losartan thats causing this condition because I never had it until after starting Losartan.  It also causes me to be tired and lightheaded, both side effects of this medicine.

review: im new losartan potassium, six days ive taken mg, heart doesnt seem jumping chest, thinking seems clearer overall feeling wellness greatly improved. dont monitor yet, hopefully days able confirm pressure back normal.
full_review: Im new to Losartan Potassium, but in the six days Ive taken the 25 mg, my heart doesnt seem to be jumping out of my chest, my thinking seems clearer and my overall feeling of wellness is greatly improved.   I dont have a monitor yet, but hopefully in a few days I will be able to confirm my pressure is back to normal.

review: lotensin amlodipine years. blood pressure started rising period several months. dr put losartan. experienced copious sweating third day days, idea bp is, started problems breathing day. (have copd, breathing problems point). next day worse. took dose last night night, gasping oxygen coughing thick mucus. spent night sitting wondering go er. feel much better afternoon, although chest still sore arms ache badly spite taking lyrica fibromyalgia. better morning, chest sore, still trying cough mucus, chest tight.
full_review: Have been on Lotensin and amlodipine for years. Blood Pressure had started rising over a period of several months. Dr put me on Losartan. Experienced copious sweating on third day. After 5 days, have no idea what BP is, but started having problems breathing on 4th day. (have COPD,  few breathing problems at this point). The next day was worse. Took 5th dose last night and was up all night, gasping for oxygen and coughing up thick mucus. Spent the night sitting up wondering if I should go to ER.  Feel much better this afternoon, although my chest is still sore and my arms ache badly in spite of taking Lyrica for fibromyalgia. Better this morning, chest sore, still trying to cough up mucus, chest tight.

review: losartan, along hctz, five dosages caused bad physical mental side effects. included panic attacks, headaches, pressure behind eyes, lightheadedness, confusion, foggy feelings, tired also unable sleep, lack appetite, probably forgetting. also fainted twice, within minutes other, evening third dose, included spending three hours er recover massive dehydration. follow appointment pcp earlier today, prior sixth dosage, told stop taking it hours side effects gone! still mild headache, considerably better past couple days. know medication reacts differently every person, but, me, worth taking medicationsdosage, lower blood pressure small amount, compared side effects experienced.
full_review: I was only on Losartan 50mg, along with HCTZ 12.5mg, for five dosages and it caused some bad physical and mental side effects. They included panic attacks, headaches, pressure behind the eyes, lightheadedness, confusion, foggy feelings, being tired and also unable to sleep, lack of appetite, and probably more that I am forgetting. I also fainted twice, within 15 minutes of each other, on the evening of my third dose, which included spending three hours in the ER to recover from massive dehydration. I had a follow up appointment with my PCP earlier today, prior to my sixth dosage, and he told me to stop taking it. I have been off it for only 28 hours and the side effects are gone! I still have a mild headache, but it is considerably better than the past couple of days. I know medication reacts differently for every person, but, for me, it was not worth taking this medicationsdosage, which did lower my blood pressure a small amount, compared to all of the side effects I experienced.

review: prescribed losartan years ago. didnt issues blood clots legs began reoccur began medicine. continually brought doctor years dismissed time. although stress free life, constant heaviness chest making difficult breathe, chronic insomnia, massive bruises form leg, (without incident bumping anything). tired throughout day, since sleeping, feel terrible. spikes blood pressure concerned doctor dismisses issues.
full_review: I was prescribed Losartan about 8 years ago. I didnt have any issues other than blood clots in my legs that began to reoccur after I began the medicine. I continually brought it up to my doctor over the years but he has dismissed it each time. Although I have a stress free life, I have constant heaviness in my chest making it difficult to breathe, chronic insomnia, and massive bruises that form on my leg, (without any incident of bumping them against anything). I am tired throughout the day, since I am not sleeping, and feel terrible. I have spikes in my blood pressure and am concerned because my doctor dismisses these issues.

review: blood pressure improved lorsartan, many side effects. blood pressure would drop low heart rate. would dizzy tired wanted sleep. least week would experience diarrhea. coughed lot getting worse. foot leg cramps. feeling terrible. since stopping use drug improving diet feeling much better symptoms disappeared. blood pressure control without it. drug poison killing me.
full_review: My blood pressure was improved with Lorsartan, but I had many side effects.  My blood pressure would drop to as low as 98 over 84 with heart rate of 130. I would be dizzy and so tired I just wanted to sleep. At least  once a week I would experience diarrhea. I coughed a lot and it was getting worse.  I had foot and leg cramps.  I was feeling terrible.  Since stopping use of this drug and improving my diet I am feeling much better and my symptoms have disappeared. My blood pressure is under control without it.  This drug is poison and was killing me.

review: doctor put losartan month ago, new insurance wouldnt pay candesartan on. works great keeping blood pressure good levels along metoprolol im also. first weeks started mild headaches finally disappeared, slight sore throat time, slight hacking cough, one nostril runs constantly....weird, know. im going give another month see side effects disappear like headaches.

It works great keeping blood pressure at good levels along with the Metoprolol Im on also. For the first 3 weeks I started off having mild headaches that finally disappeared, and now I have a slight sore throat all of the time, a slight hacking cough, and only one nostril that runs constantly....weird, I know. Im going to give it another month and see if these side effects disappear like the headaches.

review: losartan since mid. cardiologist lets tailor dosage needs. usually take mg daily morning. around end refilled rx. noticed pills white instead blue green. take mg get bp reduction. cant sleep night. side effect higher doses. asked pharmacist whats story . havent heard anything. told new gp didnt know anything it. ideas?
full_review: I have been on losartan since mid 2016. My Cardiologist lets me tailor the dosage to my needs. I usually take between 25-50 mg daily in the morning. Around the end of 2019 refilled RX. Noticed that the pills are white now instead of the blue or green.  I now have to take 50-100 mg to get any BP reduction. And now cant sleep at night. Was a side effect before when on higher doses. So Asked the Pharmacist whats the story . They havent heard of anything. Told the new GP and she didnt know anything about it. Any ideas?

review: husband put losartan mg sept, sept started experiencing brain fog ache right shoulder, sleepless night. symptoms progressed. unsteady feet, uselessness right arm, tremors, called dr cut back mg,. still symptoms progressed much brain fog doesnt know use remote control, cant find things right front him, gave driving, gave cooking, cut food. went er past saturday rule stroke. said medication. back dr. took losartan begging her. upped water pill kept amlodipine see does. night last night, missing another day work today. sure missed something medicine caused him, pray long term effects. dont understand also recalled fda pulled it.
full_review: My husband was put on Losartan 50 mg Sept. 12, on Sept 14 he started experiencing brain fog and ache in his right shoulder, sleepless night.  The symptoms progressed.  Unsteady on his feet, uselessness of right arm, tremors, called Dr she cut him back to 25 mg on 923,. Still symptoms progressed to so much brain fog he doesnt know how to use remote control, cant find things that are right in front of him, gave up driving, gave up cooking, I have to cut up his food.  We went to ER this past Saturday to rule out stroke.  They said it is his medication.  Back to Dr.  She took him off Losartan after begging her.  Upped his water pill and kept him on his Amlodipine to see how he does.  He was up all night last night, missing another day of work today.  I am sure I have missed something that this medicine has caused him, I pray they are not long term effects.  I dont understand why if it is also recalled why the FDA has not pulled it.

review: diagnosed last year high blood pressure (hbp) age, meds. within months starting losartan noticed changes hair texture, thinning & loss. it’s thin, lifeless, shedding, whispery hair mainly crown back head. know drug. discussed matter yet doctor. looking quick fixes suggestions check on-line: dht blocker, hair loss; check olive leaf extract lowering bp blood sugar. help current thin lifeless hair suggest: chi shampoo magnified volume good hair mousse like tresemme thermal creations volume boosting hr body mousse, catwalk strong mousse. allow least look like hair feel better interim. simply suggestions temporarily deal hair loss pitch med garbage.

It’s just thin, lifeless, shedding, whispery hair mainly at the crown at the back of my head. I know it is because of this drug.  Have not discussed this matter yet with my doctor. We are looking for some quick fixes here are my suggestions check out on-line:    DHT Blocker, hair loss; check out Olive Leaf Extract for lowering BP and blood sugar.  For help with your current thin and lifeless hair I suggest:   CHI Shampoo Magnified Volume and a good hair mousse like TRESemme Thermal Creations for volume boosting, NOT their 24 hr Body mousse, or Catwalk Strong Mousse.  This will allow you to at least look like you have more hair and feel better about yourself in the interim. These are simply my suggestions to temporarily deal with this hair loss until we can all pitch this med in the garbage.

There is no doubt in my mind that Losartan contributes to anxiety.  
Ive learned that my thoughts control my blood pressure and through a conscious effort practicing positive thinking and more importantly realizing that I have no control over things that can happen, I am now thriving and have come off Losartan and I feel like a new person.  I also try to eat healthy and exercise and it is like a whole new life.

review: yr old mother generic losartin years. took day controlled blood pressure. new dr. upped dosage seemed well got type influenza. recuperating give losartan seems knock blood pressure really low makes weak hrs. hacking cough recurrent bronchitis years. know could side effect losartan. meds takes except daily multi-vitamin.
full_review: My 90 yr old Mother has been on generic Losartin for 8 years.  She took 50mg a day and it controlled her blood pressure.  We have a new Dr. and he upped her dosage to 75mg which seemed to do well until she got Type A influenza.  Now she is recuperating and when we give her losartan it seems to knock her blood pressure really low and makes her weak for 2 hrs.  She has had a hacking cough and recurrent bronchitis for years. I did not know that could be a side effect of the losartan. These are the only meds she takes except for a daily multi-vitamin.

review: dr. switched diovan hct losartan costs. losartan worked well keeping blood pressure steady. addidtion, type diabetes take cialis daily. interestingly, losartan greatly helped erections, well. investigation, discovered men similar experiences. meant medicine erectile dysfunction, greatly helped men, especially used combination cialis.
full_review: My Dr. switched me from Diovan HCT to Losartan because of costs.  Losartan has worked well for keeping blood pressure steady.  In addidtion, I have Type 2 Diabetes and take Cialis 5mg daily.  Interestingly, Losartan has greatly helped with erections, as well.  In doing further investigation,  I have discovered that other men have had similar experiences.  While not meant to be a medicine for erectile dysfunction, it has greatly helped men, especially when used in combination with Cialis.

review: switched losartan lisinipril caused horrifying cough. stopped taking called doctor. losartan weeks blood pressure went hypertension pre-hypertension. really want lower. exercising every morning eating good time. yet appears ive gained weight legs feel like jello squat hard get up. first thought havent running forever weeks running getting worse. ankles, behind knees calf muscles worst. guess discuss doctor next week. normal pain.

I first thought it was because I havent been running in forever but its been 3 weeks of running and its getting worse. Ankles, behind the knees and calf muscles are the worst. Guess I will discuss with doctor next week. This is not a normal pain.

review: losartan poison hope anyone taking least monitors improvement vs. side effects...because sneak you. believe medication much harm good, please careful...i took lisinopril gave cough. gave-full months time, became ill. extreme fatigue, headaches, sore back, weakness legs scary. felt like flu daily thought might another medication on, tested stopping meds nope...the symptoms still remained. exhausted time, could hardly get day take daily naps. slept deeply vivid dreams. never ever again!
full_review: Losartan is poison and I hope anyone taking it at least monitors their improvement if any vs. the side effects...because they sneak up on you.  I believe this medication will do much more harm than good, so please be careful...I took it because Lisinopril gave me a cough.  I gave it 3-full months and during that time, I became very ill.  Extreme fatigue, headaches, sore back, weakness in my legs that was very scary.  I felt like I had the flu daily and I thought it might be another medication I was on, but I tested myself by stopping the other meds and nope...the symptoms still remained.  I was so exhausted all the time, I could hardly get through my day and had to take daily naps.  I slept very deeply with vivid dreams.  Never ever again!

review: put losartan high blood pressure beta blocker metoprolol didnt seem trick. course year taking losartan, gradually increased wasnt effective higher dose long. time, began experiencing tight throat tongue, extreme anxiety. moved higher, max dosage milligrams, swelling tongue throat became bad taken er three times. doctor time never suggested withdrawing losartan. finally went second doctor took losartan cold turkey put chlorthalidone instead. five days since immediate stop losartan, feeling swelling throat tongue well feeling like muscles constricted fold. im tired going er. medicine poisons you.
full_review: I was put on Losartan for my high blood pressure after the Beta blocker Metoprolol didnt seem to do the trick.  Over the course of the year I was taking Losartan, it was gradually increased because it wasnt effective at the higher dose for very long.  During this time, I began experiencing tight throat and tongue, extreme anxiety.  Once I was again moved higher, to the max dosage of 100 milligrams,  the swelling in my tongue and throat became so bad I was taken to the ER three times.  My doctor at the time never suggested withdrawing from Losartan.  I finally went to a second doctor who took me off the Losartan cold turkey and put me on chlorthalidone instead.  Five days since the immediate stop of Losartan, and the feeling of swelling in the throat and tongue as well as feeling like all of my muscles are constricted have been 10 fold.  Im tired of going to ER.  This medicine poisons you.

review: several+-) yrs ago med losartan dont remember side effects. eventually bp went low doc took bp meds (was different bp meds one point!). didnt take anything years after. reason bp high (average) new doc put losartan. first day taking again. hopefully side effects would hard tell since lupus, spinal fusion recently (this past dec), hiatal hernia causes severe stomach pain often constant pain daily basis. lisinipril years developed horrible chronic dry cough. nobody could explain causing cough. finally ended seeing new doc said immediately lisinipril changed losartan. cough went away didnt happen losartan. well update med while.
full_review: Several (3+-) yrs ago I was on this med losartan and dont remember having any side effects.  Eventually my BP went down too low and my doc took me off all my BP meds (was on 3 different BP meds at one point!).  I didnt take anything for a few years after.  Now for some reason my BP is high again (average about 150100) so my new doc put me on 50mg of losartan. This is my first day taking it again.  Hopefully no side effects but it would be hard to tell since I have Lupus, have had spinal fusion recently (this past Dec), and have a hiatal hernia which causes severe stomach pain often so I am in constant pain on a daily basis. I was on lisinipril for years and had developed a horrible chronic dry cough. Nobody could explain what was causing the cough.  Finally I ended up seeing a new doc who said immediately that it was because of the lisinipril and changed it to the losartan.  My cough went away and didnt happen while on losartan.  Well I will update after I am on this med for a while.

I have found that taking a Magnesium Glycinate supplement has helped a bit with the anxiety (a little bit) however the drugs effectiveness has seemed to diminish (ie BP isnt lowered anymore). full_review:
I developed crippling stomachabdominal pain and my doctor dismissed any connection to my medication. I consequently underwent several scans and tests which as well as being very costly to the NHS also took up valuable time which could have been spent on other patients. All results came back normal. 
It was purely accidental that I forgot to collect my prescription on a Friday and went on to enjoy a pain free weekend. I was put onto beta-blockers for my high blood pressure instead on which I have been fine, but interestingly the doctor still insisted that the Losartan would not have caused my symptoms !

review: year old male. dr. put losartin brief trial period another medicine caused cough dose losartin seemed working fine past several years. blood pressure episode three months ago blood pressure suddenly elevated dangerous levels. trip emergency room dr. put losartinhtz morning along atenolol taken night. started feeling tired, developed irritating cough, fluid ear, gained weight developed ringing ears. really felt like dying. legs felt heavy feeling like myself. appointment dr. next week hopefully change meds.
full_review: 55 year old male.  Dr. Put me on 50mg Losartin after a brief trial period with another medicine that caused a cough.  The 50mg dose of Losartin seemed to be working fine for the past several years.  Had a blood pressure episode about three months ago where blood pressure suddenly elevated to dangerous levels.  After trip to emergency room my Dr. put me on 100mg of LosartinHTZ in the morning along with 50mg of Atenolol which is taken at night.  Started feeling very tired, developed an irritating cough, had fluid in my ear, gained weight and developed a ringing in my ears.  I really felt like I was dying.  Legs felt heavy and I was just not feeling like myself.  Appointment with Dr. next week to hopefully change meds.

review: ive taking medication months bit longer. lot bowel movements, stomach discomfort, went weighing lbs lbs, mention feeling dizzy, fatigue, left message doctors reception desk, im hoping get call back today, reply message.
full_review:
Ive been taking this medication for about 1 12 months or a bit longer. I have
been having a a lot of bowel movements, stomach discomfort, went from weighing
123 lbs to 98 lbs, not to mention feeling dizzy, and fatigue, just left a message
with my doctors reception desk, and Im hoping I get a call back today, with
a reply to my message.

review: got prescribed cozaar one week ago manage hypertension. dosage low mg. however, experiencing persistent cough. experienced side effect tried lisinopril. follow-up appointment doctor next week.
full_review: Just got prescribed Cozaar one week ago to manage hypertension. My dosage is very low - 25 mg. However, I am experiencing a persistent cough. I experienced the same side effect when I tried lisinopril. Have a follow-up appointment with doctor next week.

review: started mg cozaar hypertension mg atenolol mg hydrochlorothiazide didnt lower blood pressure lisinopril coughing. couple days started taking it, tops feet ankles started swell, couldnt wear shoes. quit taking it, doctor found out, made go back it. okay couple weeks, swelling came back, slightly mitigated compression hose slightly. back drawing board.
full_review: Started 25 mg Cozaar for hypertension when 100 mg atenolol   25 mg hydrochlorothiazide didnt lower my blood pressure and after lisinopril had me coughing 247.  A couple of days after I started taking it, the tops of my feet and my ankles started to swell, I couldnt wear my shoes.  I quit taking it, but when my doctor found out, she made me go back on it.  I was okay for a couple of weeks, but the swelling came back, slightly mitigated by compression hose but only slightly.  Back to the drawing board.

review: losartan several years, experienced deep depression, point suicide, loss hearing, voice, numerous aching mostly legs persistent dry cough bp still high, doctor finally decided white coat syndrome stopped taking losartan weeks ago, feel almost back normal thank goodness best thing bp (which take home bp machine times day different times) ranges. occasionally depending whats going might rise often yr old female, slight build.
full_review:
I was on Losartan for several years, experienced very deep depression, to the point of suicide, loss of hearing, voice, numerous aching mostly in legs and a persistent dry cough but BP was still high, doctor finally decided it was white coat syndrome
I stopped taking losartan 7 weeks ago, feel almost back to normal thank goodness best thing is my BP (which I take on home BP machine 3 or 4 times a day at different times) ranges from 10669 to 12379. Occasionally depending on whats going on it might rise to 14285 but not very often. I am a 69 yr old female, very slight build.

review: cozaar help blood pressure side effects bad. headaches day one, nausea, low back pain nonstop trips toilet. doctor wanted try cozaar medicare provider wouldnt cover diovan. taking diovan years. took forever find drug worked blood pressure without side effects. diovan expensive-day supply, works.
full_review: Cozaar did not help my blood pressure and the side effects were bad. I had headaches from day one, nausea, low back pain and nonstop trips the toilet. My doctor wanted me to try Cozaar because my medicare provider wouldnt cover my Diovan. I have been taking Diovan for years. It took forever to find a drug that worked on blood pressure without side effects. Diovan is expensive at $80  for a 30-day supply, but it works.

review: im old petite lady. bp occasionally slightly. usual. horrible drug), side effects crept weeks. felt weak, like coming flu, grumpy messed breathing, like couldnt take deep breath. lower bp. worth feeling awful. stopped taking & felt better.
full_review: Im a 40yr old petite lady. BP only occasionally slightly above 12080. Usual 11070. Horrible drug (25mg), side effects crept up over a few weeks. Felt weak, like coming down with flu, grumpy and it messed with breathing, like couldnt take a deep breath. It did lower BP. But not worth feeling so awful. Stopped taking it & felt better.

review: used benicar weeks see could tolerate it. doctor prescribed losartan - generic group medicines. within week taking losartan, began experience fatigue upper body slight numbness arms, hands fingers. simple tasks like mowing trimming lawn wore caused upper body muscles feel like id worked hours. experience jaw pain left side, ache neck well. ive taken medicine weekend see doctor put back atenolol chlorothal, previous blood pressure medicines (made sensitive sunlight nothing bad losartan) doctor seemed surprised side effects reading site among others shows im alone.
full_review:
Used Benicar for 6 weeks to see if I could tolerate it.  Doctor then prescribed Losartan - a generic from the same group of medicines.  Within a week of taking Losartan, I began to experience fatigue in my upper body with slight numbness in my arms, hands and fingers. Simple tasks like mowing and trimming my lawn wore me out and caused my upper body muscles to feel like Id worked out for hours.  Some experience of jaw pain on my left side, ache in neck as well.  Ive taken myself off this medicine for the weekend and will see if my Doctor can put me back on Atenolol Chlorothal, my previous blood pressure medicines (made me sensitive to sunlight but nothing as bad as Losartan)
Doctor seemed surprised by my side effects but reading this site among others shows Im not alone.

review: losartan effective controlling bp typical measurement. initially started taking losartan years ago, took morning experienced light headednessdizziness. doctor suggested taking bedtime, strategy worked great allowed body adapt. short amount time, changed taking every morning problem light headednessdizzines. appreciate medicine done regulate blood pressure.
full_review:
losartan is very effective at controlling my BP to a typical measurement of  12075. 

When I initially started taking Losartan ~10 years ago, I took it in the morning and experienced light headednessdizziness. My doctor suggested taking it at bedtime, this strategy worked great and  allowed my body to adapt. After a short amount of time, I changed to taking every morning and had no problem with light headednessdizzines.  I appreciate what this medicine has done to regulate my Blood Pressure.

review: im already bp med, pcp wanted start losartan diet-controlled diabetes. started, but, week, increased. first two nights wrecked insanely severe back pain (i long history degenerative arthritis spine, pain insane culminated full blown-hour anxietypanic attack likes never dealt (i also take meds depressionanxiety). also long history ibs days watery stools. refuse live like this... better way. cannot wait week side effects already issues begin with...
full_review: Im already on a BP med, but my PCP wanted to start me on losartan because of diet-controlled diabetes. I started at 25mgday, but, after a week, she increased it to 100mgday. The first two nights were wrecked with insanely severe back pain (I have a long history of degenerative arthritis in my spine, but this pain was insane!) and the 3rd culminated in a full blown 24-hour anxietypanic attack the likes of which I have never dealt with (I also take meds for depressionanxiety). I also have a long history of IBS and have had 3 days of watery stools. I refuse to live like this... There has to be a better way. I cannot wait out the week or so for the side effects when I already had these issues to begin with...

review: switched since lisinopril made cough like barking seal. keeps bp check, however, taking medication several months developed serious side effects, including weight gain --up pounds since started taking, high blood potassium, moderate dehydration, numbness, orthostatic hypotension (probably dehydration). one told potassium issue, wasnt warned pharmacist, doctor, look internet. vitamin c supplement contains electrolytes contributing factor. really, really think potassium issue label bottle. along causes weight gain. important use specific health issues.
full_review: Switched to this since Lisinopril made me cough like a barking seal. It keeps the bp in check, however, after taking this medication for several months I have developed serious side effects, including weight gain --up 20 pounds since started taking, high blood potassium, moderate dehydration, numbness, orthostatic hypotension (probably from the dehydration). No one told me about the potassium issue, wasnt warned by the pharmacist, the doctor, had to look this up on the internet. My vitamin C supplement contains electrolytes and this is a contributing factor. REALLY, REALLY think this potassium issue should be on the label of each bottle. Along with CAUSES weight gain. Very important for those of use with specific health issues.

review: losartan terrible blood pressure medicine. losartan months. felt tired time increased insomnia. blood pressure got drs office one day dr increased dose losartan. felt awful days. flu like symptoms red eyes bad bad leg pains. went back, going talk dr getting period. lisinopril made cough bad ended seeing pulmonologist
full_review: Losartan is a terrible  blood pressure medicine. I was on losartan 50 for about 9 months. Felt tired all the time and had increased insomnia. Then blood pressure got up in the Drs office one day to 180100 my Dr increased dose to losartan 100mg. Felt awful on it for 5 Days. Flu like symptoms and red eyes and bad bad leg pains. Went back down to 50mg, but am going to talk to my Dr about getting off period. I was in Lisinopril which made me cough so bad I ended up seeing a pulmonologist

review: works great except runny nose hours take it. linsopril made cough. massive heart attack months ago medicines side effects dont compare fear & pain attack. diet & exercise & dr. said blood results better good.
full_review: Works great except for runny nose for a few hours after I take it. Linsopril made me cough 247. Had massive heart attack 4 months ago and medicines side effects dont compare to fear & pain of that attack. Diet & exercise & Dr. Said blood results better than good.

review: dr put losartan. right started taking it, whole back much pain. told dr pain believed losartan. said physically demanding job. keep taking it. much pain, couldnt work emailed explained pain. said case studies causing back pain keep taking it. telling three times pain due medicine still would help switching drs. yes, lowered blood pressure back pain worth it!
full_review: My Dr had put me on the Losartan. Right after I started taking it, my whole back was in so much pain. I had told my Dr about the pain and I believed it was the Losartan. He said I had a physically demanding job. Keep taking it. After being in so much pain, I couldnt work I emailed him and explained my pain. He said there has been no case studies of it causing back pain to keep taking it. After telling him three times I was in pain due to this medicine and he still would not help me I am switching Drs. Yes, it lowered my blood pressure but the back pain I was having is NOT worth it!

review: years old - taking losartan krka weeks far side effects blood pressure, check daily times, eat chicken meat skin times week , walking minutes minimum days week, salt, sweets alcohol coffee tea, eat oatmeal skim milk sunflower seeds breakfast, brown rice boiled vegetables, various beans, peas, walnuts, oranges, apples, avocados, beetroots, potatoes drinking glasses water daily avoiding stress, hopefully next visit doctor lower dose see coffee day maybe glass red wine times week..so far good..!!
full_review: 49 years old - I have been taking losartan krka 50mg for 3 weeks so far with no side effects at all and blood pressure from 14090 is now between 11478 - 11879, I check daily 4 times, I eat chicken meat with no skin 3 times a week , walking 30-40 minutes minimum 5 days a week, no salt, no sweets no alcohol and no coffee or tea, I eat oatmeal with skim milk and sunflower seeds for breakfast, brown rice with boiled vegetables, various beans, peas, walnuts, oranges, apples, avocados, beetroots, potatoes and drinking 8-10 glasses water daily and avoiding stress, hopefully my next visit to the doctor will lower my dose to 25mg and see if I can have a coffee once a day and maybe a glass of red wine 1-2 times a week..so far so good..!!

review: taken mg per day month. runny nose cough going. pressure wonderful. tired runny nose cough sure everyone around also. doctor suggested try metoprolol. maybe try tonight.
full_review: I have taken 1- 100 mg per day for 1 month. I have runny nose and cough and it is not going. Pressure is wonderful. I am tired of the runny nose and cough and I am sure everyone around is also. Doctor suggested to try Metoprolol. I will maybe try it out tonight.

review: taking losartan approximately years. within last-months started getting abdominal pains run would work way groin area either left right hip joint. pain became overwhelming recently stopped running. cutting medication-days pain free. cat scan abdomen hip findings. put together years would start reaction medication. getting ready start running look new bp medication.
full_review: Taking Losartan 50mg for approximately 2.5 years.  Within the last 8-months started getting abdominal pains which after a run would work its way down into my groin area and then either my left or right hip joint.  The pain became overwhelming where I have recently stopped running.  After cutting out all my medication for 4-days I am pain free.  I did do a CAT Scan on my abdomen and hip with no findings.  I did not put together that after 2.5 years I would start having a reaction to the medication.   Getting ready to start running again and look into a new BP  medication.

review: losartan months now. first, seemed fine apparent problems. blood pressure still pretty high medication added making. getting progressively worse tiredness, joint body pain. referred physical therapy improvement. hurts move. experienced quickly improved medication changes. thinking may losartan dont remember taken off.
full_review: I have been on Losartan 100mg for about 4 months now.  At first, it seemed fine with no apparent problems. Blood pressure was still pretty high until medication was added making it my 4th. I have been getting progressively worse with tiredness, joint and body pain.  Referred to physical therapy with no improvement.  Just hurts to move.  I have experienced this before and quickly improved after medication changes.  Thinking it may be the Losartan because I was on it before but dont remember why I was taken off.

review: taking medicine developed serious non-stop cough cold symptoms. tried cold cough medications didnt work. decided stop taking three days symptoms stopped.
full_review: After taking this medicine I developed a serious non-stop cough and cold symptoms.  I tried cold and cough medications that didnt work. I decided to stop taking it and by three days after all the symptoms stopped.

review: took losartan year, started severe leg cramps legs.could find anything help me. doctor sent neurology doctor found nerve problems, gave pain pills. read losartan noted caused leg cramps. took problems cramps. six months later lost muscle use body, lost lbs instantly. know do, year lost kidney. bad drug
full_review: I took Losartan  for over a year, I started to have severe leg cramps in both legs.Could not find anything to help me.  Doctor sent me to a neurology doctor who found no nerve problems, gave me pain pills.  I read up on Losartan and noted it caused leg cramps.   I took myself off and had no problems with cramps.  Six months later I lost all muscle use in my body, lost 30 lbs instantly.  Now do know what to do, it has now been a year and I just lost a kidney.  This is a very very bad drug

review: healthy entire life thank god last year blood pressure starting going up. doctor prescribed metoprolol lisinopril. started coughing constantly ended er thinking pneumonia. er dr switched lisinopril losartan potassium. leg back pain unbearable point cannot almost stand even walk. afraid falling. dizzy tired. need quality life. dangerous side effects even worse felt bp started going up. something better this.
full_review: I have been very healthy my entire life thank God until last year that my blood pressure starting going up. Doctor prescribed Metoprolol and Lisinopril. Started coughing constantly that ended up at the ER thinking I had pneumonia. ER Dr switched Lisinopril for Losartan Potassium. Leg and back pain is unbearable to the point that I cannot almost stand and even walk. I am afraid of falling. Dizzy and tired. No need to have this quality of life. Dangerous side effects even worse than what I felt when BP started going up. It has to be something better than this.

review: losartan tore up. weighted started it....doc said quit taking hit. crying praying pain head go away, shakes, woke middle night light flashes eyes, panicanxiety attacks, rapid heart beats, eyes felt like going pop head, ribs hurt, gut hurt, zero energy, blurred vision...nasty stuff. said would take time go away.
full_review:
Losartan tore me up. I weighted 205lb when I started it....Doc said to quit taking it when I hit 188lb. Had me crying and praying for the pain in my head to go away, the shakes, woke up in the middle of the night with light flashes in my eyes, panicanxiety attacks, rapid heart beats, my eyes felt like they were going to pop out of my head, ribs hurt, gut hurt, zero energy, blurred vision...nasty stuff.
They said it would take time for it to go away.

review: blood pressure dropped sharply nicely. able halve dose week. noticeable pedal edema medication stopping medication due excellent response disfiguring foot lower leg swelling..
full_review: Blood pressure dropped sharply and nicely.  Able to halve the dose after a week.  Very noticeable pedal edema during medication and after stopping the medication due to excellent response and the disfiguring foot and lower leg swelling..

review: given generic medication hypertension. bp good day days since starting heart sometimes feels like thump middle chest. without fail bp goes night around pm find hard sleep afraid heart attack night. take losartan mg pill around pm , wake around bp heart pounding! benicar terribly dizzy every single day ---dont know able continue losartan fearful bp meds like beta blockers! scared!
full_review: Given this generic medication for hypertension.  My BP was good during the day. I am 59  I have been on it 7 days now and since starting it my heart sometimes feels like it has a thump in the middle of my chest.  Without fail my BP goes up at night around 10-11 pm and I find it very hard to sleep for being afraid I will have a heart attack during the night.  Take losartan 25 mg pill around 8 pm , I will wake up around 1 am with my BP up to 150-16090-95 and my heart pounding! I was once on Benicar and was terribly dizzy every single day ---dont know if I will be able to continue losartan but more fearful of the other BP meds like beta blockers!  Very scared!

review: losartan years ago. pain left eye felt big socket; pins needles numbness left arm; insomnia; leg cramps, calf fasiculations. pulsatile tinnitus. opthalmologist said naevi eye, prob birthmark yrs prior years prior naevi. heart felt like might stop? anxiety agreed gp come meds may (supervised). bloods normal, low carb diet, lost stone bp blood sugar normal range. tinnitus calf fasc remain. jump forward mar bp climbing gp started losartan took weeks tinnitus +++ calf fasiculations +++. april rushed er pulse mins. ecg confirmed svt (supraventricular tachycardia) mri-no structural issues heart. prior cardiac issues. cardiologist -next step catheter ablation losartan cause? calf fasiculations misfiring electrical signals muscles heart muscle too? stop wait see!
full_review:
Losartan 50mgs 3 years ago. Pain in left eye felt too big for socket; pins needles numbness left arm; insomnia; leg cramps, calf fasiculations. Pulsatile tinnitus. Opthalmologist said I have naevi in eye, prob birthmark but 3 yrs prior & 6 years prior to that no naevi. Heart felt like it might just stop?  I had anxiety agreed with GP to come off meds in May 2018 (supervised). Bloods normal, low carb diet, lost 3 stone and BP and blood sugar normal range. The tinnitus and calf fasc remain.
Jump forward to 26th Mar 19 and my BP climbing so GP started Losartan 50mgs but took 25mgs with in 4 weeks tinnitus +++ Calf fasiculations +++.
April rushed to ER  with a pulse of 213 for 45 mins. ECG confirmed SVT (supraventricular tachycardia) MRI-no structural issues with my heart. No prior cardiac issues. Cardiologist -next step is catheter ablation but what about Losartan being the cause? If calf fasiculations are misfiring electrical signals in muscles why not heart muscle too?
So we stop it wait and see!

review: prescribed losartan, partly im dealing gout flare, supposedly helps well. like doctor didnt even take disability (which year old c spinal injury causing partial paralysis, makes% med records) account: chronic bad back, chronic edema, spasticitymuscle cramping, tinnitus, life-long history migraines, chronic sinus infections, insomnia, bowel & bladder incontinence, chronic fatigue. wish id researched med taking it, side effects exactly contrary nearly things suffer result disability. spent entire night awake, ears ringing like mad, fever dreaming, head banging one side, hands going numb, terribly anxious, feeling like minute going explode. im going see doctor put something like bisoprolol, relative mine takes good luck with...
full_review:
Prescribed Losartan, partly because Im dealing with a gout flare, and it supposedly helps with that as well. Its like my doctor didnt even take my disability (which is a 36 year old C4-5 spinal injury causing partial paralysis, and makes up about 80% of my med records) into account: chronic bad back, chronic edema, spasticitymuscle cramping, tinnitus, life-long history of migraines, chronic sinus infections, insomnia, bowel & bladder incontinence, chronic fatigue. I wish Id have researched this med before taking it, because its side effects are EXACTLY contrary to nearly ALL of the things that I suffer as a result of my disability. Spent the entire night awake, ears ringing like mad, fever dreaming, head banging on one side, hands going numb, terribly anxious, and feeling like at any minute I was going to explode.

Im going to see if my doctor will put me on something like bisoprolol, which a relative of mine takes and has had very good luck with...

review: ive losartan many years severe hair loss weight gain bad depression also really bad leg back pain. im year old female dr repeatedly denied could caused meds. found losartan easy take husband takes much larger dose cut half. also suffers weight gain leg back pain believe depression. asking taken hopefully lose side effects. tried cilizapril worse side effects. searching net found lots people complaining hair loss. im desperate find something save last remaining hair. trying new dr .
full_review: Ive been on 12.5mg of Losartan for many years have had severe hair loss and weight gain  and very bad depression also  really bad leg and back pain. Im  71 year old female my Dr has repeatedly denied that this could be caused by my meds. I have found Losartan very easy to take my husband takes a very much larger dose  50mg but had to cut in half. He also suffers  from weight gain leg and back pain and I believe  depression. We are asking to be taken off this so that we can hopefully lose these side effects. I tried cilizapril but had worse side effects. After searching the net I found lots of people complaining of hair loss. Im desperate to find something to save my last remaining hair. Trying a new Dr .

review: given losartan er doctor high bp. sick time didnt know why, took days quit. skip forward months. ive gain weight back lost. work life constantly worrying along return bp higher again. start losartan again, feel like rubbish feeling much better past months.
full_review: I was given losartan by ER doctor for high BP. I was so sick at the time I didnt know why, I only took it for 3 or 4 days then quit. Skip forward 10 months. Ive gain weight back  that I had lost. In my work and life  I am constantly worrying  along with return BP being higher again. I start 25mg of losartan again, feel like rubbish after feeling much better those past 10 months.

review: helping blood pressure level throughout day rushes chest weird pains numbness back left arm. pulse rate sometimes goes roof facial flushing. two weeks hopefully even out. much better lisinopril made hair fall rashes face, mention hacky cough.
full_review: Its helping my blood pressure level throughout the day but I have these rushes in my chest and some weird pains and numbness in the back of my left arm. Pulse rate sometimes goes through the roof and facial flushing. Its only two weeks on so hopefully some of this will even out. Much better than Lisinopril which made my hair fall out and rashes on my face, not to mention hacky cough.

review: take cozaar four times day. taking day work doctor agreed suggestion quarter size blood pressure come well. also take clonidine it. combination brought blood pressure. must say lucky doctor prepared go along suggestion using amounts rather larger doses. yes, one pill day would great, suit better.
full_review: I do take Cozaar 25mg four times a day. Taking it once a day did not work for me but my doctor agreed to my suggestion to quarter the 100mg size and my blood pressure has come down well. I do also take Clonidine with it. This combination has brought my blood pressure down to 12876. I must say I am lucky in that my doctor was prepared to go along with my suggestion of using these amounts rather than larger doses. Yes, one pill a day would be great, but these suit me better.

review: bad medicine!!! guess fall percent! taken benicar almost years problems due insurance issues doctor decided switch losartan. first week much pressure chest head thought going explode, left leg started retain fluid work.. didnt take next day contacted doctor immediately got see him. borderline ekg results...low heart rate...bp horribly high. stress test eco cardiogram scheduled asap rule heart attack. what!?! im healthy year old landscaper years works least week medicine put might given heart attack??? please aware new medication!
full_review: Bad medicine!!! Guess I fall in the 1 percent!  Had taken Benicar for almost 4 years with no problems but due to insurance issues doctor decided to switch me to losartan. After first week had so much pressure in chest and head thought I was going to explode, left leg  started to retain fluid while at work.. Didnt take the next day and contacted doctor who immediately got me in to see him. Borderline EKG results...low heart rate...BP horribly high. Now a stress test and eco cardiogram scheduled asap to rule out a heart attack. What!?! Im a healthy 49 year old landscaper of 28 years who works out at least 3x a week and the medicine they put me on might have given me a heart attack???  Please be aware of any new medication!

review: actually prescribed benicar months ago newly diagnosed hbp, insurance company contacted doctor informed benicar wasnt covered plan, switched losartan. break pill half, feel like dosage compromised so. first thing noticed headaches, nausea brain fog. mentioned gp specialist go to, said wait couple weeks while. joint pain, tingling legs feet, notice feet swell shoes. swelling isnt noticeable, feel shoes. plan see gp coming week. frustrated want start exercise program. terribly overweight, dont know much exercise joint pain (especially knees). options medication change, meds class give side effects?
full_review: I was actually prescribed Benicar 3 months ago for my newly diagnosed HBP, but my insurance company contacted my doctor and informed them Benicar wasnt covered under my plan, so they switched me to Losartan. I have to break the pill in half, and I feel like my dosage is compromised doing so. The first thing I noticed was headaches, nausea and brain fog. When I mentioned this to both my GP and a specialist I go to, they both said to wait a couple more weeks until I have been on it a while. Now I have joint pain, tingling in legs and feet, and I notice my feet swell in my shoes. The swelling isnt noticeable, but I can feel it in my shoes. I plan to see my GP this coming week. I am frustrated I want to start an exercise program. I am not terribly overweight, but I dont know how much exercise I can do with all this joint pain (especially knees).  What are my options for a medication change, and will all the meds in this class give me the same side effects?

review: started swell up, able urinate many hours time. fluids kept building legs torso, handsarms. finally, wife said enough could swallow face swelled up. allergy medications helped breath reduced swelling throat face. first month still fluids lungs legs. doctors trying reduce excess fluids blood pressure meds lasix. pockets fluids lungs shortness breath still lingering. would recommend medication anyone needs diuretic blood pressure medication, please allow doctor prescribe you.
full_review: I started to swell up, then I was not able to urinate for many hours at a time.  The fluids kept building up in my legs and in my torso, and handsarms.  Finally, I and my wife said enough when I could not swallow and my face swelled up.  Allergy medications helped me breath and reduced the swelling in my throat and face.  I am now into my first month of still having fluids in my lungs and legs.  Doctors are now trying to reduce the excess fluids with more blood pressure meds and lasix.  Now just pockets of fluids in my lungs but the shortness of breath is still lingering.  I would not recommend this medication for anyone who needs a diuretic as blood pressure medication, please do not allow your doctor to prescribe this for you.

review: like drug. tried hydrochlorothiazide glucose uric acid elevated. doctor talked put instead. started mg. adverse effects nothing major happened lowering bp. moved mg better still consistent mg consistently lower, seems relaxed lungs heart sleep better. cough side effects.
full_review: I like this drug. I had tried hydrochlorothiazide and my glucose and uric acid elevated. My doctor talked with me and put me on this instead. She started me on 25 mg. No adverse effects but nothing major happened in lowering BP. She moved me to 50 mg and better but still not consistent. Now on 100 mg and its consistently lower, seems to have relaxed my lungs and heart and I sleep better. No cough or other side effects.

review: im years old congestive heart failure. massive heart attack years ago. taken mg cozaar mg coreg daily since available, side effects. initially lvef. blood pressure runs. remodeling. heart stayed upper limit normal size time. feel owe life two medicines.
full_review: Im 71 years old and have congestive heart failure.  I had a massive heart attack 21 years ago.  I have taken 50 mg of Cozaar and 100 mg of Coreg daily since each has been available, with no side effects.  Initially my LVEF was about 20.  It is now about 30-35.  My blood pressure runs about 9866.  I have had no remodeling.  My heart has stayed at the upper limit of normal size all this time.  I feel I owe my life to these two medicines.

review: taken mg cozaar daily since released. problems all. bp maintains range years old massive heart attack years ago.
full_review: I have taken 50 mg Cozaar daily since it was released.  I have had no problems at all.  My BP maintains at about 9866 with a range of 86-11456-68.  I am 71 years old and had a massive heart attack 21 years ago.

review: losartan caused side effects anxiety depression. taking mg bedtime. helping blood pressure either . probably need increase dose want it. blood pressure meds many side effects. :(
full_review: The losartan caused side effects of anxiety and depression. I am only taking 12.5 mg at bedtime. It is not helping my blood pressure either . Probably need to increase dose but I just want off it. All these blood pressure meds have so many side effects. :(

review: i’ve losartin mg year. gained weight look bloated. thought drinking much beer stopped alcohol. nothing changed. biggest side effect inflammation left parotid gland pain. throat also swelled. doctor sent ent doctor mri. clear. one knew caused finally found side effect losartin googling. every article showed side effect. currently switching, seem problems dry cough take bp meds. issue hard lose weight go bp medication. endless cycle.
full_review: I’ve been on Losartin 100 mg over a year.  I have gained weight and look bloated. I thought I was drinking too much beer and stopped all alcohol. Nothing changed. The biggest side effect was the inflammation of my left parotid gland with pain.  My throat also swelled. My doctor sent me to a ENT doctor and I had an MRI.  That was clear.  No one knew what caused it until I finally found this a side effect of Losartin by googling.  Not every article showed this as a side effect. I am currently switching, but seem to have problems with a dry cough when I take other BP meds. My issue is that it so hard to lose weight so you can go off any BP medication. Endless cycle.

review: taking losartan years now. ln, taking always notice bit pills much bitter taste normal. remember telling husband suppose pharmacy gave expired medicine wasnt. well continued take notice blood pressure staying high good taking protect transplanted kidney damaged hypertension. continued take sometime last year end cancer small intestine blue. ct scan earlier year abdomen area contrast tumor there. well colonoscopy, doctor thought really unusual. sent biopsies pathology came back cancer. taken losartan put micardis older med similar losartan. went thru colectomy chemo yes definitely looking issue. god bless all.
full_review: I have been taking losartan for some years now. ln 2018, I was taking it as always and notice that for a bit the pills had a much more bitter taste than normal. I remember telling my husband that suppose the pharmacy gave me some expired medicine but the it wasnt. Well I continued to take it and notice that my blood pressure was staying high and that was not good because I was taking it to protect my transplanted kidney from being damaged from hypertension. Continued to take it and sometime last year I end up with cancer in my small intestine out of the blue. I had a CT scan earlier in the year of my abdomen area with contrast and there was no tumor there. Well when they did a colonoscopy, the doctor thought where it was was really unusual. he sent biopsies to pathology and it came back as a cancer. I was taken of losartan and put on Micardis a older med that similar to the losartan. I went thru a colectomy and chemo so yes I am definitely looking into this issue. God bless you all.

review: taken losarten since nov, high blood pressure. stuffy nose terrible panic attacks randomly. pain knee hip. become depressed extremely anxious. good medication doesnt bring bp all. taking dr wants take another extra dose.mg l refuse cannot begin contemplate much l suffer dreaded stuff. going research options get this. enough.
full_review: Taken Losarten since Nov 2017, for high blood pressure. Have stuffy nose and terrible panic attacks randomly. Pain in knee and hip. Become very depressed and extremely anxious. Not a good medication for me and it doesnt bring my bp down at all. Taking 25mg and Dr wants me to take another extra dose of 12.mg but l refuse as cannot begin to contemplate how much more l will suffer with more of the dreaded stuff. Am going to research other options now and get off this. Had enough.

review: prescribed medication take hbp. im currently taking spironolactone day along it. didnt lower blood pressure much spiro itself. blood pressure still sat days taking it, started feeling nauseous day, couldnt eat felt ill. didnt eat nearly days straight. stopped taking medication couldnt handle sickness, within next day, nausea went away. caused hard time sleeping, forgetting things constantly. couldnt remember simple things daily routine would forget sometimes.
full_review: I was prescribed this medication to take for HBP.  Im currently taking 100mg of spironolactone a day along with it.  It didnt lower my blood pressure much more than the spiro did by itself.  My blood pressure still sat at about 14595.  After about 3 days of taking it, I started feeling a nauseous. By the 5th day, I couldnt eat because I felt so ill.  I didnt eat for nearly 4 days straight.  I stopped taking the medication because I couldnt handle the sickness, and within the next day, the nausea went away.  It caused me to have a very hard time sleeping, and I was forgetting things constantly.  I couldnt remember simple things I did in my daily routine and would forget where I was sometimes.

review: taking losartan tabs almost one year. previously prescribed lisinopril high blood pressure issues dry cough gave way annoying. took almost weeks see bp decrease. readings almost never resting heartbeat averages bpm. havent noticed side effects, dry cough, anxiety issues. agree commenters, drug without issues many patients, fits needs satisfied results. might add active get lots exercise. anxiety issues might find daily exercise relief.
full_review: I have been taking Losartan 50mg tabs for almost one year.  Previously I was prescribed Lisinopril for high blood pressure issues but the dry cough it gave me was just way too annoying.  It took almost 6 weeks to see my bp decrease.  Now my readings are almost never over 12065 and my resting heartbeat averages 60 bpm.  I havent noticed any side effects, no dry cough, no anxiety issues.  I agree with other commenters,  no drug is without issues for many patients, but this fits my needs and I am very satisfied with the results. I might add that I am very active and get lots of exercise.  Those with anxiety issues might find that daily exercise will be of some relief.

review: started taking losartan saturday january daily dose milligram, developed dry cough lasted approximately hours, coughing every minutes. coughed hard eventually blood spotting spit. developed massive headache vomiting. night developed high temperature approximately degrees. went urgent care medical attention told side effects follows; heart rate increased approximately beats per minute beats per minute. increased blood pressure. pain jaw right bicep. urinating approximately every minutes. horror!
full_review: Started taking losartan on Saturday January 23rd, 2016. After my 3rd daily dose of 50 milligram, I developed a dry cough that lasted approximately 6 hours, and I was coughing about every 3 minutes. I coughed so hard that eventually had blood spotting in my spit. I developed a massive headache and I was vomiting. Over the night I developed a high temperature of approximately 102.2 degrees. I went to Urgent Care for some medical attention and told of all the side effects I was having which were as follows; heart rate was increased from approximately 78 beats per minute - 114 beats per minute. Had increased blood pressure of 160  104. Had pain in jaw  and right bicep. I was urinating approximately every 20 minutes. And more horror!

review: every single thing side affects menu happened me. stomach muscle felt like ribs choking it, went way back kidneys are, couldnt get bed hours, called doctor, never called back. changing doctors. now, seek medical attention kidneys, never issue, one bothered allergy test medication. worst hours life. know medication works people, please get tested take it, took one dose give reaction.
full_review: Every single thing that is on the side affects menu happened to me. My stomach muscle felt like my ribs were choking it, and it went all the way to my back where my kidneys are, I couldnt get out of bed for 36 hours, and when I called the doctor, they never called back. Will be changing doctors. So now, I have to seek medical attention for my kidneys, which were never an issue, because no one bothered to do an allergy test on me for this medication. It was the worst 48 hours of my life. I know this medication works for other people, but please get tested before you take it, it only took one dose of 50mgs to give me this reaction.

review: doctor arbitrarily switched triampterene losartan weeks ago. first weeks ok, tiredness overall didnt feel great blood pressure went up. three weeks started getting horrible migraines every day, ears ringing time horrible pressure head. also numbness legs arms. felt horrible, take time work, finally went back urgent care got switch back triampterene. blood pressure back was, headaches slowly getting better days now. cant wait side effects poison gone. didnt work well all.

Three weeks in started getting horrible migraines every day, my ears were ringing all the time and horrible pressure in my head. Also had numbness in legs and arms. Felt horrible, had to take time off work, finally went back to urgent care and got them to switch me back to the triampterene.   Blood pressure has been back down where it was, headaches slowly getting better. 4 days off now. I cant wait for the side effects of this poison to be gone. Didnt work well for me at all.

review: female age. presented eye exam (march) freakishly high bp) doctor sent nearby clinic immediately exam. physician prescribed losartan mg metoprolol. month later heart attack. monitor pressure twice daily random times. average) four months ago, became vegan. meat, fish, dairy, eggs oil. bp started plummeting weeks it. month ago started noticing bp much lower usual) good thing, feeling faint eating) not. seems likely postprandial issue since doesnt happen snack throughout day. recently issues insomnia though.
full_review: Female age 67.  I presented at an eye exam (March 2016) with freakishly high BP. (266177)  That doctor sent me to a nearby clinic immediately after the exam.  That physician prescribed 100Mg Losartan and 25 mg Metoprolol.  A month later I had a heart attack.  I now monitor my pressure twice daily at random times.  Average (14580)  Four months ago, I became vegan.  No meat, fish, dairy, eggs or oil.  BP started plummeting about 2 weeks into it.  About a month ago started noticing BP much lower than usual, (12071) this is a good thing, but feeling faint after eating (9066) is not.  It seems that this is likely a postprandial issue since it doesnt happen if I snack throughout the day.  Recently having issues with insomnia though.

review: every side effect. take mg taking morning could hardly pick legs up. pain everywhere. sluggish. want go back lay down. motivation. called doctor get another pill less side effects response per nurse lowest dose cant stand side effects dont take one miserable lady mad doctor

review: im years old moderately high blood pressure. medication two weeks. beginning ive extreme fatigue point wanting lay bed day (thankfully self-employed) thought would pass hasnt. two weeks developed pretty bad stomach pain, bad constipation leg cramps. really alarmed-especially stomach pain- realized symptoms could caused losartan see others experienced same. follow-up gp next week check ive medication discuss him. something pass ill stick reading posts im concerned symptoms could something lasts.
full_review: Im 49 years old and on this for moderately high blood pressure. I have only been on this medication for two weeks. From the beginning Ive had extreme fatigue to the point of just wanting to lay in bed all day (thankfully I am self-employed) and thought it would pass but it hasnt. Now two weeks in I have developed pretty bad stomach pain, BAD constipation and leg cramps. I was really alarmed-especially over the stomach pain- and then realized that my symptoms could be caused from the losartan and see others have experienced the same. I have a follow-up with my GP next week to check how Ive been doing on the medication and so will discuss this with him. If its something that will pass Ill stick it out but reading some of these posts Im concerned that the symptoms could be something that lasts.

review: excellent medicine. take cozaar day coreg twice dilated cardiomyopathy. also history frequent pvcs min) v-tachycardia, things calmed chest greatly. like fireworks show going on. cozaar god send enalapril caused fierce cough case pancreatitis weeks left hospitalized days. im almost much energy regular yr old.
full_review: This has been an excellent medicine.  I take 25mg Cozaar a day and 12.5 Coreg twice for dilated Cardiomyopathy.  I also have a history of frequent PVCs (8 to 15 a min) and V-Tachycardia, and things have calmed down in my chest greatly.  It was like a fireworks show going on.  The Cozaar was a God send after the Enalapril caused a fierce cough and a case of Pancreatitis after only 7 weeks that left me hospitalized for 10 days. Im 41 and have almost as much energy as a regular 41 yr old.

review: ive losartan years. havent issue past months. ive experiencing dizziness, headaches, generally nausea malaise... significant amount hair loss. ive checking blood pressure multiple times daily past week bp reading higher placed bp meds. diastolic become symptomatic - dizziness, nausea, headache, heart pounding... etc. thinking symptoms could thyroid related... however reading others posts im wondering losartan. high bp meds quiet concerning. hair loss depressing... manageable. contacting dr monday.
full_review: Ive been on Losartan for 2.5 years. I havent had an issue with it until the past 4-6 months. Ive been experiencing dizziness, headaches, generally nausea and malaise... and a significant amount of hair loss. Ive been checking my blood pressure multiple times daily for the past week and all bp reading have been higher than before I was placed on bp meds. When my diastolic is above 100mmHg is when I become symptomatic - dizziness, nausea, headache, heart pounding... etc. I have been thinking these symptoms could be thyroid related... however now after reading others posts and Im wondering if its not the losartan. The high bp on meds has been quiet concerning. The hair loss has been depressing... but manageable. contacting DR on Monday.

Drinking lots of water is important and not eating too much potassium rich foods.

I started with  insomnia, bp at 130s80s, now it is up to 226122 yesterday.  and this is the highest, 190s100 average now.  My legs hurt and its hard to walk or stand for more than 15min. In the beginning, sharp muscle spasms in my back which eventually subsided. Started getting bad dizzy spells one of which forced me to pull over while driving. Not good. Dr. said discontinue.
