full_review: Started taking Losarton because of expense of Benicar which I had taken for over 10 years.  Over a year ago I had been on Flecainide and I started have vision problems.  No one could findvthecsource, treated me for uveitis with prednisone and problems went away.  This past winter started takking Losarton and my vision has gotten worse again.  Losing vision in right eye.  Went to see specialust, all tests came back negative, wants to do procedure to withdraw fluid and test for Lymphoma.  I think my eye problems are from the losarton.  Another poster said they had loss of vision in right eye too.  Losarton has not helped my blood pressure, still high systolic, lower number good but Ihink pacemaker controls it. Haveexcruciatingbackpainand join

review: suffered aortic dissection october. controlled keeping bp heart rate low. nothing worked, beta blockers made heart race caused severe gerd. amlodipine gave palpitations, lisinopril made cough, hctz caused severe dizziness high heart rate. started losartan mg increased. bp med i’ve able tolerate. side effects all. i’ve months. bp better, quite yet, much better.
full_review: I suffered an aortic dissection in October 2021.  It is controlled by keeping my bp and heart rate low.  Nothing has worked,  beta blockers made my heart race and caused severe GERD.  Amlodipine gave me palpitations,  lisinopril made me cough, HCTZ caused severe dizziness and high heart rate.   I started on losartan 50 mg then increased to 100mg.  It has been the only BP med I’ve been able to tolerate.  No side effects at all.   I’ve been on it 3 months.   My BP is better, not quite where it should be yet, but much better.

review: everyones physiology reacts uniquely. calcium channel blockers cause ankles swell. one beta blocker didnt work; another worked years stopping. alpha blockers gave orthostatic hypotension. perfect combination seemed ace inhibitor diuretic, diuretic gives dangerously high uric acid. lowers fluid volume decreases kidneys ability excrete uric acid. losartan bp medication lowers uric acid, switched losartan small dose hctz. working well far.
full_review: Everyones physiology reacts uniquely.  Calcium channel blockers cause my ankles to swell.  One beta blocker didnt work; another worked for 10 years before stopping.  Alpha blockers gave me orthostatic hypotension.  The perfect combination seemed to be an ace inhibitor and a diuretic, but the diuretic gives me dangerously high uric acid. It lowers fluid volume and decreases the kidneys ability to excrete uric acid. Losartan is the only BP medication that lowers uric acid, so I was switched to losartan with a small dose of HCTZ.  Working well so far.

review: high (for me) blood pressure max, late time. lots stress moment. family history heart bp problems mid saw cardiologist. full check up, heart fine - relief. put lorsartan - read half recommended starting dose - cant see could placebo effect. saw immediate difference. highest since. averaging pulse. nothing else changed (apart knowledge heart fine, may effect). find stunning could remarkable effect low dose, fast.
full_review: Had high (for me) blood pressure - 160100 max, but late 140s in to 150s all the time. Lots of stress at the moment. Family history of heart and BP problems and now in my mid-40s so saw a cardiologist. Had a full check up, heart is fine - which is a relief. Put on 25mg of Lorsartan - which from what I read is half the recommended starting dose - so I cant see how it could be a placebo effect. But I saw an immediate difference. Highest since is 13392. Averaging out at 12682 with a pulse of 82. Nothing else has changed (apart from the knowledge now that my heart is fine, which may have an effect). But I find it stunning that this could have such a remarkable effect at such a low dose, so fast.

review: losartan years. concerned recall dr would suggest another. also take metoprolol e r. say never experienced problems losartan. fact felt better within weeks taking . experienced insomnia while, changed time day take losartan. take early morning. seemed help. course everyone different different sensitivities. say give chance. may find like best medication you. hoping isnt recalled. best everyone.
full_review: I have been on Losartan 50mg for years. I was concerned that with the recall my Dr would suggest another. I also take Metoprolol 100mg E R. I have to say that I have never experienced any problems with Losartan. In fact I felt better within a few weeks of taking it . I have experienced insomnia once in a while, but I changed the time of day I take Losartan. I take it early morning. It seemed to help. Of course everyone is different with different sensitivities.  All I can say is give it a chance. You may find like I did that it is the best medication for you. I am hoping it isnt recalled. The best to everyone.

review: recently put losartan diovan recall. first month caused cramping body. then, major stomach pain upper abdominal. last week hospitalized violently vomiting horrible pain. cat scan showed inflamed pancreas irritated colon. thought heart attack. drug dangerous. already nafld (nonalcoholic fatty liver disease) made worse.
full_review: I was recently put on Losartan after the Diovan Recall.  First month caused cramping all over my body.  Then, major stomach pain in my upper abdominal.   Last week was hospitalized after violently vomiting and the horrible pain.  CAT Scan showed inflamed pancreas and irritated colon.  I thought I was having a heart attack.  This drug is dangerous. I already have NAFLD (Nonalcoholic fatty liver disease) and this just made it worse.

review: losartan couple months good. blood pressure went terrible side effects. received meds vet administration. seem want keep medicated time. have,stopped taking it. waiting appt,with civilian doc listen side effects give me,something body tolerate.
full_review: Have been losartan for a couple of months not good. Blood pressure went  up  and terrible side effects.  I received meds from vet administration.  They  seem to want to keep you medicated all the time. I have,stopped taking it. I am waiting on an appt,with a civilian doc who will listen to me about these side effects and give me,something my body can tolerate.

review: inpatient back end april thru st week may. previous bp med wasnt job. team doctors saw changed medication losartan mg. & also added amlodipine. bp came instantly & combo works well . however, top head almost bald way crown. wasnt like prior medication change.
full_review: I was an inpatient back end of April thru 1 st week of May. My previous BP med wasnt doing the job. The team of doctors I saw changed my medication to Losartan  100 mg. & also added Amlodipine 5mg. My BP came down instantly & this combo works very well . However,  the top of my head is almost bald all the way to the crown.  It wasnt like this prior to medication change.

review: switched valsartan recalled. didnt make connection taking almost months. beginning anxious shaky. go neurologist. terrible hip pain back pain. developed random hives. doctor took feel better. diuretic dont want hbp pills control lifestyle changes.
full_review: I was switched to this after Valsartan was recalled.  Didnt make the connection but have been taking it almost 2 months.  In the beginning I was very anxious and shaky.  I had to go to a neurologist.  Then I had terrible hip pain and back pain.  Then I developed random hives.  Doctor took me off and I feel better.  I am only on a diuretic and dont want any HBP pills again if I can control it by lifestyle changes.

review: originally started losartan. bp coming doctor upped dose daily. felt absolutely dreadful, blurred vision, runny eyes, runny nose, swollen painful knees, legs ankles, still bp readings high. since losartan reduced back another med added plus mild diuretic. bp brilliant better before. knees, legs ankles painful (muscles joints) many days walking virtually impossible. muscle pain tops arms thighs. two weeks ago reduced losartan daily. within three days awful tinny taste mouth mornings virtually disappeared, muscle pain arms one leg virtually disappeared! pain one leg, speaking doctor next week coming losartan completely.
full_review: Was originally started on 50mg of Losartan. My BP was not coming down at all so my doctor upped the dose to 100mg daily. Felt absolutely dreadful, blurred vision, runny eyes, runny nose, swollen painful knees, legs and ankles, but still the BP readings were very high. Since then Losartan reduced back to 50mg and another med has been added plus a mild diuretic. BP not brilliant but better than before. My knees, legs and ankles are so painful (muscles and joints) that many days walking is virtually impossible. I had muscle pain in the tops of my arms and thighs. Two weeks ago I reduced the Losartan down to 25mg daily. Within three days the awful tinny taste in my mouth in the mornings virtually disappeared, the muscle pain in arms and one leg virtually disappeared! Now just have pain in one leg, and will be speaking to my doctor next week about coming off Losartan completely.

review: product good month seemed side effects rh foot angel gout, numbness left hand side, tongue canker sores. otherwise, good medication. dropped blood pressure high mild level.
full_review: The product is just good but I was on for a month and I seemed to have a few side effects such as RH foot angel gout, numbness on left hand side, and tongue canker sores. Otherwise, it is good medication. It has dropped my blood pressure down from high to mild level.

review: started taking losartan weird bout high blood pressure, almost passing out. high bp episode month ago. started daily bad. started getting tingling numbness right side, ok...no problem. thought maybe lingering post-covid stuff thought. ok go daily like doc said scores getting lower high. but...i think things got worse. woke last week middle night tingling numb entire body like. sleep rest night. times cant sleep. like force let sleep actually fall asleep get abruptly woken up, crazy. recently poor concentration, like fog. slight mild headache low appetite. mild stomach pain also. trusting lord get bottom this.
full_review:
Started taking Losartan after having a weird bout of high blood pressure, almost passing out. High BP episode over a month ago. Started at 50mg daily and it is not too bad.  I started getting some tingling and numbness on my right side, ok...no problem.  I thought it maybe its some lingering post-covid stuff I thought. Ok I go to 100mg daily like doc said and my scores were getting lower 130-140s over high 80s and 90s.
 But...I think that is when things got worse.  Woke up last week in the middle of the night tingling and numb over entire body at like 3am.  No sleep the rest of the night.   Other times I just cant sleep.  Its like a force will not let you sleep and then when you actually fall asleep you get abruptly woken up, crazy.  Then most recently have poor concentration, like I am in a fog.  Slight mild headache and low appetite.  Had some mild stomach pain also.  Trusting the Lord that I will get to the bottom of this.

review: mg losartan potassium months. exhausted eyes feel like cannot keep open. low back pain worsened. sensitive prescription drugs — hoping change meds soon. bp gone spike high. also taking mg amlodipine drugs nasty.
full_review: On 25 mg Losartan Potassium for 3 months. I am exhausted and my eyes feel like I cannot keep them open. Low back pain has worsened. I am very sensitive to any prescription drugs — hoping to change meds soon. BP has gone down to 12880 and does not spike as high. But also taking 2.5 mg of amlodipine These drugs are nasty.

review: effective controlling blood pressure, experienced heavy legs joint pain mentioned others. heavy exerciser, accounts joint pain, suppose. one benefit im sex times per week since starting medication.
full_review:
Effective at controlling my blood pressure, but I have experienced the heavy legs and joint pain mentioned by others. I am a heavy exerciser and 65, so that accounts for some of the joint pain, I suppose.
One benefit is that Im having sex 4-5 times per week since starting the medication.

review: started ok switching lisinopril controlled bp started getting excruciating bad spasms attribute came sudden dizzy spells. blacked behind wheel got car accident last month. fortunately injured minimal damage car. stuff scary seems control bp reasonably well.
full_review: Started out ok on this after switching from Lisinopril which controlled BP to 12080 then started getting excruciating bad spasms which I attribute to this then came the sudden dizzy spells. Blacked out behind the wheel and got in a car accident last month. Fortunately I was not injured and only minimal damage to my car. This stuff is scary but seems to control BP reasonably well.

review: elevated bp pcp started losartan. taken doses experience drug limited. terms side effects: dose ~ within hours mild muscle cramps, headachemigraine trouble concentrating. dose ~ still seem trouble concentrating (like brain fog) plus feeling nauseous bit light headed. terms bp, says drug take impact elevated high bp hours dose, bp went around dose, readings closer. sensitive stomach could feeling nauseous drug.
full_review: I have elevated bp and my pcp started me on 25mg of Losartan.  I have only taken 2 doses so my experience with this drug is limited. In terms of side effects: Dose 1 ~ within 24 hours I had some mild muscle cramps, headachemigraine and trouble concentrating.  Dose 2 ~ I still seem to have some trouble concentrating (like brain fog) plus I am feeling nauseous and a bit light headed. In terms of bp, it says this drug can take a while to impact elevated or high bp. After 24 hours of 1st dose, my bp went from around 14891 to 10369. After 2nd dose, readings were closer to 12071.  I do have a sensitive stomach so that could be why I am feeling nauseous with this drug.

review: suffered severe pain legs mostly. caused much anxiety. sleep all. also severe pain legs back taking. dropped mg see improvement week change another med. cry pain legs sleep deprived cant function
full_review:
Have suffered severe pain my legs mostly. This has caused much anxiety. Do not sleep at all. I also have severe pain in legs and back
Taking 100mg. Just dropped to 50 mg
 If I do not see improvement in 1 week I will change to another med. I cry with pain in my legs and  so sleep deprived that I cant function

review: begged doctor switch amlodopine lisinopril caused retain lot water verapamil taken past. however verapamil useless time caused swelling pain legs doctor switched cozaarlosartan taking couple days bp already dropped. swelling legs excruciating pain tendons subsided. overall im feeling perfect even near way better hopefully way better ways.
full_review: I had begged my doctor to switch me from Amlodopine and Lisinopril which caused me to retain a lot of water to Verapamil which I had taken in the past.  However the Verapamil was useless this time and caused swelling and pain in both legs so my doctor switched me to CozaarLosartan which I have been taking for only a couple of days and my bp already dropped from 140105 to 13082.  Swelling in legs and excruciating pain in my tendons have subsided.  Overall Im not feeling perfect or even near but way better than I was and hopefully on my way to better ways.

review: reserpine (rauwolfia serpentina yrs.. worked great controlling bp kept range. last yrs. started constant stomach pain turned side effect stop. switched lisinopril caused constant throat tickle, worked. switched losartan couple months ago didnt control bp well. drifted range higher spikes coffee. losartan also gave persistent dry cough mg valsartan twice day far impressed. bp continues higher desired. effectiveness body losartan. may need switch different class meds
full_review:
I had been on reserpine (rauwolfia serpentina) for about 10 yrs.. It worked great for controlling BP and kept me in the 11070 range. But in the last 2 yrs. I started having constant stomach pain which turned out to be a side effect and had to stop. Switched to lisinopril which caused a constant throat tickle, but worked. 
Switched to 50mg losartan a couple months ago and it didnt control BP that well. It drifted up to the 15485 range with some higher spikes if I had coffee. The losartan also gave me a persistent dry cough. Now on 80 mg valsartan twice a day and so far not too impressed. BP continues to be higher than desired. Its effectiveness for my body is about the same as the losartan. May need to switch to a different class of meds

review: yrs old, female. high normal bp. tried norvasc caused severe swelling feetankles plus red flushing skin. doc switched losartan past month. ive developed diarrhea, flushing excessive sweating. find something new.
full_review: 64 yrs old, female. High normal BP.  Tried Norvasc but caused severe swelling feetankles plus red flushing on skin. Doc switched to Losartan for past month. Now Ive developed diarrhea, flushing and the excessive sweating. Have to find something new.

review: . bp around several years. odd thing im fairly fit. got big cardio years back lifted weights days week. yeah got big, knew things right, bp high. got onto losartan, first days...i almost passed out, sweated profusely, dizzy, really shouldnt driving. ive switched morn night. bp back high, im seeing results (im back mins cardio mins weights daily, sometimes double that. first month losartan really messed up...couldnt concentrate, personality kind disappeared while. back level now...but get even little bit dehydrated, feel faint
full_review: On 100mg.   My BP was around 14795 for several years.  The odd thing is Im fairly fit.   I got off big cardio a few years back and just lifted weights 5-6 days a week.   Yeah I got big, but I knew things were not right, BP was HIGH.   Got onto Losartan, first few days on 100mg...I almost passed out, sweated profusely, was dizzy, and really shouldnt have been driving.   Ive switched it up to 50mg morn, and 50mg night.   Now my BP is back up high, and Im just not seeing results (Im back on 30 mins cardio, 30 mins weights daily, sometimes double that.    First month this Losartan really messed me up...couldnt concentrate, personality kind of disappeared for a while.  Back level now...but if I get even a little bit dehydrated, I feel faint

review: cozaar many years. nagging cough neither doctor connected cozaar. thought cough might due reflux started taking generic omeprazole (prilosec) cough went away. dont know cozaar causing indigestion like taking cozaar cough might try this.
full_review: I have been on Cozaar for many years.   I did have a nagging cough which neither I nor my doctor connected to Cozaar.   She thought the cough might be due to reflux and I started taking generic Omeprazole (Prilosec) and the cough went away.  I dont know if the Cozaar was causing the indigestion but if you like taking Cozaar and have a cough you might try this.

review: used losartan instead lisinopril five weeks, stopped started feel deeply depressed. back lisinopril again, ready accept concomitant cough. losartan effective keeping blood pressure down. however, depression unacceptable byproduct. interestingly, returned normal returning lisinopril.
full_review: I used losartan instead of lisinopril for about five weeks, but stopped because I started to feel deeply depressed.  I am back on lisinopril again, ready to accept the concomitant cough.  Losartan was effective in keeping my blood pressure down.  However, my depression was an unacceptable byproduct.  Interestingly, I returned to normal after returning to lisinopril.

review: first weeks good, things started going sideways. muscle weakness pain could standup walk. stopped taking everything, drank lots fluids, within days able move again. every pharmaceutical side effects?
full_review: First 6 weeks were good, then all things started going sideways. Between muscle weakness and pain I could just about standup to walk.  Stopped taking everything, drank lots of fluids, and within 2 days was able to move again.  Why does every pharmaceutical have side effects?

review: high blood pressure tachycardia (resting heart rate). also take beta-blocker wanted stop taking. losartan seems little effect bp, need beta-blocker tachycardia currently taking both. previously stated losartan aggravating insomnia, figured folic acid, im editing review
full_review: I have high blood pressure and tachycardia (resting heart rate is 95bpm). I also take a beta-blocker which I wanted to stop taking. Losartan seems to have little effect on my bp, but I need the beta-blocker for my tachycardia so I am currently taking both. I previously stated that losartan was aggravating my insomnia, but I figured out it was folic acid, so Im editing my review

review: losartan. started may gone hospital times screaming blood pressure heart palpitations strong feel uncomfortable skin. bedtime palpitations start , swelling deep tissue legs throat neck… feels like someone’s mildly choking . excessive frequent urination night barely able hold back day overwhelming . doctors say haven’t heard side effects i’m presenting forum posts patients. big concerns actually level out? seen pressure actually increase become almost unmanageable. like drug formulation inconsistent? took three tablets day left hospital still. daily prescription mg. i’m hopefully getting stuff try another bp drug pharma industry needs get real side affects .
full_review:
LOSARTAN.
Started in May 2021 Here we are 8 3 2021
I have gone to the Hospital 4 times for Screaming Blood pressure 
Heart palpitations so strong that I feel uncomfortable in my own skin.
 at bedtime and the palpitations start , swelling in the deep tissue in my legs and throat and neck… feels like someone’s mildly choking me .
Then the excessive frequent urination at night and being barely able to hold back during the day is overwhelming .
Doctors say they haven’t heard of these side effects and now I’m presenting forum posts from other patients. Big concerns for me is will it actually level out?
I have seen my pressure actually increase and become almost unmanageable.
Like the drug formulation is inconsistent?
I once took three 50mg tablets in a day and when I left the hospital I was still 170110.
My daily prescription is 50 mg. 
I’m hopefully getting off this stuff and I will try another BP drug but the pharma industry needs to get real about the side affects .

review: losartin effective controlling bp. started made extremely tired lethargic. cut back.) experiencing intermittent dry cough extremely dry mouth night years, beginning experience documented side effects like dizziness stiffsore muscles. however, fewer side effects losartan bp meds. (i enlarged aorta)
full_review:
Losartin has been very effective controlling my BP.  Started @ 100mg which made me extremely tired and lethargic.  I cut back to 75mg (1 50mg 1 25mg.)  I am experiencing intermittent dry cough and extremely dry mouth during the night.
After 4 years, I am beginning to experience some of the other documented side effects like dizziness and stiffsore muscles.  However, I have had fewer  side effects with Losartan than other BP meds.  (I am 69 with enlarged aorta)

review: put losartan mgs years ago trying bp pills. saying felt well since them. severe leg pains & mobility problems ended steriod injection years ago & another year. anxiety ever before. april year developed terrible coughing fits etc. x ray, breathing tests clear. reluctantly week prescribed antibiotics & steroids seem effects. really convinced cause symptoms losartan & told gp once. reading peoples experiences going push coming terrible pills.
full_review: I was put on Losartan 25 mgs 5 years ago after trying 3 other BP pills. I have been saying for a while now that I have not felt well since being on them. I had severe leg pains & mobility problems ended up having steriod injection 2 years ago & another this year. I have had more anxiety than ever before. In April this year I developed terrible coughing fits etc. I have had X Ray, breathing tests which are all clear. Reluctantly this week was prescribed  antibiotics & steroids which seem to be having no effects. I am really convinced that the cause of all my symptoms is Losartan & have told my GP this more than once. After reading other peoples experiences am now going to push for coming off these terrible pills.

review: works well minimal side effects part however switch pharmacies manufacturer losartan eliminate back cramps common side effect. bp stays. lowest dosage diet change huge impact.
full_review: Works well with minimal side effects for the most part however I had to switch pharmacies and manufacturer of Losartan to eliminate the back cramps which are the most common side effect. BP stays at 11570 now on 25mg. On lowest dosage as diet change had a huge impact.

review: brutal medicine third worse far i’ve tried. side effects hit exhaustion can’t stay awake past dizziness morning. major pain tightness knees point affected walking. took minutes get bed morning. took weeks taking losartan start feeling deceiving. i’ll take hbp pain.
full_review: Brutal medicine this is the third and worse by far I’ve tried. Side effects I hit are exhaustion can’t stay awake past 9pm and dizziness in the morning. Major pain and tightness in my knees to a point it affected my walking. Took me 10-15 minutes to get out of bed in the morning. It took 2-3 weeks of taking Losartan to start feeling it so it can be deceiving. I’ll take the HBP over the pain.

review: started taking losartan mg month ago due volsartan recall. pleased all. tiredness, diarrhea, moodiness, headaches, body pain, nausea, heartburn lightheaded. dr. added mg hctz really wreaked havoc. ended dr office urgent clinic times week. may look another class bp med. dr said classes side effects though. especially beta blockers.
full_review: I started taking Losartan 100 MG over a month ago due to Volsartan recall. Not pleased with it at all. Tiredness, diarrhea,  moodiness, headaches, body pain, nausea, heartburn and lightheaded. Dr. Added 25 MG HCTZ that really wreaked havoc. Ended up in dr office and urgent clinic 3 times in a week. May look into another class of BP med. Dr said the other classes have more side effects though. Especially Beta Blockers.

review: went vertigo months ago. finally diagnosed minor stroke causing vestibular neuritis. treatment try lower bp minor arteries feeding inner ear relax get balance back. quite hyper tested gp well tested hours. first drug tried amlopidine) lower bp. however gave side effects (swollen ankles, breathlessness, poor sleep. next riparin mg) also gave side effects (dry cough, lack energy, breathlessness). losartan (for days now) find side effects, breathlessness, tiredness - reduced bp). needs increased hopefully side effects wear off?
full_review: Went down with vertigo 11 months ago. Finally diagnosed a minor stroke causing vestibular neuritis. The treatment has been to try and  lower BP so that minor arteries feeding the  inner ear relax to get balance back. I was not quite hyper when tested by GP but well over when tested over 24 hours. First drug tried was Amlopidine (10mg) which did lower BP to 13585. However this gave side effects (swollen ankles, breathlessness, poor sleep. The next was Riparin (2.5 mg) also gave side effects (dry cough, lack of energy, breathlessness). I am now on Losartan 50mg (for 5 days now) and again find some side effects, breathlessness, tiredness - not reduced BP which is (140100). Needs to be increased but hopefully side effects will wear off?

review: started losartan almost month ago. nausea & insomnia followed immediately. rash breast. don’t know it’s connected. bp lowered high. take something sleep nightly. awful.
full_review:
Started on Losartan 100 almost a month ago. Nausea & insomnia followed immediately. Now I have a rash on my breast. Don’t know if it’s connected. As for bp it lowered it to the 130s over high 80s.
I have to take something to sleep or I am up at 3 nightly. Just awful.

review: foggy blurred vision vertigo itchy skin muscle aches swollen ankles w kidney pain four times daily....much better switched mg twice daily bad hives solco labs bid....off now. unfortunate issue change pharmacies due insurances have, labs make drug arent available new pharmacy. different issues pop due ingredient differencesdifferent makers. work well adjusting dosage alleviate side effects.
full_review:
Foggy blurred vision vertigo itchy skin muscle aches swollen ankles w kidney pain when on 50mg four times daily....much better when switched to 25 mg twice daily



Bad Hives with Solco Labs25mg bid....off now. 

The unfortunate issue is when you have to change pharmacies due to insurances you have, and the labs that make the drug arent available at the new pharmacy. Different issues can pop up due to ingredient differencesdifferent makers. This is what I have had to work with as well as adjusting dosage to alleviate side effects.

review: losartan months slightly high bp thereabouts yo female working full time. drug works fine me, dizziness nausea. however, began notice joint pain right elbow left wrist may may related drug. didnt before. left side back ache days thought kidney, symptoms kidney issues hit water bottled went away. issues sore joints. taking meds interactions.
full_review: I have been on Losartan 25mg for about 3 months now for slightly high bp, 15593 or thereabouts. I am a 62 yo female who was working full time. The drug works fine for me, no dizziness or nausea. However, I have began to notice some joint pain in my right elbow and left wrist which may or may not be related to the drug. Its just that I didnt have it before. I did have a but with left side back ache for 3 days that I thought was kidney, but there were no other symptoms of kidney issues so just hit water bottled it and it went away. No issues other than the sore joints. Not taking any other meds so no interactions.

review: medicine horrible me. first, one manufacturer little green oval pills. anxiety never wanted sister leave took pill. however, felt fairly normal (although, completely). pharmacy switched manufactuers little white pills looked almost like aspirin. anxiety got terrible then. strong feeling buzzing inside head way around it. wanted sister stay time. didnt even want leave one minute. lucky could handle going bathroom alone. hated alone. dont like alone is, usually handle alone hour
full_review: This medicine was horrible for me.  At first, I was on one by a manufacturer that had it in little green oval pills.  I did have anxiety and never wanted my sister to leave me after I took the pill.  However, I felt fairly normal (although, not completely).   The pharmacy switched manufactuers and they were then little white pills that looked almost like aspirin.  The anxiety got terrible then.  I had the strong feeling of buzzing from inside my head to all the way around it.  I wanted my sister to stay with me ALL THE TIME.   I didnt even want her to leave for ONE MINUTE.   I was lucky if I could handle going to the bathroom alone.   I HATED being alone.   I dont like being alone as it is, but I can usually handle being alone for an hour

review: started losartan hctz) feb hypertensive crisis). within two weeks dropped normal levels. lots dizziness, constipation malaise, combined tingling extremities; subsequently cut hctz. bp sits roughly regular daily exercise dietary changes. still experience slight dizziness time time episodes low blood pressure); plan confer dr soon consider lower dose.
full_review: Started Losartan (50mg 2day, 25mg HCTZ 1x) Feb 2021 after a hypertensive crisis (200120).  Within two weeks dropped to normal levels.  Lots of dizziness, constipation and malaise, combined with tingling in extremities; subsequently cut HCTZ to 12,5mg.  BP sits at roughly 10060-11070 with regular daily exercise and dietary changes.  Still experience slight dizziness from time to time with episodes of low blood pressure (9050); plan to confer with Dr soon to consider a lower dose.

review: experiencing joint pain hips snd shoulders. fell x-rays done signs fracture bone loss, however year begun experiencing hip pain told would need hip replacement five years. wondering losartan causing issues since i’ve started taking year.
full_review: I am experiencing joint pain both hips and snd now shoulders. I fell in 2019 and had X-rays done with no signs of fracture bone loss, however this year begun experiencing hip pain and was told I would need a hip replacement in five years. Just wondering if losartan is causing my issues since I’ve started taking this year.

review: i’ve switched valsartan (due recall) losartan week ago. i’ve started feeling constantly anxious i’m come big cold. bp isn’t high dr said stop explore options, stopping tomorrow. yuck.
full_review: I’ve just switched from Valsartan (due to the recall) to Losartan 50mg about a week ago.  I’ve started feeling constantly anxious and as if I’m about to come down with a big cold.  Because my bp isn’t too high  the Dr said I can stop this and explore options, so am stopping tomorrow.  Yuck.

review: recently took losartan days. within hour taking first dose huge dizzy spell, became nauseous shaky balance way off. drove straight home barely able walk. stayed drug days told get used it. didnt leave house days dangerous symptoms. normally exercise walk daily part time jobs. couldnt go anything day stopping getting better, slowly.
full_review: I recently took Losartan for 10 days. Within an hour of taking the first dose I had a huge dizzy spell, became very nauseous and shaky and my balance was way off. I drove straight home barely able to walk. I stayed on the drug for 10 days because I was told you have to get used to it. I didnt leave my house for the 10 days because it was too dangerous with those symptoms. I normally exercise and walk daily and have part time jobs. Couldnt go to anything. After 1 day of stopping it I am getting better, slowly.

review: taken medication one year seems control blood pressure well however gained lbs...also hands feet stay swollen. walk miles day try watch eat cant stop gaining
full_review: I have taken this medication for one year and it seems to control my blood pressure very well however I have gained 30 lbs...also my hands and feet stay swollen. I walk 3 miles a day and try to watch what I eat and cant stop gaining

review: one year taking losartan, still experiencing constant dizziness, extreme fatigue, brain fog, muscle pain. doctor said nothing losartan first started side effects. bp around.
full_review: After one year of taking Losartan 100,  I am still experiencing constant dizziness, extreme fatigue, brain fog, and muscle pain.  My doctor said me it has nothing to do with Losartan when I first started to have these side effects.  And my BP is up and down around 14090.

review: im year old blood pressure. doctor medication first ever blood pressure medication. since taking awful shooting back pain point cant sit long period time! reading side effects related medication putting back pain medication definitely stopping it!
full_review: Im a 23 year old with a blood pressure of 15095. My doctor but me on this medication as my first ever blood pressure medication. Since taking it I have had awful shooting back pain to the point where I cant sit down for a long period of time! After reading the side effects related to this medication I am putting the back pain down to this medication and will definitely be stopping it!

review: im hoping help others looking losartan reading reviews. ive great experience it. ive mild hypertension year reluctant take anything due always sensitive meds. dr started mg bp back normal range. ive migraines years actually reduced chronic headaches helped sleep. take mine morning. take night seems make sleep well. father well side effects. everyone different course hope helps.
full_review: Im hoping this will help others looking into Losartan after reading the reviews. Ive had a great experience with it. Ive had mild hypertension for about a year and was reluctant to take anything due to always being sensitive to meds. My dr started me on 25 mg and it has my BP back to normal range. Ive had migraines for years and it has actually reduced my chronic headaches and has helped me sleep. I take mine in the morning. If I take it at night it seems to make me not sleep as well. My father is on it as well and has had no side effects. Everyone is different of course but hope this helps.

review: soon starting losartan began experiencing pain feet, thought plantar fasciitis eventually began experiencing pain legs well. muscle completely locked nerve pain, numbness, tingling also rash like appearance lower legs. told repeatedly losartan, stopped taking amazingly started improve. three weeks completely improved feel much better!
full_review: Soon after starting Losartan I began experiencing pain in both feet, I thought it was plantar fasciitis but eventually I began experiencing pain in my legs as well. My muscle completely locked up and nerve pain, numbness, tingling and also a rash like appearance on my lower legs. I was told repeatedly that it was not the Losartan, I stopped taking it and amazingly I started to improve. Its been three weeks off and while not completely improved I feel so much better!

review: took first mg tablet yesterday hours later like spiked, really dizzy ,fell twice serious head pain , worst part fit uncontrollable laughter like sort fit, dont remember much ive told apparently lasted bout minutes followed vomiting, one else similar side effects
full_review: Took my first 50 mg tablet yesterday 6 hours later it was like I had been spiked, really dizzy ,fell over twice serious head pain , then the worst part I had a fit of uncontrollable laughter it was like some sort of fit, I dont remember much of it only what Ive been told apparently lasted bout 15 minutes followed by vomiting, any one else had similar side effects

review: prescribed years ago, issues caused switch hctz, medrol, lisinopril (coughed took off), eventually back cozaar. didnt realize time, looking back data, see whenever dose (its times), weight shot good bit. couple ssri (sometimes taken concert cozaar, sometimes taken all) get dramatic ballooning. im trying get weight thats lowering bp get, well see weight comes faster.
full_review: I was prescribed this more than 20 years ago, but other issues caused them to switch to HCTZ, medrol, lisinopril (coughed and they took me off), and eventually back to Cozaar.  I didnt realize it at the time, but looking back over the data, I see that whenever my dose was above 50mg (its been 75 and 100 at times), my weight shot up a good bit.  Couple that with an SSRI (sometimes taken in concert with >50mg Cozaar, sometimes not taken at all) and you get dramatic ballooning.  Im now trying to get weight down and thats lowering BP so when I get down to 25mg, well see if weight comes off faster.

review: put losartan bad side effects valsartan (gout). main concern losartans side effects fatigue trying anything physical brain fog times memory clarity affected. simple words seem talking clear mind taking losartan. mental aspect really hard handle.
full_review: I was put on Losartan because of the bad side effects from Valsartan (gout).  My main concern is Losartans side effects of fatigue when you are trying to do anything physical and brain fog where at times your memory clarity is affected. Simple words just seem to not be there when talking where I had a clear mind before taking Losartan. The mental aspect is really hard to handle.

review: so, ive losartan days now. also try tell pcp, listen, ive experiencing side effects like dizzy spells, low energy, muscle pains & cramps, headaches, lightheaded oh well brushed off. funny always mention anxiety pcp office well referred office discuss approach it. didnt anxiety quit smoking months ago well. anywho, im thankful seeing post anything drastic happens symptoms wise speaking pcp monday coming wean losartan, told elevated bp prescribed losartan right away sometimes
full_review:
So, Ive been on Losartan for about 16 days now. I Also try to tell my PCP, Listen, Ive been experiencing side effects like the dizzy spells, low energy, muscle pains & cramps, headaches, lightheaded Oh well they just brushed it off.

It is funny they always mention anxiety in the PCP office as well and they referred me to an Office to discuss what an how to approach it. As I didnt have any Anxiety UNTIL I quit smoking about 3 months ago as well.

Anywho, Im thankful for seeing all of these post before anything drastic happens to me other symptoms wise and will be speaking to my PCP on Monday about coming in to wean off Losartan, As they told me I have a Elevated BP and prescribed this Losartan right away Was 140|80 sometimes in the 130s|80s

review: taking losartan since. went doctor routine visit. going divorce learning new job. bp plus plus. idea could get high without causing stroke. doctor put. complaint urinating quite often. take medication since dont want stroke. many bp medicines one ever taken.
full_review: I have been taking losartan since 1999. I went to the doctor for routine visit. I was going through a divorce and learning a new job. My BP was 200 plus over 100 plus. I had no idea it could get that high without causing a stroke.  My doctor put me on 10025MG. The only complaint I have is urinating quite often. I will take my medication since I dont want to have a stroke. There are many BP medicines out there but this is the only one I have ever taken.

review: using losartan years. switched lisinopril caused cough much. losartan kept bp pretty much normal levels. possible side effects (first two doubt losartan caused) hair loss, frequent urination diarrhea. first one could naturalhereditary. men family thinned hair got old. second one could reduced kidney function due pre-diabetic undiagnosed years. last one, diarrhea one think likely actual side effect. though would prefer call softwatery stools. dont go often losartan. bring next doctor visit though. overall great medication blood pressure.
full_review: I have been using losartan 25mg for over 10 years. I was switched from lisinopril because it caused me to cough too much. Losartan has kept my BP down to pretty much normal levels. Possible side effects (first two of which I doubt are Losartan caused) are hair loss, frequent urination and diarrhea. First one could just be naturalhereditary. All the men in my family have or had thinned hair as they got old. Second one could be reduced kidney function due to being pre-diabetic which was undiagnosed for years. The last one, diarrhea is one I think is most likely to be an actual side effect. Though I would prefer to just call it softwatery stools. I dont go any more often than I did before Losartan. I will bring it up at my next Doctor visit though. Overall a great medication for blood pressure.

review: due valsartan recall unavailable last refill, doctor switched losartan. find tired time spend day looking forward sleeping. fell anxious depressed completely abandoned walking routine (was previously walking+ miles day close years). like others mentioned, urinate time annoying.
full_review: Due to Valsartan recall and it being unavailable for my last refill, my doctor switched me to Losartan.  I find myself tired all the time and spend my day looking forward to sleeping.  I fell anxious and depressed and have completely abandoned my walking routine (was previously walking 1+ miles a day for close to 3 years).  Like others mentioned,  I have to urinate all the time which is very annoying.

review: normal bp range. first medication blood pressure put work. second medication, doctors put. bp drop much three months , doctor moved mg. still work. bp still. go back next month doctors medication review.
full_review: Normal BP is in the 160 range. The first medication for blood pressure they put me did not work.  This is my second medication, doctors put me on 50mgs. My BP did not drop much after three months , the doctor moved me up to 100 mg. And it still does not work. BP still 160 to 180. I go back in next month Doctors a medication review.

review: wanted share experience case helps someone. prescribed hypertension. took noticed coughing, thought managing okay. gradually noticed increased pain immediately recognize side effect losartan. eventually couple trials stopping medicine weeks restarting. pain definitely much worse losartan. later researched found studies showed losartan cause worsen pain. thanks! thank goodness recognized awful pain side effect. yikes! take verapamil ir feel much better. anti inflammatory properties, reduces pain body, reduces headaches, helps bp. verapamil wins me.
full_review:
I wanted to share my experience in case it helps someone. This was prescribed for hypertension. I took it for a while and noticed some coughing, but thought I was managing okay. I gradually noticed increased pain which I did not immediately recognize as a side effect of the losartan. I eventually did a couple trials by stopping this medicine for some weeks and then restarting. My pain was definitely much worse with losartan. I later researched this and found studies showed losartan to cause or worsen pain. No thanks! Thank goodness I recognized the awful pain was a side effect. Yikes! 
I take verapamil IR now and feel so much better. It has anti inflammatory properties, reduces the pain in my body, reduces headaches, and helps the BP. Verapamil wins for me.

review: started losartan metropolol. . bp med works getting side effects: confusion, foggy, frequent urination(stress incontinence), dizzy (drive time). discontinued metropolol atenolol (original med mg pm, low systolic . wits end.
full_review:
Started on losartan 50mg am and Metropolol 25pm. . BP Med works but I am getting side effects: confusion, Foggy, Frequent urination(stress incontinence), dizzy (drive time). 
Discontinued metropolol to atenolol (original Med) to 12.5 mg pm, low systolic . At wits end.

review: taking losartan.i observed recurring hacking cough, worst night going bed. x ray, normal. doctor gave cough med suppressant, antacid, because, said, may acid reflux, cough still persisted. research, found out, cough sneeze, stuffy nose, side effects losartan. request doctor change cozaar, see difference.
full_review:
After taking Losartan 50mg.I observed I have recurring hacking cough, and its worst at night before going to bed.  I had x ray, and all is normal. The doctor gave me cough med suppressant, antacid, because, he said, may be acid reflux, but cough still persisted. After some research, found out, the cough and sneeze, stuffy nose, are some of the side effects of Losartan. 
I will request doctor to change it to Cozaar, and see the difference.

review: switched beta blocker plus years ago losartan mg day mg hct day- bp good, palpitations infrequent occasional insomnia may even related think it’s effective drug minimal side effects. however suffer pulsative tinnitus years resolved itself... sure related read someone else taking drug perhaps linked?
full_review: Switched from a beta blocker 10 plus years ago  to Losartan  50 mg once  a day and 25 mg HCT once a day- bp is good, palpitations infrequent and other than occasional insomnia which may not even be related I think it’s an effective drug with minimal side effects. However I did suffer from pulsative tinnitus for a few years on and off but that has resolved itself... so not sure if it was related it I read someone else had that after taking this drug so perhaps  it was linked?

review: ive losartin years mini strokes bp good , gone , chest cramps , shortness breath tingling hands couple weeks dr upt within days bp back symptoms gone dont seem problem , also take bisoprolol, clopidogril , sinvastatin side effect get severe tiredness times . could bisoprolol
full_review: Ive been on losartin for 4 years 2.5mg after 2 mini strokes bp has been good , but has now gone up , been having chest cramps , shortness of breath and tingling in hands on and off for couple of weeks so Dr has upt it to 50mg within 3 days my bp was back down and all above symptoms have gone i dont seem to have a problem with it , i also take Bisoprolol, Clopidogril , Sinvastatin only side effect i get is severe tiredness at times . But that could be the Bisoprolol

review: taking weeks days, never diagnosed high bp pressure monitor, drop potassium due stress. er second visit decided need water pill time release one bp, doctor took put lostran. taking days felt side effects, cant sleep, arms tingle light feeling burning sensation, palpitations feeling anxious, good feeling. mom younger sister also takes med side effects, works others goo.
full_review: I have been taking this for 3 weeks 3 days, never been diagnosed for high BP nor had my pressure monitor, had a drop in my potassium due to stress. In the  ER   on my second visit they decided I need a water pill and a time release one for my BP, but my doctor took me off and put me on Lostran 50mg. After taking it for 2 days I felt the side effects, cant sleep, arms tingle with a light feeling of a burning sensation, palpitations feeling anxious,  not a good feeling. My mom and younger sister also takes this med but no side effects, so for some it works for others not so goo.

review: read many bad reviews losartan wouldnt take anymore, wears gets tired, also panic attacks shortness breath. told doctor said meds, im taken really isnt suiting sure taken meds weeks,
full_review:
If have read so many bad reviews about losartan I wouldnt take it anymore, it wears you down and gets you tired, also I have panic attacks and shortness of breath. Told my doctor he said its not from this meds, Im not taken as it really isnt suiting me for sure
Been taken this meds for 2 weeks, no more

review: changed metoprolol needed non beta blocker medicine blood pressure, beta blocker interfered dangerously necessary allergy shots day vomiting non stop, noticeable tremors extremities, horrible migraines, persistent cough, nausea, tremendously painful muscle cramps lower back (on top degenerative back diseases constant pain). tried calling doctor never heard back flushed poison toilet. still experiencing vomiting tremors days stopping medicine. far worst medication ever on.
full_review: Was changed to this from metoprolol because I needed a non beta blocker medicine for my blood pressure, beta blocker interfered dangerously with my necessary allergy shots.  After 1 day I was vomiting non stop, had noticeable tremors in my extremities, horrible migraines, persistent cough, nausea, and tremendously painful muscle cramps in my lower back (on top of my degenerative back diseases constant pain).  Tried calling my doctor but never heard back so I flushed this poison down the toilet.  Still experiencing the vomiting and tremors 2 days after stopping the medicine.  This is by far the worst medication I have ever been on.

review: mother losartan nearly one year. since anxiety. also takes amlodipine propranolol. blood pressure normal suffers anxiety much.
full_review: My mother 83 has been on losartan 50 for nearly one year. Since then she has  anxiety. She also takes amlodipine 10mg and Propranolol 20+10. Her blood pressure is normal now but she suffers from anxiety too much.

review: take, last eight months. things noticed probably one half hour taking it, notice heart skip beat occasionally. addition, thing ive noticed seem get tightness across abdominal muscle right rib cage especially sit forward. painful, im aware more. lowers pressure ranging within. think depends eat makes fluctuate like this. im still testing though.
full_review: I take 50mg, and have been over the last eight months. The things I have noticed most is probably one half hour after taking it, I notice that my heart will skip a beat but only very occasionally. In addition, the other thing Ive noticed is I seem to get this tightness across my abdominal muscle right below the rib cage especially if I sit forward. Its not at all painful, its just that Im aware of it more. It lowers my pressure to ranging within 12782 to 14095. I think that depends on what I eat that makes it fluctuate like this. Im still testing it out though.

review: - started bp issues years ago apprx. took clonidine side effects bp correction. took needed. bp issue started past year believe. someone listed cause chronic cough new doc ids changed losartan. initially some, mild dizziness spells dissipated now. morning bp high, last week two gym exercise well, eating less average, still lbs (thats years years now). need tell doc morning issue, going night? get stroke something? maybe need cholodine night fast relief?
full_review: 55 now - started BP issues about 4 years ago apprx.  Took Clonidine with no side effects and BP correction.  Took it as needed.  BP issue started again past year I believe.  Other someone listed below but cause chronic cough which new doc IDs and changed me to Losartan.  Initially some, mild dizziness spells which dissipated now.  Morning BP is high, was 135 or so  90, but last week or two has been  145-150 and 95-100  have had some gym exercise as well, eating 1800 or less average, but still 35 lbs over (thats been years and years now).  Do need to tell doc about morning issue, and what is going on during night?  Get a stroke or something?  Maybe need Cholodine again during night for fast relief?

review: drs trying find correct hypertension medications me, nothing least one opposite effect months losartan mg daily supplemented another medication medium dose. working going months aside occasional diarrhea serious side effects unlike others.
full_review: Drs have been trying to find the correct hypertension medications for me, some do nothing at all and at least one had the opposite effect. So 2 months now on Losartan 50 mg once daily and supplemented by another medication medium dose. Is working going on 2 months now and aside from occasional diarrhea have had no serious side effects unlike the others.

review: i’m taking losartan, valsartan recalled..i checked comments since med,i wondered one experiencing severe fatigue leg pain. stuff wretched. i’m hoping valsartan come back taken plus years adverse reactions. hope go back old bp med soon❤️
full_review:
I’m now taking losartan 10025, after valsartan was recalled..I checked out these comments because since being on this med,I wondered if I was the only one experiencing severe fatigue and leg pain. This stuff is wretched. 
 I’m hoping Valsartan will come back as I have taken it for 10 plus years and had no adverse reactions. I hope I can go back to my old bp med soon❤️

review: high bp even doctors offices. get home bp drops. high, high, high-stress job difficult family issues collide. started cozaar immediately lowered bounce extreme watery diarrhea two days, followed excruciating, debilitating lower left back pain days nearly called onset% patients experience back pain dr stated back pain side effect cozaar bologna. hamstrings cramped time two nights ago resulting stuck face sideways floor minutes unable move. excessively exhausted, energy, loss appetite, sharp stomach pains eating mg day starting week three. cant wait see happens next.
full_review: High Bp 188110 even into 230s and 240s over 110s in doctors offices. Get home bp drops into 120s or 130s over the 80s and 90s. High, high, high-stress job with difficult family issues collide. Started Cozaar immediately lowered to 100s over 60s bounce 110s over 70s extreme watery diarrhea for two days, followed by excruciating, debilitating lower left back pain for 5 days nearly called 911 at onset.  2% of patients experience this back pain but my Dr stated back pain is not a side effect of Cozaar such bologna. Both hamstrings cramped at the same time two nights ago resulting in being stuck face down and sideways on the floor for 15 minutes unable to move. Excessively exhausted, no energy, loss of appetite, sharp stomach pains after eating. 50 mg a day starting week three. Cant wait to see what happens next.

review: marginally controlled high pressure. weeks noticed pulse intermittently left ear noticeable immediate pressure changes i.e. standing stoop yr pulsatile tinnitus unbearable, stopped medication day% better days% disappeared. calling doctor switch diff acting med.
full_review: Marginally controlled the high pressure.  After a few weeks I noticed pulse intermittently in left ear and more noticeable at immediate pressure changes i.e. standing up from a stoop.  After 1 yr pulsatile tinnitus unbearable, stopped the medication and in 1 day 50% better, 3 days 90% disappeared.  calling the doctor to switch to a diff acting med.

review: months taking losartan, developed painful lump breast. rolled bed like jabbed nail. scans showed developed gynoclamastia (fatty tissue) right breast. required surgery remove. first night surgery, sitting bed, simply googled “what causes gynoclamastia” first search results showed related losartan. apparently% men develop gynoclamastia taking losartan.
full_review: After 3 months taking Losartan, I developed a painful lump in my breast. When I rolled over in bed it was like being jabbed with a nail. Scans showed that I had developed a gynoclamastia (fatty tissue) in my right breast.  It required surgery to remove.  On my first night of the surgery, as I was sitting in bed, I simply googled “what causes gynoclamastia” and the first 10 search results showed it was related to Losartan.  Apparently 23% of men will develop gynoclamastia from taking Losartan.

review: thought me!!!ive losartan weeks. makes eyelids flutter, rash, lymphnodes tender swollen left armpit extreme itching left shoulder, cant hardly stand anything touch it, sooo tender burning itching (im usually active but) tired, ear pain, back pain, insomnia, hair shedding, lightheaded, legs heavy cramping. called dr like reviews claim meds....rubbish!! mentioned recall!! tells stop taking appointment tues...this mediation horrible..dont take it!
full_review: I thought it was just me!!!Ive been on Losartan about 3 weeks. It makes your eyelids flutter, rash, lymphnodes tender swollen under left armpit extreme itching on left shoulder, cant hardly stand for anything to touch it, sooo tender and burning itching (Im usually very active but) very tired, ear pain, back pain, insomnia, hair shedding, lightheaded, legs heavy cramping. I called my dr just like some of the reviews they claim its not from meds....RUBBISH!! I mentioned the recall!! He tells me to stop taking it until my appointment Tues...This mediation is horrible..Dont take it!

review: months now, switching atenolol. mostly switched since told would help cardiac output running. get hr rise, bp stay close normal, side effects worth it. (leg weakness, cramps, stomach pain, worst running times dropped drastically) going switch back atenolol bp starts rising again.
full_review:
Have been on this for 2 months now, switching from Atenolol. Mostly switched since I was told it would help with cardiac output for running.  While it does get my HR to rise, and my BP to stay close to normal, the side effects are not worth it.   (Leg weakness, cramps, stomach pain, and worst off is my running times have dropped drastically)   
Just going to switch back to Atenolol if my BP starts rising again.

review: realize person react differently prescribed medication + interactions prescribed medications factor . prescribed losartan primary care dr. side effects intolerable . back pain spasms incredible nature plus thigh hamstring pain . nightmares ! panic attacks , lethargy , dizzy anything upon arising . tried blood pressure medications losartan m.g. ) q day far worst medication taken hypertension possibly worst medication ever ! read numerous recalls also !
full_review:
I realize each person can react differently to any prescribed medication + interactions with other prescribed medications can be a factor .
I was prescribed losartan by my Primary Care Dr. 
I had side effects which were intolerable .
Back pain and Spasms of an incredible nature plus thigh  hamstring pain .
Nightmares !
Panic Attacks , Lethargy , Dizzy as anything not just upon arising .
I have tried other Blood Pressure medications too But losartan ( 50 m.g. ) Q day 
Was by far the worst medication I have taken for hypertension 

Possibly the worst medication ever !

Read up on the numerous recalls also !

review: cozaar mg effective reducing blood pressure expensive possibly caused dizziness. replaced amiodipine besylate (generic norvasc), works well much, much lower price. dizziness eased.
full_review: Cozaar 25 mg was effective in reducing blood pressure but very expensive and possibly caused dizziness.  It was replaced with Amiodipine Besylate 5mg (generic for Norvasc), and it works just as well at a much, much lower price.  Dizziness has eased.

review: took first dose friday night experiencing dizzy spells hot flashes day work er rashhives throat chest back neck throat swelling shut. sure happened terrified say least. know happens rare occasions able find anything internet may cases affect medication might caused it.
full_review: I took my first dose at 8am on Friday. By 8:30pm that night after experiencing dizzy spells and hot flashes all day at work I was in the ER as I had a rashhives on my throat chest and back of my neck and my throat swelling shut. Not sure what happened here but I was terrified to say the least. I know they it only happens on rare occasions but I am not able to find anything on the internet of how may cases have had this affect and what in the medication might have caused it.

review: enalapril months, coughing terrible. doctor changed losartan potassium. cough got little better experiencing headaches everyday. works well blood pressure. taking day. going ask doctor change headaches dont go away.
full_review: I was on enalapril for 2 months, the coughing was terrible. The doctor changed it to losartan potassium. The cough got a little better but I am experiencing headaches everyday. It works well for my blood pressure. I am taking 25mg once a day. I am going to ask the doctor to change it if the headaches dont go away.

review: taking losartan years. bp averaging. typically something like. side effects quite minor. believe get slight dry cough occasional dizziness. take bed time - relegating side effects night. bonus: sometimes suffer gout. believe med reduces uric acid - welcome plus. bottom line: works really well me.
full_review:
I have been taking 50mg of losartan for over 3 years. BP had been averaging 130-140 and 80 to 85. Now it is typically something like 117 over 75. Side effects have been quite minor. I believe I get a slight dry cough and occasional dizziness. I take it at bed time - relegating those side effects to the night.
Bonus: I sometimes suffer from gout. I believe this med reduces uric acid - a welcome plus. 
Bottom line: works really well for me.

review: dr. switched lisinopril losartan approx months ago. first thing noticed anxious feeling, loose stools, blurring vision followed lethargy slow weight gain months felt actually sick time never eased up. importantly control bp well lisinopril, switched back lisinopril week nearly back normal (except weight). stuff horrible worse amlodipine given several years ago!
full_review: My Dr. switched me from Lisinopril 40mg to 100mg of Losartan approx. 3 months ago.  First thing noticed was the anxious feeling, then loose stools, blurring of vision and  then followed by lethargy and a slow weight gain.  After 2 months I felt as if I were actually sick most of the time and it never eased up. Most importantly it did not control BP as well as the Lisinopril,  Switched back to lisinopril and with a week was nearly back to normal (except for the weight).  This stuff is horrible and worse than Amlodipine which I was given several years ago!

review: terrible med. losartan year, caused severe diarrhea. also problem benicar yrs. bp meds terrible side effects!!!! angioedema ace inhibitor. frustrating!!!!
full_review: Terrible med. On Losartan for 1 12 year, and it caused severe diarrhea. I also had the same problem with Benicar which I was on for 9 yrs. These BP meds have terrible side effects!!!! Had angioedema with ACE inhibitor. Very frustrating!!!!

review: kept increased bp issues. couldnt take lisinopril due anaphylactic reaction. also taking hctz bystolic. feeling medications worsening rather helping stopped losartan used bystolic hctz needed control weeks losartan wean medications take hctz twice week needed. bp meds meds.
full_review: Kept having increased BP issues. Couldnt take lisinopril due to anaphylactic reaction. Also taking HCTZ and bystolic. Just had feeling that medications were worsening rather than helping so I stopped Losartan and used Bystolic and HCTZ as needed for control. After 2 weeks off losartan I had to wean other medications and now take HCTZ once or twice a week if needed. BP 100-13070 on no meds and was 15080-90 on all 3 meds.

review: ive medication years. gained lot weight. legs heavy cannot walk distance without sit down. also hips, knees ankles hurt constantly im tired time. looked side effects prescriptions losartan potassium listed. im reading comments see many people issues conclude losartan causing issues... im stopping medication right now.
full_review: Ive been on this medication for over 2 years. I have gained A LOT of weight. My legs are so heavy that I cannot walk any distance without having to sit down. Also my hips, knees and ankles hurt constantly and Im so tired all the time. I have looked up the side effects of all my prescriptions and only Losartan potassium had ALL of these listed. And now Im here reading all of the comments and I see so many people having the same issues that I have and I can only conclude that its the Losartan causing my issues... Im stopping this medication right now.

review: aware lot people gain weight! took months. i’d lost pounds prior starting. i’ve gained+ short time still working times week food journaling. thankfully cardiologist primary drs agreed change week. hopeful week start coming off.
full_review: Be aware a lot of people gain weight!  I only took it for 3 months. I’d lost 10 pounds just prior to starting. I’ve gained the 10+ I that short time while still working out 4 times a week and food journaling. Thankfully my cardiologist and primary drs agreed to change it this week. Hopeful the week will start coming off.

review: put losartan er honest medication causes eyes burn really bad. stopped taking burning eyes stopped. amlodipine bp uncontrolled.
full_review: I was put on Losartan 25mg at the ER and to be honest this medication causes my eyes to burn really bad.  I stopped taking it and the burning in my eyes stopped.  I am on amlodipine 10mg but my bp is uncontrolled.

review: year old male, active riding bicycles, regular fitness moderate weigh lifting. overweight due muscle mass. diagnosed hbp recovering covid infection mild symptoms. blood pressure range time diagnosed. taking losartan bp would consistently measure. doctor increased dose daily bp went. take losartan bp goes back original levels. restart losartan bp goes up. consistent. mild side effects blurry vision, fatigue, light dizziness. would willing deal actually lowered bp. think medication dangerous probably end class action lawsuit.
full_review:
51 year old male, active by riding bicycles, regular fitness and moderate weigh lifting. Overweight due to muscle mass. 
I was diagnosed with HBP after recovering from Covid infection with mild symptoms. My blood pressure was in the 135-145 to 80-90 range at the time I was diagnosed.  
After taking 25mg Losartan my BP would consistently measure 16090. 
My doctor increased dose to 50mg daily and my BP went to 17095. 
I take myself off Losartan and BP goes back to original levels. I restart Losartan BP goes up. Its very consistent. 
Other mild side effects are blurry vision, fatigue, light dizziness. I would be willing to deal with these if it actually lowered my BP. 
I think this medication is very dangerous and will probably end up in a class action lawsuit.

review: days taking losartan, experienced intense headache i’ve ever had. yesterday - another debilitating headache. bp increased er within hour. took morning within hours, another major headache. tomorrow see pcp stop. long time user nifedipine requested change continued swollen legs ankles. i’ve read many reviews articles losartan, longer want take it. good thing say medication legs ankles longer swollen. thank everyone honesty experience; week half enough me…
full_review: After 5 days taking Losartan, I experienced the most intense headache I’ve ever had.  Then again just yesterday - another debilitating  headache.  My BP increased up to 214116 and I was in the ER within the hour.  I took it again this morning and within 3 hours, another major headache.  So tomorrow I see my PCP to stop.  I was a long time user of Nifedipine and requested a change because of continued swollen legs and ankles.  I’ve read so many reviews and articles about Losartan, that I no longer want to take it.  The only good thing I can say about this medication is that my legs and ankles are no longer swollen.  Thank you everyone for your honesty about your experience; a week and a half is enough for me…

review: male losartin weeks starting feel side effects. numbness arm legs sleep. nightmares insomnia well. really lowering bp. keeping average little above.
full_review:
Male 57  Been on Losartin  6 weeks and starting to feel side effects.  Numbness in arm and both legs when I sleep.
Nightmares and insomnia as well. Not really lowering BP. Keeping it about average to a little above.

review: dr. put losartan potassium mg x pr day last week. far good headaches. seems get bp quite make hours yet. changed a.m. dose mg hctg. hope goes well bp stays down. also metropolol mg x pr day.
full_review:
Dr. put me on Losartan with potassium 100 mg.  2 x pr day last week.  So far so good other than headaches.  It seems to get my BP down but does not quite make 
it the 12 hours for me yet.  So she changed the a.m. dose to 100 mg with HCTG.
I hope all goes well and my BP stays down.  Also on Metropolol 100 mg 2 x pr day.

review: started losartan know takes time work especially blood pressure going high. side affect far dizziness taking medication doctor seems think blood pressure vertigo making dizziness. see change blood pressure taking medicine get pressure low throughout day get readings high. hope medicine eventually get pressure back normal range couple weeks closely monitored doctor.
full_review: Just started losartan 50mg I do know it takes time to work especially having blood pressure going as high as 158113. The only side affect so far for me is dizziness which I had before taking this medication which doctor seems to think it is the blood pressure and vertigo making the dizziness. But do see some change in blood pressure after taking the medicine I can get my pressure down as low as 12884 but throughout the day I get readings as high as 124102. I hope this medicine will eventually get my pressure back down to normal range with in a couple of weeks but is being closely monitored by my doctor.

review: im physically fit however stress raised bp. im approaching. far good- day three, calm facing stressful situations. bp seems range around take two weeks see effects me. fatigue symptoms. stomach cramps, normal bowel movements. light dizziness gone now. (keep mind need exercise) stuff supposed lower bp feeling fatigue.)
full_review: Im physically fit however stress has raised my BP.  Im approaching 50.  So far so good- day three, I have been calm when facing stressful situations.  My BP seems to range around but it will take two weeks to see how this effects me.  No fatigue symptoms.  No stomach cramps, normal bowel movements.  Did have some light dizziness but its gone now.  (keep in mind you need to exercise) this stuff is supposed to lower your BP if your feeling fatigue.)

review: read many reviews . take mg dose works well blood pressure . i’ve taking years . one issue doesn’t work well hour period. i’ve taken several bp meds, may lower pressure - it’s side effects watch . case minimal side effects i’ve noticed everyone different . diet , exercise relaxing techniques help tremendously good luck everyone .
full_review: I read many of the reviews .  I take 50 mg dose and  it works well for my blood pressure .  I’ve been taking it about 2 years .  The one issue I have is it doesn’t work well over a 24 hour period.  I’ve taken several BP meds,  they all may lower your pressure - it’s the side effects to watch out for .  In my case this has minimal to no side effects  that I’ve noticed but everyone is different .  Diet , exercise and relaxing techniques help tremendously Good luck everyone .

review: side effects- tinnitus, extreme dizziness, diarrhea, extreme tiredness, also insomnia times, anxiety- one case extreme panic attack, blurred vision, loss focus concentration, loss appetite belching felt unbalanced feet. drink plenty water still felt like drinking enough one time day. blood pressure better side effects taken massive toll body.
full_review: Side effects- tinnitus, extreme dizziness, diarrhea, extreme tiredness, also insomnia at times, anxiety- with one case of extreme panic attack, blurred vision, loss of focus and concentration, loss of appetite and belching and felt unbalanced on my feet. I drink plenty of water and still felt like I was drinking enough.  I was on 50mg one time a day. My blood pressure is some better but the side effects have taken a massive toll on my body.

review: md put cozaar hypertension rapid pulse. also take verapamil. condition called marfans syndrome doctor hopes medicine help prevent dilation aorta. go hydrochlorothiazide lot edema legs knees started lasix today also. worth using order protect blood vessels.
full_review: My MD put me on Cozaar for my hypertension and rapid pulse. I also take Verapamil. I have a condition called Marfans Syndrome and Doctor hopes this medicine will help prevent any further dilation of my aorta. I had to go off the hydrochlorothiazide and now have a lot of edema in my legs to above my knees so started on Lasix today also. But its worth using in order to protect my blood vessels.

review: losartan yrs, heart attack. discovered side effects related med. first losartan dropped bp extremely low & couldn’t stay awake function. reduced dose daily every day. year, developed chronic dry cough. time, developed adverse reaction, called interstitial granulomatous dermatitis, rare skin disorder. i’ve cough & igd yrs, happening simultaneously. changing med see clear up. side effects heart palpitations, extreme anxiety, depression, dizziness, leg muscle weakness, joint pain, achey shoulder blades, arms & hands, numbness tingling handsfeet, headaches, fatigue, sudden weight gain, abdominal pain, hair loss, acid reflux.
full_review: On Losartan 25mg for 3 yrs, after heart attack. Just discovered  side effects are related to Med. At first Losartan dropped BP extremely low & couldn’t stay awake or function. Reduced dose from daily to every other day. After a year, developed a chronic dry cough. At same time, developed an adverse reaction, called Interstitial Granulomatous Dermatitis, which is a rare skin disorder. I’ve had both cough & IGD for 2 yrs, happening  simultaneously. Changing my med to see if both clear up. Other side effects are heart palpitations, extreme anxiety, depression, dizziness, leg muscle weakness, joint pain, achey shoulder blades, arms & hands, numbness and tingling in handsfeet, headaches, fatigue, sudden weight gain, abdominal pain, hair loss, acid reflux.

review: slightly overweight male mid late, fairly active. blood pressure something something. used lisinopril constant coughing became much. asked doc arb moved losartan mg. little harder fall asleep it. also notice skipped beatpalpitation stuff first weeks, get stress much caffeine anyway weeks palpitations gone, least unnoticeable. atypical side effect noticed irritability. severe, find little less patient get flustered defensive easily usual. side effect severe enough consider discontinuing use. current bp mid mid, im going try pull little lower diet exercise, otherwise happy reduction drug.
full_review: Slightly overweight male in mid to late 30s, and fairly active.  Had a blood pressure 150 something over 90 something.  I used Lisinopril for a while but the constant coughing became too much.  I asked my doc for an ARB and was moved to Losartan 50 mg.  It is a little harder to fall asleep on it.  I did also notice some skipped beatpalpitation stuff in the first few weeks, but I get this with stress and too much caffeine anyway.  About 3 weeks in the palpitations were gone, or at least unnoticeable.  The only atypical side effect I have noticed is irritability.  Its not severe, I just find myself a little less patient and I get flustered or defensive more easily than usual.  No side effect is severe enough for me to consider discontinuing use.  Current BP is mid-130s over mid-80s, Im going to try and pull it a little lower with diet and exercise, but am otherwise happy with the reduction on the drug.

review: taking losartan amlodipine, max dosage approximately six months noticed significant decrease blood pressure quite pleased results. side effects except wake headache sometimes. cant say medication factors though.
full_review: Been taking Losartan and Amlodipine, max dosage for approximately six months and I have noticed a significant decrease in blood pressure quite pleased with results. No side effects except I do wake with a headache sometimes. Cant say if it is do to medication or other factors though.

review: prescribed losartan hbp drug discontinued days, noticed palpitations general feeling unease. week, taught normal yoga class noticed breathless anxious. stuck another weeks, experiencing feelings shortness breath, tremors, terror panic, doom gloom. glad came read similar reviews. gp taken drug.
full_review: Was prescribed 50mg losartan after my other HBP drug was discontinued. After 3 days, I noticed palpitations and a general feeling of unease. After a week, I taught my normal yoga class and noticed I was very breathless and anxious. Stuck with this for another 5 weeks, experiencing feelings of shortness of breath, tremors, terror and panic, doom and gloom. Glad I came on here to read similar reviews. GP has taken me off the drug.
